 953  8C5C                  include "./Maths/Utilities/XX12EquNodeDotOrientation.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/XX12EquNodeDotOrientation.asm
   1+ 8C5C              ; We enter here with hl pointing at XX16 and bc = XX15 value
   2+ 8C5C              ; so xx12 = XX15 * XX16 row
   3+ 8C5C              XX12ProcessOneRow:
   4+ 8C5C              XX12CalcXCell:
   5+ 8C5C ED 4B 79 C0          ld		bc,(UBnkXScaled)
   6+ 8C60 5E           		ld		e,(hl)								    ; get orientation ZX
   7+ 8C61 23           		inc		hl
   8+ 8C62 56           		ld		d,(hl)                                  ; so now e = xx16 value d = xx16 sign
   9+ 8C63 7A           		ld		a,d
  10+ 8C64 A8                   xor     b
  11+ 8C65 E6 80        		and		SignOnly8Bit                            ; a = XX 16 sign
  12+ 8C67 DD 67        		ld		ixh,a								    ; orientation sign to ixh
  13+ 8C69 78           		ld		a,b                                     ; now make bc abs bc
  14+ 8C6A E6 7F        		and		SignMask8Bit
  15+ 8C6C 47           		ld		b,a                                     ; bc = abs(bc) now
  16+ 8C6D E5           		push	hl
  17+ 8C6E 16 00                ld      d,0                                     ; d = value
  18+ 8C70 60           		ld		h,b
  19+ 8C71 69           		ld		l,c
  20+ 8C72 CD 6E A5     		call	mulDEbyHL							    ; hl = |orientation| * |x pos)
  21+ 8C75 22 53 8C     		ld		(XX12PVarResult1),hl				    ; T = 16 bit result, we only want to use high byte later
  22+ 8C78 DD 7C        		ld		a,ixh
  23+ 8C7A 32 5A 8C     		ld		(XX12PVarSign1),a					    ; S = sign  not sign 1 and 2 are reversed in memory so that fetchign back will put 1 in high byte 2 in low byte
  24+ 8C7D E1           		pop		hl
  25+ 8C7E              XX12CalcYCell:
  26+ 8C7E ED 4B 7B C0          ld		bc,(UBnkYScaled)
  27+ 8C82 23           		inc		hl
  28+ 8C83 5E           		ld		e,(hl)							    	; get orientation ZX
  29+ 8C84 23           		inc		hl
  30+ 8C85 56           		ld		d,(hl)
  31+ 8C86 7A           		ld		a,d
  32+ 8C87 A8                   xor     b
  33+ 8C88 E6 80        		and		SignOnly8Bit
  34+ 8C8A DD 67        		ld		ixh,a								    ; XX16 orientation sign to ixh
  35+ 8C8C 78           		ld		a,b                                     ; now make bc abs bc
  36+ 8C8D E6 7F        		and		SignMask8Bit
  37+ 8C8F 47           		ld		b,a                                     ; bc = abs(bc) now
  38+ 8C90 E5           		push	hl
  39+ 8C91 16 00                ld      d,0                                     ; d = value
  40+ 8C93 60           		ld		h,b
  41+ 8C94 69           		ld		l,c
  42+ 8C95 CD 6E A5     		call	mulDEbyHL							    ; hl = |orientation| * |x pos)
  43+ 8C98 22 55 8C     		ld		(XX12PVarResult2),hl				    ; T = 16 bit result
  44+ 8C9B DD 7C        		ld		a,ixh
  45+ 8C9D 32 59 8C     		ld		(XX12PVarSign2),a					    ; S = sign
  46+ 8CA0 E1           		pop		hl
  47+ 8CA1              XX12CalcZCell:
  48+ 8CA1 ED 4B 7D C0          ld		bc,(UBnkZScaled)
  49+ 8CA5 23           		inc		hl
  50+ 8CA6 5E           		ld		e,(hl)								    ; get orientation ZX
  51+ 8CA7 23           		inc		hl
  52+ 8CA8 56           		ld		d,(hl)
  53+ 8CA9 7A           		ld		a,d
  54+ 8CAA A8                   xor     b
  55+ 8CAB E6 80        		and		SignOnly8Bit
  56+ 8CAD DD 67        		ld		ixh,a								    ; orientation sign to ixh
  57+ 8CAF 78           		ld		a,b                                     ; now make bc abs bc
  58+ 8CB0 E6 7F        		and		SignMask8Bit
  59+ 8CB2 47           		ld		b,a                                     ; bc = abs(bc) now
  60+ 8CB3 16 00                ld      d,0                                     ; d = value
  61+ 8CB5 60           		ld		h,b
  62+ 8CB6 69           		ld		l,c
  63+ 8CB7 CD 6E A5     		call	mulDEbyHL							    ; hl = |orientation| * |x pos)
  64+ 8CBA 22 57 8C     		ld		(XX12PVarResult3),hl				    ; T = 16 bit result
  65+ 8CBD DD 7C        		ld		a,ixh
  66+ 8CBF 32 5B 8C     		ld		(XX12PVarSign3),a					    ; S = sign
  67+ 8CC2              XX12CalcCellResult:
  68+ 8CC2 2A 53 8C     		ld		hl,(XX12PVarResult1)				    ; X Cell Result
  69+ 8CC5 ED 5B 55 8C  		ld		de,(XX12PVarResult2)				    ; Y Cell Result
  70+ 8CC9 ED 4B 59 8C  		ld		bc,(XX12PVarSign2)					    ; b = var 1 result sign c = var 2 result signs
  71+ 8CCD              XX12MSBOnly:
  72+ 8CCD 6C           		ld		l,h									    ; now move results into lower byte so / 256
  73+ 8CCE 5A           		ld		e,d									    ; for both results
  74+ 8CCF AF           		xor		a									    ;
  75+ 8CD0 67           		ld		h,a									    ;
  76+ 8CD1 57           		ld		d,a									    ; so set high byte to 0
  77+ 8CD2 CD CD AA     		call	ADDHLDESignBC                           ;  XX12ProcessCalcHLPlusDESignBC		; returns with HL = result1 + result 2 signed in a
  78+ 8CD5 47           		ld		b,a									    ; move sign into b ready for next calc
  79+ 8CD6 3A 5B 8C     		ld		a,(XX12PVarSign3)					    ; result of the calcZ cell
  80+ 8CD9 4F           		ld		c,a									    ; goes into c to align with DE
  81+ 8CDA ED 5B 57 8C  		ld		de,(XX12PVarResult3)				    ; now add result to Result 3
  82+ 8CDE 5A           		ld		e,d                                     ; d = result /256
  83+ 8CDF 16 00        		ld		d,0									    ; and only us high byte
  84+ 8CE1 CD CD AA     		call	ADDHLDESignBC; XX12ProcessCalcHLPlusDESignBC		; returns with HL = result and a = sign
  85+ 8CE4 C9           		ret											    ; hl = result, a = sign
  86+ 8CE5              								    ; hl = result, a = sign
  87+ 8CE5
  88+ 8CE5              XX12EquNodeDotTransMat:							    ; .LL51	\ -> &4832 \ XX12=XX15.XX16  each vector is 16-bit x,y,z **** ACTUALLY XX16 is value in low sign bit in high
  89+ 8CE5              ;...X cell
  90+ 8CE5 21 4C C0     		ld		hl,UbnkTransInvRow0x0     			; process orientation matrix row 0
  91+ 8CE8 CD 5C 8C             call    XX12ProcessOneRow                   ; hl = result, a = sign
  92+ 8CEB 47           		ld		b,a                                 ; b = sign
  93+ 8CEC 7C           		ld		a,h                                 ; a = high byte
  94+ 8CED B0           		or		b
  95+ 8CEE 32 80 C0     		ld		(UBnkXX12xSign),a					; a = result with sign in bit 7
  96+ 8CF1 7D           		ld		a,l                                 ; the result will be in the lower byte now
  97+ 8CF2 32 7F C0             ld      (UBnkXX12xLo),a						; that is result done for
  98+ 8CF5              ;...Y cell
  99+ 8CF5 21 54 C0     		ld		hl,UbnkTransInvRow1y0     			; process orientation matrix row 1
 100+ 8CF8 CD 5C 8C             call    XX12ProcessOneRow
 101+ 8CFB 47           		ld		b,a
 102+ 8CFC 7C           		ld		a,h
 103+ 8CFD              ;		ld		a,l
 104+ 8CFD B0           		or		b
 105+ 8CFE 32 82 C0     		ld		(UBnkXX12ySign),a					; a = result with sign in bit 7
 106+ 8D01 7D           		ld		a,l                                 ; the result will be in the lower byte now
 107+ 8D02 32 81 C0             ld      (UBnkXX12yLo),a						; that is result done for
 108+ 8D05              ;...Z cell
 109+ 8D05 21 5C C0     		ld		hl,UbnkTransInvRow2z0     			; process orientation matrix row 1
 110+ 8D08 CD 5C 8C             call    XX12ProcessOneRow
 111+ 8D0B 47           		ld		b,a
 112+ 8D0C 7C                   ld		a,h
 113+ 8D0D              ;		ld		a,l
 114+ 8D0D B0           		or		b
 115+ 8D0E 32 84 C0     		ld		(UBnkXX12zSign),a					; a = result with sign in bit 7
 116+ 8D11 7D           		ld		a,l                                 ; the result will be in the lower byte now
 117+ 8D12 32 83 C0             ld      (UBnkXX12zLo),a						; that is result done for
 118+ 8D15 C9                   ret
 119+ 8D16
 120+ 8D16              XX12EquNodeDotOrientation:							; .LL51	\ -> &4832 \ XX12=XX15.XX16  each vector is 16-bit x,y,z **** ACTUALLY XX16 is value in low sign bit in high
 121+ 8D16              ;...X cell
 122+ 8D16 21 4C C0     		ld		hl,UbnkTransInvRow0x0     			; process orientation matrix row 0
 123+ 8D19 CD 5C 8C             call    XX12ProcessOneRow                   ; hl = result, a = sign
 124+ 8D1C 47           		ld		b,a                                 ; b = sign
 125+ 8D1D 7C           		ld		a,h                                 ; a = high byte
 126+ 8D1E B0           		or		b
 127+ 8D1F 32 80 C0     		ld		(UBnkXX12xSign),a					; a = result with sign in bit 7
 128+ 8D22 7D           		ld		a,l                                 ; the result will be in the lower byte now
 129+ 8D23 32 7F C0             ld      (UBnkXX12xLo),a						; that is result done for
 130+ 8D26              ;...Y cell
 131+ 8D26 21 54 C0     		ld		hl,UbnkTransInvRow1y0     			; process orientation matrix row 1
 132+ 8D29 CD 5C 8C             call    XX12ProcessOneRow
 133+ 8D2C 47           		ld		b,a
 134+ 8D2D 7C           		ld		a,h
 135+ 8D2E              ;		ld		a,l
 136+ 8D2E B0           		or		b
 137+ 8D2F 32 82 C0     		ld		(UBnkXX12ySign),a					; a = result with sign in bit 7
 138+ 8D32 7D           		ld		a,l                                 ; the result will be in the lower byte now
 139+ 8D33 32 81 C0             ld      (UBnkXX12yLo),a						; that is result done for
 140+ 8D36              ;...Z cell
 141+ 8D36 21 5C C0     		ld		hl,UbnkTransInvRow2z0     			; process orientation matrix row 1
 142+ 8D39 CD 5C 8C             call    XX12ProcessOneRow
 143+ 8D3C 47           		ld		b,a
 144+ 8D3D 7C                   ld		a,h
 145+ 8D3E              ;		ld		a,l
 146+ 8D3E B0           		or		b
 147+ 8D3F 32 84 C0     		ld		(UBnkXX12zSign),a					; a = result with sign in bit 7
 148+ 8D42 7D           		ld		a,l                                 ; the result will be in the lower byte now
 149+ 8D43 32 83 C0             ld      (UBnkXX12zLo),a						; that is result done for
 150+ 8D46 C9                   ret
 151+ 8D47
 152+ 8D47              XX12EquNodeDotXX16:					         		; .LL51	\ -> &4832 \ XX12=XX15.XX16  each vector is 16-bit x,y,z **** ACTUALLY XX16 is value in low sign bit in high
 153+ 8D47              ;...X cell
 154+ 8D47 21 34 C0     		ld		hl,UBnkTransmatSidevX     			; process orientation matrix row 0
 155+ 8D4A CD 5C 8C             call    XX12ProcessOneRow                   ; hl = result, a = sign
 156+ 8D4D 47           		ld		b,a                                 ; b = sign
 157+ 8D4E 7C           		ld		a,h                                 ; a = high byte
 158+ 8D4F B0           		or		b
 159+ 8D50 32 80 C0     		ld		(UBnkXX12xSign),a					; a = result with sign in bit 7
 160+ 8D53 7D           		ld		a,l                                 ; the result will be in the lower byte now
 161+ 8D54 32 7F C0             ld      (UBnkXX12xLo),a						; that is result done for
 162+ 8D57              ;...Y cell
 163+ 8D57 21 3A C0     		ld		hl,UBnkTransmatRoofvX     			; process orientation matrix row 1
 164+ 8D5A CD 5C 8C             call    XX12ProcessOneRow
 165+ 8D5D 47           		ld		b,a
 166+ 8D5E 7C           		ld		a,h
 167+ 8D5F              ;		ld		a,l
 168+ 8D5F B0           		or		b
 169+ 8D60 32 82 C0     		ld		(UBnkXX12ySign),a					; a = result with sign in bit 7
 170+ 8D63 7D           		ld		a,l                                 ; the result will be in the lower byte now
 171+ 8D64 32 81 C0             ld      (UBnkXX12yLo),a						; that is result done for
 172+ 8D67              ;...Z cell
 173+ 8D67 21 40 C0     		ld		hl,UBnkTransmatNosevX     			; process orientation matrix row 1
 174+ 8D6A CD 5C 8C             call    XX12ProcessOneRow
 175+ 8D6D 47           		ld		b,a
 176+ 8D6E 7C                   ld		a,h
 177+ 8D6F              ;		ld		a,l
 178+ 8D6F B0           		or		b
 179+ 8D70 32 84 C0     		ld		(UBnkXX12zSign),a					; a = result with sign in bit 7
 180+ 8D73 7D           		ld		a,l                                 ; the result will be in the lower byte now
 181+ 8D74 32 83 C0             ld      (UBnkXX12zLo),a						; that is result done for
 182+ 8D77 C9                   ret
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/XX12EquNodeDotOrientation.asm
 954  8D78                  include "ModelRender/CopyXX12ToXX15.asm"

   1+ 8D78 21 7F C0     CopyXX12ToXX15:         ld      hl,XX12

 956  8DF0                  include "./Maths/Utilities/ScaleXX16Matrix197.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/ScaleXX16Matrix197.asm
   1+ 8DF0              ScaleXX16Matrix197:
   2+ 8DF0 06 09        	ld		b,9                 ; Interate though all 9 matrix elements
   3+ 8DF2 0E C5        	ld		c,ConstNorm         ; c = 197
   4+ 8DF4 21 34 C0     	ld		hl,UBnkTransmatSidev ; within XX16 (transmat)
   5+ 8DF7              .ScaleXX16Loop:
   6+ 8DF7 7E           	ld		a,(hl)              ; set DE = matrix value
   7+ 8DF8 5F           	ld		e,a                 ;
   8+ 8DF9 23           	inc		hl                  ;
   9+ 8DFA 7E           	ld		a,(hl)              ;
  10+ 8DFB 57           	ld		d,a                 ;
  11+ 8DFC E6 80            and     SignOnly8Bit        ; A holds high still to we can strip out sign bit
  12+ 8DFE DD 6F        	ld		ixl,a				; retain for sign bit
  13+ 8E00              	ShiftDELeft1				; carry now holds sign bit and DE = De * 2, this will in effect strip off the sign bit automatically
  13+ 8E00 CB 23       >			   sla e
  13+ 8E02 CB 12       >			   rl  d
  14+ 8E04 7A               ld      a,d                 ; a = high byte after x 2
  15+ 8E05 C5           	push	bc                  ; save BC  counter and constant 197
  16+ 8E06 E5           	push	hl                  ; save HL
  17+ 8E07 CD CC A6     	call	DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC	; result in BC = A*256 / 197 or D *512 / 197 = 2.6 * vector element, effectivley the result will always be in c
  18+ 8E0A E1           	pop		hl
  19+ 8E0B 2B               dec     hl                  ; move back to low byte
  20+ 8E0C 71               ld      (hl),c              ; save result in low byte as we want to preserve high byte sign
  21+ 8E0D 23               inc     hl                  ; move back to high byte
  22+ 8E0E              ;    ld      a,(hl)
  23+ 8E0E              ;    and     $80
  24+ 8E0E DD 7D            ld      a,ixl
  25+ 8E10 77               ld      (hl),a              ; write back just sign bit
  26+ 8E11 C1           	pop		bc                  ; retrieve both counter and constant 197
  27+ 8E12 23               inc     hl                  ; no to next vertex value
  28+ 8E13 10 E2        	djnz	.ScaleXX16Loop
  29+ 8E15 C9           	ret
  30+ 8E16
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/ScaleXX16Matrix197.asm
 957  8E16
 958  8E16                  include "./Universe/StarRoutines.asm"
# file opened: ./Universe/StarRoutines.asm
   1+ 8E16              ;note: DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC as per
   2+ 8E16              ;                                   BC = A0
   3+ 8E16              ;                                   DE = 0C
   4+ 8E16              ;                                   so BC = a * 256 / C
   5+ 8E16
   6+ 8E16              ; We can cheat here, Speed is always 0 or positive
   7+ 8E16              ; z postion will always be positive if we can see it
   8+ 8E16
   9+ 8E16 EB           InitStarAtHL:           ex      de,hl
  10+ 8E17 CD 6C 99                             call    doRND
  11+ 8E1A EB                                   ex      de,hl
  12+ 8E1B F6 08                                or      8
  13+ 8E1D 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  14+ 8E1E E6 7F                                and     $7F
  15+ 8E20 23                                   inc     hl
  16+ 8E21 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  17+ 8E22 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  18+ 8E23 CD 6C 99                             call    doRND
  19+ 8E26 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  20+ 8E27 0F                                   rrca
  21+ 8E28 E6 80                                and     $80
  22+ 8E2A B6                                   or      (hl)
  23+ 8E2B 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  24+ 8E2C 23                                   inc     hl
  25+ 8E2D EB                                   ex      de,hl
  26+ 8E2E CD 6C 99                             call    doRND
  27+ 8E31 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  28+ 8E32 F6 04                                or      4
  29+ 8E34 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  30+ 8E35 23                                   inc     hl
  31+ 8E36 E6 7F                                and     $7F
  32+ 8E38 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  33+ 8E39 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  34+ 8E3A CD 6C 99                             call    doRND
  35+ 8E3D EB                                   ex      de,hl
  36+ 8E3E 0F                                   rrca
  37+ 8E3F E6 80                                and     $80
  38+ 8E41 B6                                   or      (hl)
  39+ 8E42 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  40+ 8E43 23                                   inc     hl
  41+ 8E44 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  42+ 8E45 CD 6C 99                             call    doRND
  43+ 8E48 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  44+ 8E49 F6 90                                or      144
  45+ 8E4B 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  46+ 8E4C 23                                   inc     hl
  47+ 8E4D F6 70                                or      %01110000
  48+ 8E4F E6 7F                                and     $7f     ; bodge
  49+ 8E51 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  50+ 8E52 23                                   inc     hl
  51+ 8E53 C9                                   ret
  52+ 8E54
  53+ 8E54 EB           InitHyperStarAtHL:      ex      de,hl
  54+ 8E55 CD 6C 99                             call    doRND
  55+ 8E58 CB 27                                sla     a
  56+ 8E5A CB 27                                sla     a                ; so its * 4 as we have a blank spot
  57+ 8E5C EB                                   ex      de,hl
  58+ 8E5D E6 F8                                and     %11111000
  59+ 8E5F 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  60+ 8E60 E6 7F                                and     $7F
  61+ 8E62 23                                   inc     hl
  62+ 8E63 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  63+ 8E64 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  64+ 8E65 CD 6C 99                             call    doRND
  65+ 8E68 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  66+ 8E69 0F                                   rrca
  67+ 8E6A E6 80                                and     $80
  68+ 8E6C B6                                   or      (hl)
  69+ 8E6D 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  70+ 8E6E 23                                   inc     hl
  71+ 8E6F EB                                   ex      de,hl
  72+ 8E70 CD 6C 99                             call    doRND
  73+ 8E73 CB 27                                sla     a
  74+ 8E75 CB 27                                sla     a               ; so its * 4 as we have a blank spot
  75+ 8E77 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  76+ 8E78 E6 F8                                and     %11111000
  77+ 8E7A 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  78+ 8E7B 23                                   inc     hl
  79+ 8E7C E6 7F                                and     $7F
  80+ 8E7E 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  81+ 8E7F EB                                   ex      de,hl
  82+ 8E80 CD 6C 99                             call    doRND
  83+ 8E83 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  84+ 8E84 0F                                   rrca
  85+ 8E85 E6 80                                and     $80
  86+ 8E87 B6                                   or      (hl)
  87+ 8E88 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  88+ 8E89 23                                   inc     hl
  89+ 8E8A EB                                   ex      de,hl
  90+ 8E8B CD 6C 99                             call    doRND
  91+ 8E8E EB                                   ex      de,hl
  92+ 8E8F F6 5F                                or      95
  93+ 8E91 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  94+ 8E92 23                                   inc     hl
  95+ 8E93 F6 70                                or      %01110000
  96+ 8E95 E6 7F                                and     $7f     ; bodge
  97+ 8E97 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  98+ 8E98 23                                   inc     hl
  99+ 8E99 C9                                   ret
 100+ 8E9A
 101+ 8E9A              ; we could cheat, flip the sign of DE and just add but its not very optimised
 102+ 8E9A 7C           StarsSUBHLDESigned:     ld      a,h
 103+ 8E9B E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 104+ 8E9D 47                                   ld      b,a                         ;save sign bit in b
 105+ 8E9E AA                                   xor     d                           ;if h sign and d sign were different then bit 7 of a will be 1 which means
 106+ 8E9F                                      JumpIfNegative .SUBHLDEOppSGN        ;Signs are opposite therefore we can add
 106+ 8E9F FA CD 8E    >                        jp		m, .SUBHLDEOppSGN
 107+ 8EA2 78           .SUBHLDESameSigns:      ld      a,b
 108+ 8EA3 B2                                   or      d
 109+ 8EA4                                      JumpIfNegative .SUBHLDESameNeg       ; optimisation so we can just do simple add if both positive
 109+ 8EA4 FA AE 8E    >                        jp		m, .SUBHLDESameNeg
 110+ 8EA7 B7                                   or      a
 111+ 8EA8 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
 112+ 8EAA                                      JumpIfNegative .SUBHLDESameOvrFlw
 112+ 8EAA FA C1 8E    >                        jp		m, .SUBHLDESameOvrFlw
 113+ 8EAD C9                                   ret
 114+ 8EAE 7C           .SUBHLDESameNeg:        ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
 115+ 8EAF E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
 116+ 8EB1 67                                   ld      h,a
 117+ 8EB2 7A                                   ld      a,d
 118+ 8EB3 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 119+ 8EB5 57                                   ld      d,a
 120+ 8EB6 B7                                   or      a
 121+ 8EB7 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
 122+ 8EB9                                      JumpIfNegative .SUBHLDESameOvrFlw
 122+ 8EB9 FA C1 8E    >                        jp		m, .SUBHLDESameOvrFlw
 123+ 8EBC 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; now set bit for negative value, we won't bother with overflow for now TODO
 124+ 8EBD F6 80                                or      SignOnly8Bit
 125+ 8EBF 67                                   ld      h,a
 126+ 8EC0 C9                                   ret
 127+ 8EC1              .SUBHLDESameOvrFlw:     NegHL
 127+ 8EC1 AF          >                    xor a
 127+ 8EC2 95          >                    sub l
 127+ 8EC3 6F          >                    ld l,a
 127+ 8EC4 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 127+ 8EC5 94          >                    sub h
 127+ 8EC6 67          >                    ld h,a
 128+ 8EC7 78                                   ld      a,b
 129+ 8EC8 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign bit
 130+ 8ECA B4                                   or      h
 131+ 8ECB 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; recover sign
 132+ 8ECC C9                                   ret
 133+ 8ECD B7           .SUBHLDEOppSGN:         or      a
 134+ 8ECE 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
 135+ 8ECF E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
 136+ 8ED1 67                                   ld      h,a
 137+ 8ED2 7A                                   ld      a,d
 138+ 8ED3 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 139+ 8ED5 57                                   ld      d,a
 140+ 8ED6 19                                   add     hl,de
 141+ 8ED7 78                                   ld      a,b                         ; we got here so hl > de therefore we can just take hl's previous sign bit
 142+ 8ED8 B4                                   or      h
 143+ 8ED9 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; set the previou sign value
 144+ 8EDA C9                                   ret
 145+ 8EDB
 146+ 8EDB 7C           StarsADDHLDESigned:     ld      a,h
 147+ 8EDC E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 148+ 8EDE 47                                   ld      b,a                         ;save sign bit in b
 149+ 8EDF AA                                   xor     d                           ;if h sign and d sign were different then bit 7 of a will be 1 which means
 150+ 8EE0                                      JumpIfNegative .ADDHLDEOppSGN        ;Signs are opposite there fore we can subtract to get difference
 150+ 8EE0 FA F8 8E    >                        jp		m, .ADDHLDEOppSGN
 151+ 8EE3 78           .ADDHLDESameSigns:      ld      a,b
 152+ 8EE4 B2                                   or      d
 153+ 8EE5                                      JumpIfNegative .ADDHLDESameNeg       ; optimisation so we can just do simple add if both positive
 153+ 8EE5 FA EA 8E    >                        jp		m, .ADDHLDESameNeg
 154+ 8EE8 19                                   add     hl,de
 155+ 8EE9 C9                                   ret
 156+ 8EEA 7C           .ADDHLDESameNeg:        ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
 157+ 8EEB E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
 158+ 8EED 67                                   ld      h,a
 159+ 8EEE 7A                                   ld      a,d
 160+ 8EEF E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 161+ 8EF1 57                                   ld      d,a
 162+ 8EF2 19                                   add     hl,de
 163+ 8EF3 3E 80                                ld      a,SignOnly8Bit
 164+ 8EF5 B4                                   or      h                           ; now set bit for negative value, we won't bother with overflow for now TODO
 165+ 8EF6 67                                   ld      h,a
 166+ 8EF7 C9                                   ret
 167+ 8EF8 7C           .ADDHLDEOppSGN:         ld      a,h                         ; here HL and DE are opposite  so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
 168+ 8EF9 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
 169+ 8EFB 67                                   ld      h,a
 170+ 8EFC 7A                                   ld      a,d
 171+ 8EFD E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 172+ 8EFF 57                                   ld      d,a
 173+ 8F00 B7                                   or      a
 174+ 8F01 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
 175+ 8F03 38 04                                jr      c,.ADDHLDEOppInvert
 176+ 8F05 78           .ADDHLDEOppSGNNoCarry:  ld      a,b                         ; we got here so hl > de therefore we can just take hl's previous sign bit
 177+ 8F06 B4                                   or      h
 178+ 8F07 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; set the previou sign value
 179+ 8F08 C9                                   ret
 180+ 8F09              .ADDHLDEOppInvert:      NegHL
 180+ 8F09 AF          >                    xor a
 180+ 8F0A 95          >                    sub l
 180+ 8F0B 6F          >                    ld l,a
 180+ 8F0C 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 180+ 8F0D 94          >                    sub h
 180+ 8F0E 67          >                    ld h,a
 181+ 8F0F 78                                   ld      a,b
 182+ 8F10 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign bit
 183+ 8F12 B4                                   or      h
 184+ 8F13 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; recover sign
 185+ 8F14 C9                                   ret
 186+ 8F15              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 187+ 8F15 06 0B        InitialiseStars:        ld      b,MaxNumberOfStars
 188+ 8F17 78                                   ld      a,b
 189+ 8F18 32 EF 95                             ld      (NumberOfStarsNOSTM),a
 190+ 8F1B 21 3C 97                             ld      hl,varDust
 191+ 8F1E CD 16 8E     .InitStarsLoop:         call    InitStarAtHL
 192+ 8F21 10 FB                                djnz    .InitStarsLoop
 193+ 8F23 C9                                   ret
 194+ 8F24              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 195+ 8F24 06 0B        InitialiseHyperStars:   ld      b,MaxNumberOfStars
 196+ 8F26 78                                   ld      a,b
 197+ 8F27 32 EF 95                             ld      (NumberOfStarsNOSTM),a
 198+ 8F2A 21 3C 97                             ld      hl,varDust
 199+ 8F2D CD 54 8E     .InitStarsLoop:         call    InitHyperStarAtHL
 200+ 8F30 10 FB                                djnz    .InitStarsLoop
 201+ 8F32 C9                                   ret
 202+ 8F33              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 203+ 8F33              DustForward:            ; break
 204+ 8F33 3A EF 95                             ld      a,(NumberOfStarsNOSTM)
 205+ 8F36 47                                   ld      b,a                                 ; get the number of stars to process
 206+ 8F37 FD 21 3C 97                          ld      iy,varDust                          ; hl is now a pointer to the dust array
 207+ 8F3B C5           StarProcessLoop:        push    bc                                  ; save counter +1
 208+ 8F3C FD 7E 05     .Qequ64XSpeedDivZHi:    ld      a,(iy+5)
 209+ 8F3F 5F                                   ld      e,a
 210+ 8F40 16 00                                ld      d,0                                 ; de = zhi/256
 211+ 8F42 3A CE 94                             ld      a,(DELTA)
 212+ 8F45 FE 00                                cp      0
 213+ 8F47 20 01                                jr      nz,.NormalSpeed
 214+ 8F49 3C                                   inc     a                                   ; so the is at lest some dust movement
 215+ 8F4A 47           .NormalSpeed:           ld      b,a
 216+ 8F4B 0E 00                                ld      c,0                                 ; bc = delta * 256
 217+ 8F4D CD 40 A7                             call    BC_Div_DE                           ; BC = BC.DE , HL = remainder
 218+ 8F50                                      ShiftHLRight1
 218+ 8F50 CB 3C       >			   srl h
 218+ 8F52 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 219+ 8F54                                      ShiftHLRight1                               ; hl = remainder/2 so now 64 * speed / zhi
 219+ 8F54 CB 3C       >			   srl h
 219+ 8F56 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 220+ 8F58 7D                                   ld      a,l                                 ;
 221+ 8F59 F6 01                                or      1                                   ; so ensure A is at least 1 for ambient movement
 222+ 8F5B DD 6F                                ld      ixl,a                               ; preserve A which is also VarQ = 64 * speed / zhi
 223+ 8F5D FD 6E 04 FD  .ZequZMinusSpeedX64:    ld      hl,(iy+4)                           ; hl = z
 223+ 8F61 66 05
 224+ 8F63 ED 5B CF 94                          ld      de, (DELTA4)                         ; de = delta4 i.e. speed * 64 pre computed
 225+ 8F67 CD 9A 8E                             call    StarsSUBHLDESigned
 226+ 8F6A                                      JumpOnBitSet h,7,ResetStar
 226+ 8F6A CB 7C       >                        bit 	7,h
 226+ 8F6C C2 C1 90    >                        jp      nz,ResetStar
 227+ 8F6F FD 75 04 FD                          ld      (iy+4),hl
 227+ 8F73 74 05
 228+ 8F75 FD 6E 00 FD  .XEquXPlusXhiMulQ       ld      hl,(iy+0)                           ; hl  = x
 228+ 8F79 66 01
 229+ 8F7B 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ;
 230+ 8F7C E6 7F                                and     $7F                                 ;
 231+ 8F7E 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; d = abs(x hi)
 232+ 8F7F DD 5D                                ld      e,ixl                               ; e = Q = 64 * speed / zhi
 233+ 8F81 ED 30                                mul                                         ; de =  abs(x hi) * Q
 234+ 8F83 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ;
 235+ 8F84 E6 80                                and     $80                                 ;
 236+ 8F86 B2                                   or      d                                   ; set sign bit in d
 237+ 8F87 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ;
 238+ 8F88 CD DB 8E                             call    StarsADDHLDESigned                  ; x = x + (x hi/256 * Q)
 239+ 8F8B 7C                                   ld      a,h
 240+ 8F8C E6 7F                                and     $7F
 241+ 8F8E                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $70, ResetStar
 241+ 8F8E FE 70       >                        cp     $70
 241+ 8F90 D2 C1 90    >                        jp		nc,ResetStar
 242+ 8F93 FD 75 00 FD                          ld      (iy+0),hl                           ;
 242+ 8F97 74 01
 243+ 8F99 FD 6E 02 FD  .YEquYPlusYhiMulQ       ld      hl,(iy+2)                           ; hl  = y
 243+ 8F9D 66 03
 244+ 8F9F 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ;
 245+ 8FA0 E6 7F                                and     $7F                                 ;
 246+ 8FA2 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; d = abs(y hi)
 247+ 8FA3 DD 5D                                ld      e,ixl                               ; e = Q = 64 * speed / zhi
 248+ 8FA5 ED 30                                mul                                         ; de =  abs(y hi) * Q
 249+ 8FA7 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ;
 250+ 8FA8 E6 80                                and     $80                                 ;
 251+ 8FAA B2                                   or      d                                   ; set sign bit in d
 252+ 8FAB 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ;
 253+ 8FAC CD DB 8E                             call    StarsADDHLDESigned                  ; y = y + (x hi/256 * Q)
 254+ 8FAF 7C                                   ld      a,h
 255+ 8FB0 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 256+ 8FB2                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $60, ResetStar
 256+ 8FB2 FE 60       >                        cp     $60
 256+ 8FB4 D2 C1 90    >                        jp		nc,ResetStar
 257+ 8FB7 7C                                   ld      a,h
 258+ 8FB8 E6 80                                and     $80
 259+ 8FBA 20 06                                jr      nz,.NoSecondCheck
 260+ 8FBC 7C                                   ld      a,h
 261+ 8FBD                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $20, ResetStar
 261+ 8FBD FE 20       >                        cp     $20
 261+ 8FBF D2 C1 90    >                        jp		nc,ResetStar
 262+ 8FC2 FD 75 02 FD  .NoSecondCheck:         ld      (iy+2),hl                           ;
 262+ 8FC6 74 03
 263+ 8FC8              ; Now roll
 264+ 8FC8              ;  6. x = x - alpha * y / 256
 265+ 8FC8 2A 8F 94     .XRoll:                 ld      hl,(ALP1)                           ; h = sign, l = magnitude
 266+ 8FCB 7D                                   ld      a,l
 267+ 8FCC FE 00                                cp      0
 268+ 8FCE 28 4C                                jr      z,.NoRoll                           ; don;t roll if magnitude is 0
 269+ 8FD0                                      ;break
 270+ 8FD0                                      ;ld      a,$80
 271+ 8FD0                                      ;xor     l                                   ; l = flipped sign as we are rotating stars not us
 272+ 8FD0 E5                                   push    hl
 273+ 8FD1 7C                                   ld      a,h
 274+ 8FD2 E6 80                                and     $80
 275+ 8FD4 4F           .rxSaveAlphaSign:       ld      c,a                                 ; save alpha sign in c
 276+ 8FD5 55           .rxDEquABSAlpha:        ld      d,l                                 ; d= abs (alpha)
 277+ 8FD6 FD 7E 03                             ld      a,(iy+3)                            ; get high byte from x coord
 278+ 8FD9 5F                                   ld      e,a
 279+ 8FDA E6 80                                and     $80
 280+ 8FDC 47           .rxBEquSignXHi:         ld      b,a                                 ; save sign of x in b
 281+ 8FDD 7B           .rxEEquABSignX:         ld      a,e
 282+ 8FDE E6 7F                                and     $7F
 283+ 8FE0 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; save abs x hi in e
 284+ 8FE1 ED 30                                mul                                         ; abs(alpha) * abs(y high) (so /256)
 285+ 8FE3 79                                   ld      a,c
 286+ 8FE4 A8                                   xor     b                                   ; handle muliple sign bits
 287+ 8FE5 B2                                   or      d
 288+ 8FE6 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; de = signed alpha & y high / 256
 289+ 8FE7 FD 6E 00 FD                          ld      hl,(iy+0)                           ; h = iy+1, l = iy+0
 289+ 8FEB 66 01
 290+ 8FED CD 9A 8E                             call    StarsSUBHLDESigned                  ; we are usign add, so may need to fip sign?
 291+ 8FF0 FD 75 00 FD                          ld      (iy+0),hl
 291+ 8FF4 74 01
 292+ 8FF6              ;  5. y = y + alpha * x / 256
 293+ 8FF6              .YRoll:                 ;break
 294+ 8FF6 E1                                   pop     hl                                  ; h = sign, l = magnitude
 295+ 8FF7 7C                                   ld      a,h
 296+ 8FF8 E6 80                                and     $80
 297+ 8FFA 4F           .rySaveAlphaSign:       ld      c,a                                 ; save alpha sign in c
 298+ 8FFB 55           .ryDEquABSAlpha:        ld      d,l                                 ; d= abs (alpha)
 299+ 8FFC FD 7E 01                             ld      a,(iy+1)                            ; get high byte from x coord
 300+ 8FFF 5F                                   ld      e,a
 301+ 9000 E6 80                                and     $80
 302+ 9002 47           .ryBEquSignXHi:         ld      b,a                                 ; save sign of x in b
 303+ 9003 7B           .ryEEquABSignX:         ld      a,e
 304+ 9004 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 305+ 9006 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; save abs x hi in e
 306+ 9007 ED 30                                mul                                         ; abs(alpha) * abs(y high) (so /256)
 307+ 9009 79                                   ld      a,c
 308+ 900A A8                                   xor     b                                   ; handle muliple sign bits
 309+ 900B B2                                   or      d
 310+ 900C 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; de = signed alpha & y high / 256
 311+ 900D FD 6E 02 FD                          ld      hl,(iy+2)                           ; h = iy+1, l = iy+0
 311+ 9011 66 03
 312+ 9013 CD DB 8E                             call    StarsADDHLDESigned                  ; we are usign add, so may need to fip sign?
 313+ 9016 FD 75 02 FD                          ld      (iy+2),hl
 313+ 901A 74 03
 314+ 901C 3A 7F 94     .NoRoll:                ld      a,(BET1)
 315+ 901F FE 00                                cp      0
 316+ 9021 28 22                                jr      z,.NoPitch
 317+ 9023              ;  8. y = y - beta * 256
 318+ 9023 57           .YPitch:                ld      d,a                                 ; d = BET1
 319+ 9024 FD 7E 02                             ld      a,(iy+2)
 320+ 9027 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; e = Y HI
 321+ 9028 ED 30                                mul                                         ; de = BET1 * YHi so now D = BETA & YHI / 256
 322+ 902A 5F                                   ld      e,a
 323+ 902B ED 30                                mul                                         ; so now de = (BETA & Yhi) ^ 2
 324+ 902D                                      ShiftDELeft1                                ; de = 2 * ((BETA & Yhi) ^ 2)
 324+ 902D CB 23       >			   sla e
 324+ 902F CB 12       >			   rl  d
 325+ 9031 3A 81 94                             ld      a,(BET2FLIP)                        ; get inverted Sign
 326+ 9034 B2                                   or      d
 327+ 9035 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; de = - (2 * ((BETA & Yhi) ^ 2))
 328+ 9036 FD 6E 02 FD                          ld      hl,(iy+2)
 328+ 903A 66 03
 329+ 903C CD DB 8E                             call    StarsADDHLDESigned
 330+ 903F FD 75 02 FD                          ld      (iy+2),hl
 330+ 9043 74 03
 331+ 9045              ; now work out screen pos
 332+ 9045              ; Note two optimistations, write to layer 2 - we get a free removal via double buffer cls
 333+ 9045              ; read z dept than determine hw many pixesl to plot, e.g. 1,2,3,4
 334+ 9045              ;        pop     de
 335+ 9045               ;       call    ProjectStarXToScreen
 336+ 9045                                      ;pop     de
 337+ 9045              .NoPitch:
 338+ 9045 FD 7E 01     .ProjectStar:           ld      a,(iy+1)
 339+ 9048 6F                                   ld      l,a
 340+ 9049 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 341+ 904B                                      JumpOnBitSet l,7,StarNegXPt
 341+ 904B CB 7D       >                        bit 	7,l
 341+ 904D C2 56 90    >                        jp      nz,StarNegXPt
 342+ 9050 C6 80                                add     a,$80
 343+ 9052 4F                                   ld      c,a
 344+ 9053 C3 5B 90                             jp      StarDoneX
 345+ 9056 47           StarNegXPt:             ld      b,a
 346+ 9057 3E 80                                ld      a,$80
 347+ 9059 90                                   sub     b
 348+ 905A 4F                                   ld      c,a
 349+ 905B FD 7E 03     StarDoneX:              ld      a,(iy+3)
 350+ 905E 6F                                   ld      l,a
 351+ 905F E6 7F                                and     $7F
 352+ 9061                                      JumpOnBitSet l,7,StarNegYPt
 352+ 9061 CB 7D       >                        bit 	7,l
 352+ 9063 C2 6C 90    >                        jp      nz,StarNegYPt
 353+ 9066 C6 60                                add     a,$60
 354+ 9068 47                                   ld      b,a
 355+ 9069 C3 71 90                             jp      StarDoneY
 356+ 906C 47           StarNegYPt:             ld      b,a
 357+ 906D 3E 60                                ld      a,$60
 358+ 906F 90                                   sub     b
 359+ 9070 47                                   ld      b,a
 360+ 9071 3E 92        StarDoneY:              ld      a,L2DustColour
 361+ 9073 C5                                   push    bc
 362+ 9074              .DrawStar:              MMUSelectLayer2
 362+ 9074 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 363+ 9078 CD FF E0                             call    l2_plot_pixel
 364+ 907B FD 7E 05                             ld      a,(iy+5)
 365+ 907E C1                                   pop    bc
 366+ 907F                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $60,EndofStarsLoop
 366+ 907F FE 60       >                        cp     $60
 366+ 9081 D2 B1 90    >                        jp		nc,EndofStarsLoop
 367+ 9084 3E 92                                ld      a,L2DustColour
 368+ 9086 0C                                   inc     c
 369+ 9087 C5                                   push    bc
 370+ 9088                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 370+ 9088 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 371+ 908C CD FF E0                             call    l2_plot_pixel
 372+ 908F FD 7E 05                             ld      a,(iy+5)
 373+ 9092 C1                                   pop    bc
 374+ 9093                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $37,EndofStarsLoop
 374+ 9093 FE 37       >                        cp     $37
 374+ 9095 D2 B1 90    >                        jp		nc,EndofStarsLoop
 375+ 9098 3E 92                                ld      a,L2DustColour
 376+ 909A 04                                   inc     b
 377+ 909B C5                                   push    bc
 378+ 909C                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 378+ 909C ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 379+ 90A0 CD FF E0                             call    l2_plot_pixel
 380+ 90A3 FD 7E 05                             ld      a,(iy+5)
 381+ 90A6 C1                                   pop    bc
 382+ 90A7 3E 92                                ld      a,L2DustColour
 383+ 90A9 0D                                   dec     c
 384+ 90AA                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 384+ 90AA ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 385+ 90AE CD FF E0                             call    l2_plot_pixel
 386+ 90B1 C1           EndofStarsLoop:         pop     bc                                      ;  0
 387+ 90B2 FD E5                                push    iy                                      ; +1
 388+ 90B4 E1                                   pop     hl                                      ;  0
 389+ 90B5 ED 34 06 00                          add     hl,6
 390+ 90B9 E5           NextStarLoop2:          push    hl                                      ; +1
 391+ 90BA FD E1                                pop     iy                                      ;  0
 392+ 90BC 05                                   dec     b
 393+ 90BD C2 3B 8F                             jp      nz,StarProcessLoop
 394+ 90C0 C9                                   ret
 395+ 90C1              ResetStar:              ;break
 396+ 90C1                                      ;pop     de
 397+ 90C1 C1                                   pop     bc                                      ; 0
 398+ 90C2 3A EF 95                             ld      a,(NumberOfStarsNOSTM)
 399+ 90C5 90                                   sub     b
 400+ 90C6 57                                   ld      d,a
 401+ 90C7 1E 06                                ld      e,6
 402+ 90C9 ED 30                                mul
 403+ 90CB 21 3C 97                             ld      hl,varDust
 404+ 90CE 19                                   add     hl,de
 405+ 90CF CD 16 8E                             call    InitStarAtHL
 406+ 90D2 C3 B9 90                             jp      NextStarLoop2
 407+ 90D5              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 408+ 90D5 FD 4E 00     ProjectStarXToScreen:   ld      c,(iy+0)
 409+ 90D8 FD 7E 01                             ld      a,(iy+1)
 410+ 90DB 6F                                   ld      l,a
 411+ 90DC E6 7F                                and     $7F
 412+ 90DE 47                                   ld      b,a
 413+ 90DF CD E3 A6                             call    DIV16BCDivDEUNDOC
 414+ 90E2 7D                                   ld      a,l
 415+ 90E3                                      JumpOnBitSet a,7,StarXNegativePoint             ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap
 415+ 90E3 CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
 415+ 90E5 C2 F0 90    >                        jp      nz,StarXNegativePoint
 416+ 90E8              ;StarXPositivePoint:									; x was positive result
 417+ 90E8 2E 80                                ld          l,ScreenCenterX						;
 418+ 90EA 26 00                                ld          h,0
 419+ 90EC 09                                   add         hl,bc								; hl = Screen Centre + X
 420+ 90ED C3 F7 90                             jp          StarStoreXPoint
 421+ 90F0              StarXNegativePoint:                                 ; x < 0 so need to subtract from the screen centre position
 422+ 90F0 2E 80                                ld          l,ScreenCenterX
 423+ 90F2 26 00                                ld          h,0
 424+ 90F4                                      ClearCarryFlag
 424+ 90F4 B7          >                    or a
 425+ 90F5 ED 42                                sbc         hl,bc                               ; hl = Screen Centre - X
 426+ 90F7              StarStoreXPoint:                                    ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
 427+ 90F7 7D                                   ld          a,l
 428+ 90F8 32 94 97                             ld          (varStarX),a
 429+ 90FB C9                                   ret
 430+ 90FC
 431+ 90FC FD 46 02     ProjectStarYToScreen:   ld          b,(iy+2)
 432+ 90FF FD 7E 03                             ld          a,(iy+3)
 433+ 9102 6F                                   ld          l,a
 434+ 9103 E6 7F                                and         $7F
 435+ 9105 47                                   ld          b,a
 436+ 9106 CD E3 A6                             call        DIV16BCDivDEUNDOC
 437+ 9109 7D                                   ld          a,l                                 ; XX15+2 \ sign of X dist
 438+ 910A                                      JumpOnBitSet a,7,StarNegativeYPoint             ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap top of screen is Y = 0
 438+ 910A CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
 438+ 910C C2 17 91    >                        jp      nz,StarNegativeYPoint
 439+ 910F                                  ;StarPositiveYPoint:									; Y is positive so above the centre line
 440+ 910F 2E 60                               ld          l,ScreenCenterY
 441+ 9111                                      ClearCarryFlag
 441+ 9111 B7          >                    or a
 442+ 9112 ED 42                                sbc         hl,bc  							 	; hl = ScreenCentreY - Y coord (as screen is 0 at top)
 443+ 9114 C3 1C 91                             jp          StarStoreYPoint
 444+ 9117              StarNegativeYPoint:									; this bit is only 8 bit aware TODO FIX
 445+ 9117 2E 60                                ld          l,ScreenCenterY
 446+ 9119 26 00                                ld          h,0
 447+ 911B 09                                   add         hl,bc								; hl = ScreenCenterY + Y as negative is below the center of screen
 448+ 911C              StarStoreYPoint:                                    ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
 449+ 911C 7D                                   ld          a,l
 450+ 911D 32 95 97                             ld          (varStarY),a
 451+ 9120 C9                                   ret
 452+ 9121
 453+ 9121
# file closed: ./Universe/StarRoutines.asm

 964  9121                  INCLUDE	"./Hardware/memfill_dma.asm"
# file opened: ./Hardware/memfill_dma.asm
   1+ 9121
   2+ 9121 00           memfillvalue		DB 0
   3+ 9122 83 C3 C7 CB  memfill        		DB DMA_DISABLE,  DMA_RESET, DMA_RESET_PORT_A_TIMING, DMA_RESET_PORT_B_TIMING ,DMA_WRO_BLOCK_PORTA_A2B_XFR
   3+ 9126 7D
   4+ 9127 21 91        memfill_astrt  		DW memfillvalue
   5+ 9129 00 40        memfill_length 		DB $00,$40
   6+ 912B 24 10 AD     					DB DMA_WR1_P1FIXED_MEMORY ,DMA_WR2_P2INC_MEMORY ,DMA_WR4_CONT_MODE
   7+ 912E 00 00        memfill_bstrt  		DB $00,$00
   8+ 9130 82 CF B3 87  					DB DMA_STOP_AT_END, DMA_LOAD, DMA_FORCE_READY, DMA_ENABLE
   9+ 9134              memfill_cmd_len	  	EQU $ - memfill
  10+ 9134
  11+ 9134              memfill_dma:
  12+ 9134              ; "memfill_dma, hl = address to fill, a = value, de = length"
  13+ 9134              .set_fill_value:
  14+ 9134 32 21 91     	ld 		(memfillvalue),a
  15+ 9137              .set_target:
  16+ 9137 22 2E 91     	ld		(memfill_bstrt),hl
  17+ 913A              .set_length:
  18+ 913A ED 53 29 91  	ld		(memfill_length),de
  19+ 913E              .write_dma:
  20+ 913E 21 22 91     	ld 		hl, memfill
  21+ 9141 06 12        	ld 		b, memfill_cmd_len
  22+ 9143 0E 6B        	ld		c,IO_DATAGEAR_DMA_PORT
  23+ 9145 ED B3        	otir
  24+ 9147 C9           	ret
  25+ 9148
# file closed: ./Hardware/memfill_dma.asm
 965  9148                  INCLUDE	"./Hardware/memcopy_dma.asm"
# file opened: ./Hardware/memcopy_dma.asm
   1+ 9148
   2+ 9148 83 C3 C7 CB  memcopy        		DB DMA_DISABLE,  DMA_RESET, DMA_RESET_PORT_A_TIMING, DMA_RESET_PORT_B_TIMING ,DMA_WRO_BLOCK_PORTA_A2B_XFR
   2+ 914C 7D
   3+ 914D 00 00        memcopy_astrt  		DB $00,$00
   4+ 914F 00 40        memcopy_length 		DB $00,$40
   5+ 9151 14 10 AD     					DB DMA_WR1_P1INC_MEMORY ,DMA_WR2_P2INC_MEMORY ,DMA_WR4_CONT_MODE
   6+ 9154 00 00        memcopy_bstrt  		DB $00,$00
   7+ 9156 82 CF B3 87  					DB DMA_STOP_AT_END, DMA_LOAD, DMA_FORCE_READY, DMA_ENABLE
   8+ 915A              memcopy_cmd_len	  	equ $ - memcopy
   9+ 915A
  10+ 915A              memcopy_dma:
  11+ 915A              ; "memcopy_dma, hl = target address de = source address to copy, bc = length"
  12+ 915A              .set_target:
  13+ 915A 22 54 91     	ld		(memcopy_bstrt),hl
  14+ 915D              .set_source:
  15+ 915D ED 53 4D 91  	ld		(memcopy_astrt),de
  16+ 9161              .set_length:
  17+ 9161 ED 43 4F 91  	ld		(memcopy_length),bc
  18+ 9165              .write_dma:
  19+ 9165 21 48 91     	ld 		hl, memcopy
  20+ 9168 06 12        	ld 		b, memcopy_cmd_len
  21+ 916A 0E 6B        	ld		c,IO_DATAGEAR_DMA_PORT
  22+ 916C ED B3        	otir
  23+ 916E C9           	ret

  40+ 916F              ;              Launch                    Distance       Hyperspace  Laser                               DockComp    BuyCargo
  41+ 916F              ;              ResumeGame

  44+ 916F
  45+ 916F              c_Pressed_Front         equ 0  * 2
  46+ 916F              c_Pressed_Aft           equ 1  * 2
  47+ 916F              c_Pressed_Left          equ 2  * 2
  48+ 916F              c_Pressed_Right         equ 3  * 2
  49+ 916F              c_Pressed_RollLeft      equ 4  * 2
  50+ 916F              c_Pressed_RollRight     equ 5  * 2
  51+ 916F              c_Pressed_Dive          equ 6  * 2
  52+ 916F              c_Pressed_Climb         equ 7  * 2
  53+ 916F              c_Pressed_Accellerate   equ 8  * 2
  54+ 916F              c_Pressed_Decellerate   equ 9  * 2
  55+ 916F              c_Pressed_FireLaser     equ 10 * 2
  56+ 916F              c_Pressed_TargetMissle  equ 11 * 2
  57+ 916F              c_Pressed_FireMissile   equ 12 * 2
  58+ 916F              c_Pressed_UnarmMissile  equ 13 * 2
  59+ 916F              c_Pressed_ECM           equ 14 * 2
  60+ 916F              c_Pressed_EnergyBomb    equ 15 * 2
  61+ 916F              c_Pressed_EscapePod     equ 16 * 2
  62+ 916F              c_Pressed_DockingComp   equ 17 * 2
  63+ 916F              c_Pressed_Hyperspace    equ 18 * 2
  64+ 916F              c_Pressed_Distance      equ 19 * 2
  65+ 916F              c_Pressed_HomeCursor    equ 20 * 2
  66+ 916F              c_Pressed_Launch        equ 21 * 2
  67+ 916F              c_Pressed_BuyCargo      equ 22 * 2
  68+ 916F              c_Pressed_SellCargo     equ 23 * 2
  69+ 916F              c_Pressed_Equip         equ 24 * 2
  70+ 916F              c_Pressed_GalacticChrt  equ 25 * 2
  71+ 916F              c_Pressed_LocalChart    equ 26 * 2
  72+ 916F              c_Pressed_MarketPrices  equ 27 * 2
  73+ 916F              c_Pressed_Status        equ 28 * 2
  74+ 916F              c_Pressed_Inventory     equ 29 * 2
  75+ 916F              c_Pressed_GameSkip      equ 30 * 2
  76+ 916F              c_Pressed_Save          equ 31 * 2
  77+ 916F              c_Pressed_Freeze        equ 32 * 2
  78+ 916F              c_Pressed_Resume        equ 33 * 2
  79+ 916F              c_Pressed_Recentre      equ 34 * 2
  80+ 916F              c_Pressed_Quit          equ 35 * 2
  81+ 916F              c_Pressed_PlanetData    equ 36 * 2
  82+ 916F              c_Pressed_CursorUp      equ 37 * 2
  83+ 916F              c_Pressed_CursorDown    equ 38 * 2
  84+ 916F              c_Pressed_Find          equ 39 * 2
  85+ 916F
  86+ 916F              ; half row 1
  87+ 916F              VK_CAPS  				equ 0
  88+ 916F              VK_Z  					equ 1
  89+ 916F              VK_X  					equ 2
  90+ 916F              VK_C  					equ 3
  91+ 916F              VK_V  					equ 4
  92+ 916F              ; half row 2

  94+ 916F              VK_S  					equ 6
  95+ 916F              VK_D  					equ 7
  96+ 916F              VK_F  					equ 8
  97+ 916F              VK_G  					equ 9
  98+ 916F              ; half row 3

 100+ 916F              VK_W  					equ 11
 101+ 916F              VK_E  					equ 12
 102+ 916F              VK_R  					equ 13
 103+ 916F              VK_T  					equ 14
 104+ 916F              ; half row 4
 105+ 916F              VK_1  					equ 15
 106+ 916F              VK_2  					equ 16
 107+ 916F              VK_3  					equ 17
 108+ 916F              VK_4  					equ 18
 109+ 916F              VK_5  					equ 19
 110+ 916F              ; half row 5
 111+ 916F              VK_0 					equ 20
 112+ 916F              VK_9 					equ 21
 113+ 916F              VK_8 					equ 22
 114+ 916F              VK_7 					equ 23
 115+ 916F              VK_6 					equ 24
 116+ 916F              ; half row 6
 117+ 916F              VK_P  					equ 25
 118+ 916F              VK_O  					equ 26
 119+ 916F              VK_I  					equ 27

 175+ 916F              KeyCode_CursorDown      equ VK_A

 177+ 916F 00 00 00...  Keys					DS	40
 178+ 9197              c_KeyBoardLen 			equ $ - Keys
 179+ 9197 00 00 00...  RawKeys					DS	8
 180+ 919F FE FE FE FD  KeyAddrTab				DW	$FEFE, $FDFE, $FBFE, $F7FE, $EFFE, $DFFE, $BFFE, $7FFE
 180+ 91A3 FE FB FE F7
 180+ 91A7 FE EF FE DF
 180+ 91AB FE BF FE 7F
 181+ 91AF              ; Now keyboard map lists each game key and the corresponding address in the Keys table to get the value. This way redefining keys is just a case
 182+ 91AF              ; of updating this table with the respective location to look up
 183+ 91AF              ; key list sequence is in table above
 184+ 91AF 7E 91 7F 91  KeyboardMap             DW  Keys+KeyCode_Front        ,Keys+KeyCode_Aft          ,Keys+KeyCode_Left         ,Keys+KeyCode_Right        ,Keys+KeyCode_RollLeft
 184+ 91B3 80 91 81 91
 184+ 91B7 89 91
 185+ 91B9 88 91 79 91                          DW  Keys+KeyCode_RollRight    ,Keys+KeyCode_Dive         ,Keys+KeyCode_Climb        ,Keys+KeyCode_Accellerate  ,Keys+KeyCode_Decellerate
 185+ 91BD 74 91 7A 91
 185+ 91C1 75 91
 186+ 91C3 92 91 7D 91                          DW  Keys+KeyCode_FireLaser    ,Keys+KeyCode_TargetMissle ,Keys+KeyCode_FireMissile  ,Keys+KeyCode_UnarmMissile ,Keys+KeyCode_ECM
 186+ 91C7 77 91 7C 91
 186+ 91CB 7B 91
 187+ 91CD 8B 91 6F 91                          DW  Keys+KeyCode_EnergyBomb   ,Keys+KeyCode_EscapePod    ,Keys+KeyCode_DockingComp  ,Keys+KeyCode_Hyperspace   ,Keys+KeyCode_Distance
 187+ 91D1 95 91 91 91
 187+ 91D5 90 91
 188+ 91D7 78 91 8E 91                          DW  Keys+KeyCode_HomeCursor   ,Keys+KeyCode_Launch       ,Keys+KeyCode_BuyCargo     ,Keys+KeyCode_SellCargo    ,Keys+KeyCode_Equip
 188+ 91DB 96 91 73 91
 188+ 91DF 72 91
 189+ 91E1 82 91 87 91                          DW  Keys+KeyCode_GalacticChrt ,Keys+KeyCode_LocalChart   ,Keys+KeyCode_MarketPrices ,Keys+KeyCode_Status       ,Keys+KeyCode_Inventory
 189+ 91E5 86 91 85 91
 189+ 91E9 84 91
 190+ 91EB 70 91 89 91                          DW  Keys+KeyCode_GameSkip     ,Keys+KeyCode_Save         ,Keys+KeyCode_Freeze       ,Keys+KeyCode_Resume       ,Keys+KeyCode_Recentre
 190+ 91EF 96 91 8E 91
 190+ 91F3 76 91
 191+ 91F5 8C 91 83 91                          DW  Keys+KeyCode_Quit         ,Keys+KeyCode_PlanetData   ,Keys+KeyCode_CursorUp     ,Keys+KeyCode_CursorDown   ,Keys+KeyCode_Find
 191+ 91F9 79 91 74 91

 193+ 91FF 23 5A 58 43  ASCII_Map:              DB "#","Z","X","C","V"
 193+ 9203 56
 194+ 9204 41 53 44 46                          DB "A","S","D","F","G"
 194+ 9208 47
 195+ 9209 51 57 45 52                          DB "Q","W","E","R","T"
 195+ 920D 54
 196+ 920E 31 32 33 34                          DB "1","2","3","4","5"
 196+ 9212 35
 197+ 9213 30 39 38 37                          DB "0","9","8","7","6"
 197+ 9217 36
 198+ 9218 50 4F 49 55                          DB "P","O","I","U","Y"
 198+ 921C 59
 199+ 921D 3E 4C 4B 4A                          DB ">","L","K","J","H"
 199+ 9221 48
 200+ 9222 20 5E 4D 4E                          DB " ","^","M","N","B"
 200+ 9226 42

 203+ 9227              addr_Pressed_Front         equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Front
 204+ 9227              addr_Pressed_Aft           equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Aft
 205+ 9227              addr_Pressed_Left          equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Left
 206+ 9227              addr_Pressed_Right         equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Right
 207+ 9227              addr_Pressed_RollLeft      equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_RollLeft
 208+ 9227              addr_Pressed_RollRight     equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_RollRight
 209+ 9227              addr_Pressed_Dive          equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Dive
 210+ 9227              addr_Pressed_Climb         equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Climb
 211+ 9227              addr_Pressed_Accellerate   equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Accellerate
 212+ 9227              addr_Pressed_Decellerate   equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Decellerate
 213+ 9227              addr_Pressed_FireLaser     equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_FireLaser

 216+ 9227              addr_Pressed_UnarmMissile  equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_UnarmMissile
 217+ 9227              addr_Pressed_ECM           equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_ECM

 222+ 9227              addr_Pressed_Distance      equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Distance

 224+ 9227              addr_Pressed_Launch        equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Launch
 225+ 9227              addr_Pressed_BuyCargo      equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_BuyCargo
 226+ 9227              addr_Pressed_SellCargo     equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_SellCargo
 227+ 9227              addr_Pressed_Equip         equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Equip
 228+ 9227              addr_Pressed_GalacticChrt  equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_GalacticChrt
 229+ 9227              addr_Pressed_LocalChart    equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_LocalChart
 230+ 9227              addr_Pressed_MarketPrices  equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_MarketPrices
 231+ 9227              addr_Pressed_Status        equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Status

 233+ 9227              addr_Pressed_GameSkip      equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_GameSkip
 234+ 9227              addr_Pressed_Save          equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Save
 235+ 9227              addr_Pressed_Freeze        equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Freeze
 236+ 9227              addr_Pressed_Resume        equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Resume

 238+ 9227              addr_Pressed_Quit          equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Quit

 240+ 9227              addr_Pressed_CursorUp      equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_CursorUp
