 242+ 9227              addr_Pressed_Find          equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Find
 243+ 9227
 244+ 9227
 245+ 9227              MIsKeyPressed:      MACRO   keyaddress, misstarget
 246+ 9227 ~                                ld      hl,(keyaddress)
 247+ 9227 ~                                ld      a,(hl)
 248+ 9227 ~                                IfAIsZeroGoto   misstarget
 249+ 9227                                  ENDM
 250+ 9227
 251+ 9227 21 6F 91     init_keyboard:      ld		hl,Keys
 252+ 922A 11 28 00                         ld		de, c_KeyBoardLen
 253+ 922D 3E 00                            ld		a,0
 254+ 922F CD 34 91                         call	memfill_dma
 255+ 9232 C9                               ret
 256+ 9233
 257+ 9233 21 97 91     scan_keyboard:      ld		hl,RawKeys
 258+ 9236 11 9F 91                         ld		de,KeyAddrTab
 259+ 9239 AF                               xor		a
 260+ 923A FD 2E 08                         ld		iyl,8
 261+ 923D DD 21 6F 91                      ld      ix,Keys
 262+ 9241 1A           .PortReadLoop:      ld		a,(de)							; Set up BC as port to read
 263+ 9242 4F                               ld		c,a
 264+ 9243 13                               inc		de
 265+ 9244 1A                               ld      a,(de)
 266+ 9245 47                               ld		b,a
 267+ 9246 13                               inc		de
 268+ 9247 ED 78                            in		a,(c)							; read port to a
 269+ 9249 77                               ld		(hl),a							; set raw keys to value
 270+ 924A 23                               inc		hl								; and ready for next element
 271+ 924B 06 05                            ld		b,5								; loop all bits (there are only 5 keys to a group)
 272+ 924D CB 47        .ProcessBitsLoop:   bit		0,a								; is bit set
 273+ 924F 28 07                            jr      z,.SetKeyPressed
 274+ 9251 08                               ex      af,af'
 275+ 9252 AF                               xor     a
 276+ 9253 C3 5F 92                         jp      .SetKey
 277+ 9256 20 0B                            jr		nz,.SkipKeySet
 278+ 9258 08           .SetKeyPressed:	    ex		af,af'
 279+ 9259 DD 7E 00                         ld      a,(ix+0)
 280+ 925C 3C                               inc     a
 281+ 925D E6 03                            and     $3                              ; so bit 0 set is pressed, bit 1 set is repeat pressed, i.e. 0 = no, 1 = yes 2,3 = held
 282+ 925F DD 77 00     .SetKey:            ld		(ix+0),a							; Key Pressed
 283+ 9262 08                               ex		af,af'
 284+ 9263 DD 23        .SkipKeySet:	    inc		ix								; move to next key
 285+ 9265 CB 3F                            srl		a								; move next key into bit 0
 286+ 9267 10 E4                            djnz	.ProcessBitsLoop				; Process all key group bits
 287+ 9269 FD 2D                            dec     iyl
 288+ 926B 20 D4                            jr      nz,.PortReadLoop				; Read next input port
 289+ 926D C9                               ret
 290+ 926E
 291+ 926E              GetKeyStateAddressDE: MACRO
 292+ 926E ~                                  ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 293+ 926E ~                                  add     hl,a
 294+ 926E ~                                  ld      a,(hl)
 295+ 926E ~                                  ld      e,a
 296+ 926E ~                                  inc     hl
 297+ 926E ~                                  ld      a,(hl)
 298+ 926E ~                                  ld      d,a                             ; now de = address in keypress list
 299+ 926E                                    ENDM
 300+ 926E
 301+ 926E
 302+ 926E              ; call with a = c_Pressed key, will then read mapping
 303+ 926E              wait_for_key_a_press:       GetKeyStateAddressDE
 303+ 926E 21 AF 91    >                      ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 303+ 9271 ED 31       >                      add     hl,a
 303+ 9273 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 303+ 9274 5F          >                      ld      e,a
 303+ 9275 23          >                      inc     hl
 303+ 9276 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 303+ 9277 57          >                      ld      d,a                             ; now de = address in keypress list
 304+ 9278 D5                                       push    de
 305+ 9279 CD 33 92     wait_for_key_press_loop:    call    scan_keyboard
 306+ 927C E1                                       pop     hl                              ; get key address into hl
 307+ 927D E5                                       push    hl
 308+ 927E 7E                                       ld      a,(hl)
 309+ 927F                                          JumpIfANENusng  1,wait_for_key_press_loop         ; will also loop if held down when entering this routine
 309+ 927F FE 01       >                cp     1
 309+ 9281 C2 79 92    >                jp      nz,wait_for_key_press_loop
 310+ 9284 E1                                       pop     hl                              ; tidy up rogue push, less t states than detecting if we want to push or not
 311+ 9285 C9                                       ret
 312+ 9286
 313+ 9286              wait_for_key_a_held:        GetKeyStateAddressDE
 313+ 9286 21 AF 91    >                      ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 313+ 9289 ED 31       >                      add     hl,a
 313+ 928B 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 313+ 928C 5F          >                      ld      e,a
 313+ 928D 23          >                      inc     hl
 313+ 928E 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 313+ 928F 57          >                      ld      d,a                             ; now de = address in keypress list
 314+ 9290 D5                                       push    de
 315+ 9291 CD 33 92     wait_for_key_a_held_loop:   call    scan_keyboard
 316+ 9294 E1                                       pop     hl
 317+ 9295 E5                                       push    hl
 318+ 9296 7E                                       ld      a,(hl)
 319+ 9297                                          JumpIfALTNusng  2,wait_for_key_a_held_loop
 319+ 9297 FE 02       >                        cp      2
 319+ 9299 DA 91 92    >                        jp		c, wait_for_key_a_held_loop
 320+ 929C E1                                       pop     hl
 321+ 929D C9                                       ret
 322+ 929E
 323+ 929E              get_key_a_state:            GetKeyStateAddressDE                 ; reads a mapped key and sets a to key staus, e.g. 0 1 or >=2 DOES NOT SCAN KEYBOARD
 323+ 929E 21 AF 91    >                      ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 323+ 92A1 ED 31       >                      add     hl,a
 323+ 92A3 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 323+ 92A4 5F          >                      ld      e,a
 323+ 92A5 23          >                      inc     hl
 323+ 92A6 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 323+ 92A7 57          >                      ld      d,a                             ; now de = address in keypress list
 324+ 92A8 EB                                       ex      de,hl
 325+ 92A9 7E                                       ld      a,(hl)                        ; a = keystate
 326+ 92AA C9                                       ret
 327+ 92AB
 328+ 92AB              force_key_press:            GetKeyStateAddressDE
 328+ 92AB 21 AF 91    >                      ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 328+ 92AE ED 31       >                      add     hl,a
 328+ 92B0 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 328+ 92B1 5F          >                      ld      e,a
 328+ 92B2 23          >                      inc     hl
 328+ 92B3 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 328+ 92B4 57          >                      ld      d,a                             ; now de = address in keypress list
 329+ 92B5 EB                                       ex      de,hl
 330+ 92B6 3E 01                                    ld      a,1
 331+ 92B8 77                                       ld      (hl),a
 332+ 92B9 C9                                       ret
 333+ 92BA
 334+ 92BA              ; returns z is set if c_ key is pressed
 335+ 92BA              is_key_pressed:             GetKeyStateAddressDE
 335+ 92BA 21 AF 91    >                      ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 335+ 92BD ED 31       >                      add     hl,a
 335+ 92BF 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 335+ 92C0 5F          >                      ld      e,a
 335+ 92C1 23          >                      inc     hl
 335+ 92C2 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 335+ 92C3 57          >                      ld      d,a                             ; now de = address in keypress list
 336+ 92C4 EB                                       ex      de,hl
 337+ 92C5 7E                                       ld      a,(hl)                          ; a = keystate
 338+ 92C6 FE 01                                    cp      1
 339+ 92C8 C9                                       ret
 340+ 92C9
 341+ 92C9              ; returns z is set if c_ key is held
 342+ 92C9              is_key_held:                GetKeyStateAddressDE
 342+ 92C9 21 AF 91    >                      ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 342+ 92CC ED 31       >                      add     hl,a
 342+ 92CE 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 342+ 92CF 5F          >                      ld      e,a
 342+ 92D0 23          >                      inc     hl
 342+ 92D1 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 342+ 92D2 57          >                      ld      d,a                             ; now de = address in keypress list
 343+ 92D3 EB                                       ex      de,hl
 344+ 92D4 7E                                       ld      a,(hl)                          ; a = keystate
 345+ 92D5 E6 02                                    and     2                               ; clear out bit 1 which elimiates state 3, so it can now be 2 (held) or 0 (not pressed or one off)
 346+ 92D7 FE 02                                    cp      2
 347+ 92D9 C9                                       ret
 348+ 92DA
 349+ 92DA              is_any_key_pressed:
 350+ 92DA 21 6F 91         ld      hl,Keys
 351+ 92DD 06 28            ld      b,40
 352+ 92DF 0E 00            ld      c,0
 353+ 92E1              .KeyReadLoop:
 354+ 92E1 7E               ld      a,(hl)
 355+ 92E2 FE 01            cp      1
 356+ 92E4 CA EE 92         jp      z,.KeyPressed
 357+ 92E7 23               inc     hl
 358+ 92E8 0C               inc     c
 359+ 92E9 10 F6            djnz    .KeyReadLoop
 360+ 92EB 3E FF            ld      a,$FF
 361+ 92ED C9               ret
 362+ 92EE              .KeyPressed:
 363+ 92EE 79               ld      a,c
 364+ 92EF C9               ret
 365+ 92F0
 366+ 92F0              is_any_key_held:
 367+ 92F0 21 6F 91         ld      hl,Keys
 368+ 92F3 06 28            ld      b,40
 369+ 92F5 0E 00            ld      c,0
 370+ 92F7              .KeyReadLoop:
 371+ 92F7 7E               ld      a,(hl)
 372+ 92F8 E6 02            and     2                               ; clear out bit 1 which elimiates state 3, so it can now be 2 (held) or 0 (not pressed or one off)
 373+ 92FA FE 02            cp      2
 374+ 92FC CA 06 93         jp      z,.KeyPressed
 375+ 92FF 23               inc     hl
 376+ 9300 0C               inc     c
 377+ 9301 10 F4            djnz    .KeyReadLoop
 378+ 9303 3E FF            ld      a,$FF
 379+ 9305 C9               ret
 380+ 9306              .KeyPressed:
 381+ 9306 79               ld      a,c
 382+ 9307 C9               ret
 383+ 9308
 384+ 9308
 385+ 9308 00 00 00...  InputString             DS  30              ; used for a 30 character input buffer
 386+ 9326 00                                   DB  0               ; end of string marker as a safety
 387+ 9327 00           InputCursor             DB  0
 388+ 9328 00           EnterPressed            DB  0               ; zero notpressed FF pressed
 389+ 9329 00           InputChanged            DB  0
 390+ 932A              InputLimit              EQU 20
 391+ 932A
 392+ 932A              keyboard_copy_input_to_de:
 393+ 932A 21 08 93         ld      hl,InputString
 394+ 932D 3A 27 93         ld      a,(InputCursor)
 395+ 9330 FE 00            cp      0
 396+ 9332 28 05            jr      z,.NoString
 397+ 9334 4F               ld      c,a
 398+ 9335 06 00            ld      b,0
 399+ 9337 ED B0            ldir
 400+ 9339              .NoString
 401+ 9339 3E 00            ld      a,0
 402+ 933B 12               ld      (de),a
 403+ 933C C9               ret
 404+ 933D
 405+ 933D              initInputText:
 406+ 933D AF               xor     a
 407+ 933E 32 27 93         ld      (InputCursor),a
 408+ 9341 32 28 93         ld      (EnterPressed),a
 409+ 9344 32 29 93         ld      (InputChanged),a
 410+ 9347 21 08 93         ld      hl,InputString
 411+ 934A 06 1E            ld      b,30
 412+ 934C              .wipeloop:
 413+ 934C 77               ld      (hl),a
 414+ 934D 23               inc     hl
 415+ 934E 10 FC            djnz    .wipeloop
 416+ 9350 C9               ret
 417+ 9351
 418+ 9351 AF           InputName:                  xor     a
 419+ 9352 32 29 93                                 ld      (InputChanged),a
 420+ 9355 CD DA 92                                 call    is_any_key_pressed
 421+ 9358 FE FF                                    cp      $FF
 422+ 935A C8                                       ret     z
 423+ 935B              .KeyPressed:
 424+ 935B 4F               ld      c,a
 425+ 935C 3A 27 93         ld      a,(InputCursor)                 ; No key so we can now look at if we are at the end of the buffer
 426+ 935F FE 14            cp      InputLimit                      ; move to variable later and then cp (hl)
 427+ 9361 28 0B            jr      z,.DeleteOrEnterOnly            ;
 428+ 9363 21 FF 91         ld      hl,ASCII_Map
 429+ 9366 79               ld      a,c
 430+ 9367 ED 31            add     hl,a
 431+ 9369 7E               ld      a,(hl)
 432+ 936A FE 41            cp      "A"
 433+ 936C 30 15            jr      nc,.AlphaPressed
 434+ 936E              .DeleteOrEnterOnly                          ; CAPS and Symbol act as delete for now
 435+ 936E FE 30            cp      "0"                             ; if 0 was preseed check caps shift too
 436+ 9370 28 3B            jr      z,.CheckShiftDelete             ; for now we will ignore the shift and just assume delete
 437+ 9372 FE 3E            cp      ">"         ; ENTER
 438+ 9374 28 24            jr      z,.EnterPressed
 439+ 9376 FE 23            cp      "#"         ; CAPS
 440+ 9378 28 33            jr      z,.CapsPressed
 441+ 937A FE 5E            cp      "^"         ; SYMBOLSHIFT
 442+ 937C 28 2F            jr      z,.SymbolPressed
 443+ 937E FE 20            cp      " "         ; space
 444+ 9380 28 2B            jr      z,.SpacePressed
 445+ 9382 C9               ret
 446+ 9383              .AlphaPressed:
 447+ 9383 47               ld      b,a
 448+ 9384 3A 27 93         ld      a,(InputCursor)
 449+ 9387 4F               ld      c,a
 450+ 9388 21 08 93         ld      hl,InputString
 451+ 938B ED 31            add     hl,a
 452+ 938D 78               ld      a,b
 453+ 938E 70               ld      (hl),b
 454+ 938F 79               ld      a,c
 455+ 9390 21 27 93         ld      hl,InputCursor
 456+ 9393 34               inc     (hl)
 457+ 9394 3E FF            ld      a,$FF
 458+ 9396 32 29 93         ld      (InputChanged),a
 459+ 9399 C9               ret
 460+ 939A              .EnterPressed:
 461+ 939A 3A 27 93         ld      a,(InputCursor)
 462+ 939D 3C               inc     a
 463+ 939E 21 08 93         ld      hl,InputString
 464+ 93A1 ED 31            add     hl,a
 465+ 93A3 AF               xor     a
 466+ 93A4 77               ld      (hl),a
 467+ 93A5 3D               dec     a
 468+ 93A6 32 28 93         ld      (EnterPressed),a
 469+ 93A9 32 29 93         ld      (InputChanged),a
 470+ 93AC C9               ret
 471+ 93AD              .CheckShiftDelete:
 472+ 93AD              .CapsPressed:                               ; act as a delete key for now
 473+ 93AD              .SymbolPressed:
 474+ 93AD              .SpacePressed:
 475+ 93AD 3A 27 93         ld      a,(InputCursor)
 476+ 93B0 FE 00            cp      0
 477+ 93B2 C8               ret     z
 478+ 93B3 3D               dec     a
 479+ 93B4 32 27 93         ld      (InputCursor),a
 480+ 93B7 21 08 93         ld      hl,InputString
 481+ 93BA ED 31            add     hl,a
 482+ 93BC AF               xor     a
 483+ 93BD 77               ld      (hl),a
 484+ 93BE 3E FF            ld      a,$FF
 485+ 93C0 32 29 93         ld      (InputChanged),a
 486+ 93C3 C9               ret
 487+ 93C4
 488+ 93C4              MovementKeyTest:
 489+ 93C4              ;DBG1:jp dbg1
 490+ 93C4              ;dbx1:
 491+ 93C4 AF               xor     a
 492+ 93C5 32 DC 94         ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 493+ 93C8 3A DE 94         ld      a,(MenuIdMax)
 494+ 93CB E6 FC            and     $FC
 495+ 93CD 20 26            jr      nz,CursorKeys
 496+ 93CF              ClimbDiveKeys:
 497+ 93CF 2A BD 91         ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_Climb)
 498+ 93D2 7E               ld      a,(hl)
 499+ 93D3                  IfAIsZeroGoto ScanDiveKey
 499+ 93D3 A7          >				and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 499+ 93D4 CA E2 93    >				jp	z, ScanDiveKey
 500+ 93D7 3A DC 94         ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 501+ 93DA F6 80            or      $80
 502+ 93DC 32 DC 94         ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 503+ 93DF C3 18 94         jp      ScanLeftKey
 504+ 93E2              ScanDiveKey:
 505+ 93E2 2A BB 91         ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_Dive)
 506+ 93E5 7E               ld      a,(hl)
 507+ 93E6                  IfAIsZeroGoto ScanLeftKey
 507+ 93E6 A7          >				and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 507+ 93E7 CA 18 94    >				jp	z, ScanLeftKey
 508+ 93EA 3A DC 94         ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 509+ 93ED F6 40            or      $40
 510+ 93EF 32 DC 94         ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 511+ 93F2 C3 18 94         jp      ScanLeftKey
 512+ 93F5              CursorKeys:
 513+ 93F5 2A F9 91         ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_CursorUp)
 514+ 93F8 7E               ld      a,(hl)
 515+ 93F9                  IfAIsZeroGoto ScanCursorDownKey
 515+ 93F9 A7          >				and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 515+ 93FA CA 08 94    >				jp	z, ScanCursorDownKey
 516+ 93FD 3A DC 94         ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 517+ 9400 F6 80            or      $80
 518+ 9402 32 DC 94         ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 519+ 9405 C3 18 94         jp      ScanLeftKey
 520+ 9408              ScanCursorDownKey
 521+ 9408 2A FB 91         ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_CursorDown)
 522+ 940B 7E               ld      a,(hl)
 523+ 940C                  IfAIsZeroGoto ScanLeftKey
 523+ 940C A7          >				and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 523+ 940D CA 18 94    >				jp	z, ScanLeftKey
 524+ 9410 3A DC 94         ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 525+ 9413 F6 40            or      $40
 526+ 9415 32 DC 94         ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 527+ 9418              ScanLeftKey:
 528+ 9418 2A B7 91         ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_RollLeft)
 529+ 941B 7E               ld      a,(hl)
 530+ 941C                  IfAIsZeroGoto ScanRightKey
 530+ 941C A7          >				and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 530+ 941D CA 29 94    >				jp	z, ScanRightKey
 531+ 9420 3A DC 94         ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 532+ 9423 F6 20            or      $20
 533+ 9425 32 DC 94         ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 534+ 9428 C9               ret
 535+ 9429              ScanRightKey:
 536+ 9429 2A B9 91         ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_RollRight)
 537+ 942C 7E               ld      a,(hl)
 538+ 942D                  IfAIsZeroGoto ScanHomeKey
 538+ 942D A7          >				and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 538+ 942E CA 3A 94    >				jp	z, ScanHomeKey
 539+ 9431 3A DC 94         ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 540+ 9434 F6 10            or      $10
 541+ 9436 32 DC 94         ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 542+ 9439 C9               ret
 543+ 943A              ScanHomeKey:
 544+ 943A 2A D7 91         ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_HomeCursor)
 545+ 943D 7E               ld      a,(hl)
 546+ 943E                  IfAIsZeroGoto ScanRecentreKey
 546+ 943E A7          >				and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 546+ 943F CA 4B 94    >				jp	z, ScanRecentreKey
 547+ 9442 3A DC 94         ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 548+ 9445 F6 08            or      $08
 549+ 9447 32 DC 94         ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 550+ 944A C9               ret
 551+ 944B              ScanRecentreKey:
 552+ 944B 2A F3 91         ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_Recentre)
 553+ 944E 7E               ld      a,(hl)
 554+ 944F                  ReturnIfAIsZero
 554+ 944F A7          >                    and a
 554+ 9450 C8          >                    ret    z
 555+ 9451 3A DC 94         ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 556+ 9454 F6 04            or      $04
 557+ 9456 32 DC 94         ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 558+ 9459 C9               ret
 559+ 945A
 560+ 945A
# file closed: ./Hardware/keyboard.asm

  67+ 945A              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 11 is #CYL  Cobra Mk III,  Boa

 528+ 95F9              ; $094A =	EQUW page9+37* 2

 530+ 95F9              ; $0994 =	EQUW page9+37* 4
 531+ 95F9              ; $09B9 =	EQUW page9+37* 5
 532+ 95F9              ; $09DE =	EQUW page9+37* 6
 533+ 95F9              ; $0A03 =	EQUW page9+37* 7
 534+ 95F9              ; $0A28 =	EQUW page9+37* 8

   1+ 9862 AF           ClearSlotCount:         xor     a
   2+ 9863 21 47 95                             ld      hl,UniverseSlotCount
   3+ 9866 06 18                                ld      b, UniverseListSize * 2
   4+ 9868 77           .fillLoop:              ld      (hl),a
   5+ 9869 23                                   inc     hl
   6+ 986A 10 FC                                djnz    .fillLoop
   7+ 986C C9                                   ret
   8+ 986D
   9+ 986D              ; Initialises all types to a count of 1 where there is an occupied universe slot
  10+ 986D              ; this needs expanding to cater for a missing type, find type and increment count (use cpir?)
  11+ 986D CD 62 98     CorrectSlotCount:       call    ClearSlotCount
  12+ 9870 21 47 95                             ld      hl,UniverseSlotCount
  13+ 9873 11 3B 95                             ld      de,UniverseSlotList
  14+ 9876 06 0C                                ld      b,UniverseListSize
  15+ 9878 1A           .fillLoop:              ld      a,(de)
  16+ 9879 FE FF                                cp      $FF
  17+ 987B 28 05                                jr      z,.SkipSlot

  19+ 987E 23                                   inc     hl
  20+ 987F 36 01                                ld      (hl),1
  21+ 9881 23                                   inc     hl

  23+ 9883 10 F3                                djnz    .fillLoop
  24+ 9885 C9                                   ret

 974  996B
 975  996B                  INCLUDE "./Variables/random_number.asm"
# file opened: ./Variables/random_number.asm
   1+ 996B              doRandom2:									; .DORND2	\ -> &3F85 \ Restricted for explosion dust.
   2+ 996B              doRND2:
   3+ 996B A7           	and		a								; fast clear carry  leave bit0 of RAND+2 at 0.
   4+ 996C              doRandom:									;.DORND	\ -> &3F86 \ do random, new A, X.
   5+ 996C              ; "doRandom, Random Seed update, new value in A & B)"
   6+ 996C 3A 6A 94     doRND:                  ld		a,(RandomSeed)					; Get Seed 0
   7+ 996F CB 17                                rl		a								; Rotate L including carry
   8+ 9971 4F                                   ld		c,a								; c =  double lo
   9+ 9972 21 6C 94     .AddSeed2:              ld		hl,RandomSeed2
  10+ 9975 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)							; RAND+2
  11+ 9976 32 6A 94     .SaveAtoSeed:           ld		(RandomSeed),a					; and save RAND
  12+ 9979 08           .SaveBtoSeed2:          ex		af,af'
  13+ 997A 79                                   ld		a,c
  14+ 997B 32 6C 94                             ld		(RandomSeed2),a
  15+ 997E 08                                   ex		af,af'
  16+ 997F 3A 6B 94                             ld		a,(RandomSeed1)
  17+ 9982 4F                                   ld		c,a								; C = Seed1
  18+ 9983 21 6D 94     .AddSeed3:              ld		hl,RandomSeed3
  19+ 9986 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)
  20+ 9987 32 6B 94                             ld		(RandomSeed1),a
  21+ 998A 08                                   ex		af,af'
  22+ 998B 79                                   ld		a,c
  23+ 998C 32 6D 94                             ld		(RandomSeed3),a
  24+ 998F 08                                   ex		af,af'
  25+ 9990 C9                                   ret
  26+ 9991
  27+ 9991              fillHeapRandom4Points:                      ; counter Y, 4 rnd bytes to edge heap
  28+ 9991 06 04        	ld		b,4
  29+ 9993 21 04 C2     	ld		hl,UbnkLineArray				; line data
  30+ 9996              FillRandom:                                 ; Writes random bytes hl = start address, b = nbr bytes to fill
  31+ 9996              EE55:
  32+ 9996 CD 6C 99     	call	doRND							; get random
  33+ 9999 77           	ld		(hl),a							; (XX19),Y
  34+ 999A 23           	inc		hl
  35+ 999B 10 F9        	djnz	FillRandom						; 3to6 = random bytes for seed
  36+ 999D C9               ret
  37+ 999E
# file closed: ./Variables/random_number.asm
 976  999E                  INCLUDE "./Variables/galaxy_seed.asm"
# file opened: ./Variables/galaxy_seed.asm
   1+ 999E 47 41 4C 41  GALAXYSEED DB "GALAXYSEED"
   1+ 99A2 58 59 53 45
   1+ 99A6 45 44
   2+ 99A8 21 E3 95     copy_galaxy_to_system:  ld		hl,GalaxySeeds
   3+ 99AB 11 BE 94                             ld		de,SystemSeed
   4+ 99AE ED A0        copy_seed:		        ldi
   5+ 99B0 ED A0                                ldi
   6+ 99B2 ED A0                                ldi
   7+ 99B4 ED A0                                ldi
   8+ 99B6 ED A0                                ldi
   9+ 99B8 ED A0                                ldi
  10+ 99BA C9                                   ret
  11+ 99BB
  12+ 99BB 21 BE 94     copy_system_to_galaxy:  ld		hl,SystemSeed
  13+ 99BE 11 E3 95                             ld		de,GalaxySeeds
  14+ 99C1 18 EB                                jr		copy_seed
  15+ 99C3
  16+ 99C3 21 E3 95     copy_galaxy_to_working: ld		hl,GalaxySeeds
  17+ 99C6 11 D7 95                             ld		de,WorkingSeeds
  18+ 99C9 18 E3                                jr		copy_seed
  19+ 99CB
  20+ 99CB 21 D7 95     copy_working_to_galaxy: ld		hl,WorkingSeeds
  21+ 99CE 11 E3 95                             ld		de,GalaxySeeds
  22+ 99D1 18 DB                                jr		copy_seed
  23+ 99D3
  24+ 99D3 21 D7 95     copy_working_to_system: ld		hl,WorkingSeeds
  25+ 99D6 11 BE 94                             ld		de,SystemSeed
  26+ 99D9 18 D3                                jr		copy_seed
  27+ 99DB
  28+ 99DB 21 BE 94     copy_system_to_working: ld		hl,SystemSeed
  29+ 99DE 11 D7 95                             ld		de,WorkingSeeds
  30+ 99E1 18 CB                                jr		copy_seed
  31+ 99E3
  32+ 99E3              next_system_seed:							;.TT20	\ -> &2B0E  \ TWIST on QQ15 to next system
  33+ 99E3 CD E6 99     		call	.NextStep					; This logic means we hard code x4
  34+ 99E6              .NextStep:
  35+ 99E6 CD E9 99     		call	process_seed				; This logic means we hard code x2
  36+ 99E9              process_seed:								; TT54	\ -> &2637 \ Twist seed for next digram in QQ15
  37+ 99E9 3A BE 94     		ld		a,(SystemSeed)				; QQ15
  38+ 99EC B7           		or		a							; clear carry flag
  39+ 99ED 21 C0 94     		ld		hl,SystemSeed+2				; hl -> qq+2
  40+ 99F0 86           		add		a,(hl)						; a= QQ15 + QQ152
  41+ 99F1 47           		ld		b,a							; partial sum lo
  42+ 99F2 3A BF 94     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+1)
  43+ 99F5 21 C1 94     		ld		hl,SystemSeed+3				; HL -> QQ+3 )we don't inc as it affects carry)
  44+ 99F8 8E           		adc		a,(hl)						; note add with carry
  45+ 99F9 4F           		ld		c,a  						; c = QQ1+QQ3+carry bit parial sum hi
  46+ 99FA 3A C0 94     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+2)
  47+ 99FD 32 BE 94     		ld		(SystemSeed+0),a			; copy qq152 to qq150
  48+ 9A00 3A C1 94     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+3)
  49+ 9A03 32 BF 94     		ld		(SystemSeed+1),a			; copy qq153 to qq151
  50+ 9A06 3A C3 94     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+5)
  51+ 9A09 32 C1 94     		ld		(SystemSeed+3),a			; copy qq155 to qq153
  52+ 9A0C 3A C2 94     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+4)
  53+ 9A0F 32 C0 94     		ld		(SystemSeed+2),a			; copy qq154 to qq152
  54+ 9A12 B7           		or		a
  55+ 9A13 78           		ld		a,b
  56+ 9A14 21 C0 94     		ld		hl,SystemSeed+2				; hl -> qq+2
  57+ 9A17 86           		add	    a,(hl)
  58+ 9A18 32 C2 94     		ld		(SystemSeed+4),a
  59+ 9A1B 79           		ld		a,c
  60+ 9A1C 21 C1 94     		ld		hl,SystemSeed+3				; HL -> QQ+3 )we don't inc as it affects carry)
  61+ 9A1F 8E           		adc		a,(hl)
  62+ 9A20 32 C3 94     		ld		(SystemSeed+5),a
  63+ 9A23 C9           		ret
  64+ 9A24
  65+ 9A24              next_working_seed:							;.TT20	\ -> &2B0E  \ TWIST on QQ15 to next system
  66+ 9A24 CD 27 9A     		call	.NextStep					; This logic means we hard code x4
  67+ 9A27              .NextStep:
  68+ 9A27 CD 2A 9A     		call	working_seed				; This logic means we hard code x2
  69+ 9A2A              working_seed:								; TT54	\ -> &2637 \ Twist seed for next digram in QQ15
  70+ 9A2A              ; x = a + c
  71+ 9A2A 3A D7 95     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds)			; QQ15
  72+ 9A2D B7           		or		a							; clear carry flag
  73+ 9A2E 21 D9 95     		ld		hl,WorkingSeeds+2			; hl -> qq+2 [c]
  74+ 9A31 86           		add		a,(hl)						; a= QQ15 [a]+ QQ15 [c]
  75+ 9A32 47           		ld		b,a							; partial sum lo [x]
  76+ 9A33              ; y = b + d	+ carry
  77+ 9A33 3A D8 95     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+1)          ; [b]
  78+ 9A36 21 DA 95     		ld		hl,WorkingSeeds+3			; HL -> QQ+3 [d] we don't inc as it affects carry)
  79+ 9A39 8E           		adc		a,(hl)						; note add with carry
  80+ 9A3A 4F           		ld		c,a  						; c = QQ1+QQ3+carry bit parial sum hi
  81+ 9A3B 3A D9 95     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+2)
  82+ 9A3E 32 D7 95     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+0),a			; copy qq152 to qq150 [a] = [c]
  83+ 9A41 3A DA 95     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+3)
  84+ 9A44 32 D8 95     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+1),a			; copy qq153 to qq151 [b] = [d]
  85+ 9A47 3A DC 95     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+5)
  86+ 9A4A 32 DA 95     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+3),a			; copy qq155 to qq153 [d] = [f]
  87+ 9A4D 3A DB 95     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+4)
  88+ 9A50 32 D9 95     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+2),a			; copy qq154 to qq152 [c] = [e]
  89+ 9A53 B7           		or		a
  90+ 9A54 78           		ld		a,b
  91+ 9A55 21 D9 95     		ld		hl,WorkingSeeds+2		    ; hl -> qq+2
  92+ 9A58 86           		add	    a,(hl)
  93+ 9A59 32 DB 95     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+4),a			; e = x + [c]
  94+ 9A5C 79           		ld		a,c
  95+ 9A5D 21 DA 95     		ld		hl,WorkingSeeds+3			; HL -> QQ+3 )we don't inc as it affects carry)
  96+ 9A60 8E           		adc		a,(hl)
  97+ 9A61 32 DC 95     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+5),a			; f = y + [d] + carry
  98+ 9A64 C9           		ret
  99+ 9A65
 100+ 9A65 32           working_distX	DB 50
 101+ 9A66 32           working_distY	DB 50
 102+ 9A67 00           current_distY	DB 0
 103+ 9A68
 104+ 9A68 AF           find_present_system:    xor		a
 105+ 9A69 32 D7 94                             ld		(XSAV),a
 106+ 9A6C 3A BF 94     .CounterLoop:           ld		a,(SystemSeed+1)				; QQ15+1 \ seed Ycoord of star
 107+ 9A6F 4F                                   ld		c,a
 108+ 9A70 3A EA 95     .calcLocaldy:           ld		a,(PresentSystemY)
 109+ 9A73 47                                   ld		b,a								; so b holds Y ccord
 110+ 9A74 79                                   ld		a,c
 111+ 9A75 90                                   sub		b
 112+ 9A76 CB 7F                                bit		7,a
 113+ 9A78 28 02                                jr		z,.positivedy
 114+ 9A7A ED 44        .negativedy:            neg
 115+ 9A7C 32 67 9A     .positivedy:            ld		(current_distY),a				; save cuirrent_dist Y as we need it maybe
 116+ 9A7F ED 5B 65 9A                          ld		de,(working_distX)
 117+ 9A83 BA                                   cp		d
 118+ 9A84 30 24                                jr		nc,.toofar
 119+ 9A86 3A C1 94     .calcLocaldx:           ld		a,(SystemSeed+3)				; QQ15+3 \ seed Xcoord of star
 120+ 9A89 4F                                   ld		c,a
 121+ 9A8A 3A E9 95                             ld		a,(PresentSystemX)
 122+ 9A8D 47                                   ld		b,a								; so b holds Y ccord
 123+ 9A8E 79                                   ld		a,c
 124+ 9A8F 90                                   sub		b
 125+ 9A90 CB 7F                                bit		7,a
 126+ 9A92 28 02                                jr		z,.positivedx
 127+ 9A94 ED 44        .negativedx:            neg
 128+ 9A96 4F           .positivedx:            ld		c,a
 129+ 9A97 BB                                   cp		e
 130+ 9A98 30 10                                jr		nc,.toofar
 131+ 9A9A 3A 67 9A     .Nearer:			    ld		a,(current_distY) 				; we have a closer system
 132+ 9A9D 47                                   ld		b,a								; we have c to recall Y into b
 133+ 9A9E ED 43 65 9A                          ld		(working_distX),bc
 134+ 9AA2 C5                                   push	bc
 135+ 9AA3 CD DB 99                             call 	copy_system_to_working
 136+ 9AA6 C1                                   pop		bc
 137+ 9AA7 78                                   ld		a,b								;
 138+ 9AA8 B1                                   or		c								;
 139+ 9AA9 C8                                   ret		z								; if we have distance 0 then bang on
 140+ 9AAA CD E3 99     .toofar:                call	next_system_seed
 141+ 9AAD 3A D7 94                             ld		a,(XSAV)
 142+ 9AB0 3D                                   dec		a
 143+ 9AB1 FE 00                                cp		0
 144+ 9AB3 C8                                   ret		z
 145+ 9AB4 32 D7 94                             ld		(XSAV),a
 146+ 9AB7 18 B3                                jr		.CounterLoop
 147+ 9AB9
 148+ 9AB9              get_planet_data_working_seed:
 149+ 9AB9 3A D8 95     		ld		a, (WorkingSeeds+1)
 150+ 9ABC E6 07        		and		7
 151+ 9ABE 32 C4 95     		ld		(DisplayEcononmy),a
 152+ 9AC1 3A D9 95     		ld		a, (WorkingSeeds+2)
 153+ 9AC4 CB 3F        		srl	a
 154+ 9AC6 CB 3F        		srl	a
 155+ 9AC8 CB 3F        		srl	a
 156+ 9ACA CB 3F        		srl	a								; c/8
 157+ 9ACC E6 07        		and		7
 158+ 9ACE 32 C5 95     		ld		(DisplayGovernment),a
 159+ 9AD1 CB 3F        		srl	a
 160+ 9AD3 FE 00        		cp		0
 161+ 9AD5 20 08        		jr		nz,.CanBeRich
 162+ 9AD7              .Fedual:
 163+ 9AD7 3A C4 95     		ld		a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 164+ 9ADA F6 02        		or		2							; Adjust Eco for Anarchy and Feudal, set bit 1.
 165+ 9ADC 32 C4 95     		ld		(DisplayEcononmy),a
 166+ 9ADF              .CanBeRich:
 167+ 9ADF 3A C4 95     		ld		a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 168+ 9AE2 EE 07        		xor		7							; flip economy so Rich is now 7
 169+ 9AE4 32 C6 95     		ld		(DisplayTekLevel),a			; Flipped Eco, EcoEOR7, Rich Ind = 7
 170+ 9AE7 47           		ld		b,a
 171+ 9AE8 3A DA 95     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+3)
 172+ 9AEB E6 03        		and		3
 173+ 9AED 80           		add		a,b
 174+ 9AEE 32 C6 95     		ld		(DisplayTekLevel),a			; Tek Level += seed d & 3
 175+ 9AF1 3A C5 95     		ld		a,(DisplayGovernment)		; Government, 0 is Anarchy
 176+ 9AF4 CB 3F        		srl		a 							; gov/2
 177+ 9AF6 47           		ld		b,a
 178+ 9AF7 3A C6 95     		ld		a,(DisplayTekLevel)
 179+ 9AFA 80           		add		a,b
 180+ 9AFB 32 C6 95     		ld		(DisplayTekLevel),a			; Tek += gov /2
 181+ 9AFE CB 27        		sla		a
 182+ 9B00 CB 27        		sla		a							; Onto Population (TL-1)*= 4
 183+ 9B02 47           		ld		b,a
 184+ 9B03 3A C4 95     		ld		a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 185+ 9B06 80           		add		a,b                  		; TechLevel*4 + Eco   7-56
 186+ 9B07 47           		ld		b,a
 187+ 9B08 3A C5 95     		ld		a,(DisplayGovernment)
 188+ 9B0B 3C           		inc		a  							; +Government, 0 is Anarchy + 1
 189+ 9B0C 32 C7 95     		ld		(DisplayPopulation),a
 190+ 9B0F 3A C4 95     		ld		a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 191+ 9B12 EE 07        		xor		7							; Onto productivity
 192+ 9B14 C6 03        		add		3							;  (Flipped eco +3)
 193+ 9B16 57           		ld		d,a
 194+ 9B17 3A C5 95     		ld		a,(DisplayGovernment)		; Government, 0 is Anarchy
 195+ 9B1A C6 04        		add		4
 196+ 9B1C 5F           		ld		e,a
 197+ 9B1D ED 30        		mul									; ; DE = d*e, Productivity part 1. has hsb in A, lsb in P.
 198+ 9B1F 3A C7 95     		ld		a,(DisplayPopulation)		; then we use d for radius
 199+ 9B22 57           		ld		d,a
 200+ 9B23 ED 30        		mul
 201+ 9B25 CB 23        		sla		e
 202+ 9B27 CB 1A        		rr		d
 203+ 9B29 CB 23        		sla		e
 204+ 9B2B CB 1A        		rr		d
 205+ 9B2D CB 23        		sla		e
 206+ 9B2F CB 1A        		rr		d							; de * 8
 207+ 9B31 ED 53 C9 95  		ld		(DisplayProductivity),de
 208+ 9B35              .DoRadius:
 209+ 9B35 3A DA 95     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+3)
 210+ 9B38 4F           		ld		c,a
 211+ 9B39 3A DC 95     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+5)
 212+ 9B3C E6 0F        		and		$0F							;  lower 4 bits of w2_h determine planet radius
 213+ 9B3E C6 0B        		add		11							;  radius min = 256*11 = 2816 km
 214+ 9B40 47           		ld		b,a							;
 215+ 9B41 ED 43 CD 95  		ld		(DisplayRadius),bc
 216+ 9B45 C9           		ret
 217+ 9B46
# file closed: ./Variables/galaxy_seed.asm

  38+ 9C8C              getTableText:
  39+ 9C8C              ; ">getTableText, hl = indexlist, a = textnbr, returns with hl = porinter to head of text"
  40+ 9C8C              ; ">Note for ranking first 2 bytes are target rank"
  41+ 9C8C D5           	push	de								; save DE as we will likley need it in caller
  42+ 9C8D ED 31        	add		hl,a							; 0 based ref, and its 2 bytes
  43+ 9C8F ED 31        	add		hl,a
  44+ 9C91 5E           	ld		e,(hl)
  45+ 9C92 23           	inc		hl
  46+ 9C93 56           	ld		d,(hl)							; de = indexed address
  47+ 9C94 EB           	ex		de,hl							; flip it to hl
  48+ 9C95 D1           	pop		de								; retrieve de
  49+ 9C96 C9           	ret										; return with hl as start entry
  50+ 9C97
  51+ 9C97
  52+ 9C97              ;               CF      ZF      Result
  53+ 9C97              ;               -----------------------------------
  54+ 9C97              ;               0       0       HL > DE
  55+ 9C97              ;               0       1       HL == DE
  56+ 9C97              ;               1       0       HL < DE
  57+ 9C97              ;               1       1       Impossible
  58+ 9C97              getRankIndex:
  59+ 9C97              ; ">getRank, de = kill count, returns a = index,hl destroyed"
  60+ 9C97              ; ">Note for ranking first 2 bytes are target rank"
  61+ 9C97 7A           	ld		a,d
  62+ 9C98 B3           	or		e
  63+ 9C99 FE 00        	cp		0
  64+ 9C9B C8           	ret		z								; quicks skip for 0 kills
  65+ 9C9C AF           	xor 	a
  66+ 9C9D 21 EB 9B     	ld		hl,RankingTable
  67+ 9CA0              .testLoop:
  68+ 9CA0 4E           	ld		c,(hl)
  69+ 9CA1 23           	inc		hl
  70+ 9CA2 46           	ld		b,(hl)							; bc = ranking
  71+ 9CA3 E5           	push	hl
  72+ 9CA4 60           	ld		h,b
  73+ 9CA5 69           	ld		l,c
  74+ 9CA6 CD 84 A8     	call	compare16HLDE
  75+ 9CA9 38 06        	jr		c,.HLLTDE
  76+ 9CAB              .HLGTEDE									; Found the correct rank
  77+ 9CAB E1           	pop		hl
  78+ 9CAC 23           	inc		hl								; move to next value
  79+ 9CAD 23           	inc		hl
  80+ 9CAE 3C           	inc		a								; we canloop forever as if kills was $FFFF then hits nutter rank but also +1 = 0000 as its 16 bit
  81+ 9CAF 18 EF        	jr		.testLoop
  82+ 9CB1              .HLLTDE:									; HL < Kills so found correct rank
  83+ 9CB1 E1           	pop		hl
  84+ 9CB2 C9           	ret
  85+ 9CB3

 176+ A113 00 00 00...  TextBuffer			DS	33
 177+ A134
 178+ A134              TextEconomyOffset   EQU (TextTokenEconomy - TextTokens)/2
 179+ A134              TextGovOffset       EQU (WordIdxGovernment - WordIdx)/2
 180+ A134
 181+ A134              CapitaliseString:
 182+ A134              ; ">CapitaliseString hl = address"
 183+ A134              .CapLoop:
 184+ A134 23           	inc		hl
 185+ A135 7E           	ld		a,(hl)
 186+ A136 FE 00        	cp		0
 187+ A138 C8           	ret		z
 188+ A139 FE 5B        	cp		'Z'+1
 189+ A13B 30 F7        	jr		nc,.CapLoop
 190+ A13D FE 41        	cp		'A'
 191+ A13F 38 F3        	jr		c,.CapLoop
 192+ A141              .LowerCase:
 193+ A141 C6 20        	add		a,'a'-'A'
 194+ A143 77           	ld		(hl),a
 195+ A144 18 EE        	jr		.CapLoop
 196+ A146
 197+ A146              WordIndexToAddress:
 198+ A146 21 B7 9F     	ld		hl,WordIdx
 199+ A149 ED 31        	add		hl,a
 200+ A14B ED 31        	add		hl,a
 201+ A14D D5           	push	de
 202+ A14E 5E           	ld		e,(hl)
 203+ A14F 23           	inc		hl
 204+ A150 56           	ld		d,(hl)
 205+ A151 EB           	ex		de,hl
 206+ A152 D1           	pop		de
 207+ A153 C9           	ret
 208+ A154
 209+ A154
 210+ A154              expandTokenToString:
 211+ A154              ; ">expandTokenToString a = texttoken"
 212+ A154 21 DD A0     	ld		hl,TextTokens
 213+ A157 CD 8C 9C     	call	getTableText
 214+ A15A 11 13 A1     	ld		de,TextBuffer
 215+ A15D              .ReadLoop:
 216+ A15D 7E           	ld		a,(hl)
 217+ A15E FE 00        	cp		0
 218+ A160 28 1B        	jr		z,.ReadDone
 219+ A162 E5           	push	hl
 220+ A163 D5           	push	de
 221+ A164 21 B7 9F     	ld		hl,WordIdx
 222+ A167 CD 8C 9C     	call	getTableText
 223+ A16A D1           	pop		de
 224+ A16B              .WordExpandLoop:
 225+ A16B 7E           	ld		a,(hl)
 226+ A16C FE 00        	cp		0
 227+ A16E 28 05        	jr		z,.AddSpace
 228+ A170              ;.GetChar:
 229+ A170 12           	ld		(de),a
 230+ A171 13           	inc		de
 231+ A172 23           	inc		hl
 232+ A173 18 F6        	jr		.WordExpandLoop
 233+ A175              .AddSpace:
 234+ A175 3E 20        	ld		a,' '
 235+ A177 12           	ld		(de),a
 236+ A178 13           	inc		de
 237+ A179 E1           	pop		hl
 238+ A17A 23           	inc		hl
 239+ A17B 18 E0        	jr		.ReadLoop
 240+ A17D              .ReadDone:
 241+ A17D 1B           	dec		de
 242+ A17E AF           	xor		a
 243+ A17F 12           	ld		(de),a
 244+ A180 C9           	ret
 245+ A181
# file closed: ./Tables/dictionary.asm

  12+ A1FA              NamingLoop:
  13+ A1FA 3A DC 95     	ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+5)	; a = first byte of name seed
  14+ A1FD E6 1F        	and 	$1F					; Keep bottom 5 bits only
  15+ A1FF FE 00        	cp		0					; 0 = skip 2 chars
  16+ A201 28 12        	jr		z,.SkipPhrase
  17+ A203 C6 0C        	add		a,12
  18+ A205 CB 27        	sla		a					; phrase = (a+12)*2
  19+ A207 21 81 A1     	ld		hl,name_digrams
  20+ A20A ED 31        	add		hl,a
  21+ A20C ED A0        	ldi
  22+ A20E 7E           	ld		a,(hl)
  23+ A20F FE 3F        	cp		'?'
  24+ A211 28 02        	jr		z,.SkipPhrase
  25+ A213              .AddExtra:
  26+ A213 ED A0        	ldi
  27+ A215              .SkipPhrase:
  28+ A215 D5           	push	de
  29+ A216 CD 2A 9A     	call	working_seed
  30+ A219 D1           	pop		de
  31+ A21A C9           	ret

  46+ A21B              ;	call	NamingLoop
  47+ A21B              ;.SmallSizeName:

  49+ A21B              ;	call	NamingLoop
  50+ A21B              ;	call	NamingLoop

  62+ A21B              ;	ld		de,name_expanded
  63+ A21B              ;.ExpansionLoop:
  64+ A21B              ;	push	bc
  65+ A21B              ;	ld		hl,WorkingSeeds
  66+ A21B              ;	ld		a,b
  67+ A21B              ;	add		hl,a
  68+ A21B              ;	ld		a,(hl)	; a = first byte of name seed
  69+ A21B              ;	and 	$1F					; Keep bottom 5 bits only
  70+ A21B              ;	cp		0					; 0 = skip 2 chars
  71+ A21B              ;	jr		z,.SkipPhrase
  72+ A21B              ;	or		&80					; set buit 7 high (probabtyl capitalisation)
  73+ A21B              ;	call	TT27
  74+ A21B              ;.SkipPhrase:
  75+ A21B              ;	push	de
  76+ A21B              ;	call	next_working_seed
  77+ A21B              ;	pop		de
  78+ A21B              ;	pop		bc
  79+ A21B              ;	djnz	GetDigramWorkingSeed
  80+ A21B              ;.DoneName:
  81+ A21B              ;	ex		de,hl
  82+ A21B              ;	ld		(hl),0
  83+ A21B              ;	ex		de,hl
  84+ A21B              ;	ret
  85+ A21B              ;
  86+ A21B              ;ExpandToken:
  87+ A21B              ;	DE = target
  88+ A21B              ;	a = token
  89+ A21B              ;
  90+ A21B              ;PlanetDigram:
  91+ A21B              ;	cp		&A0							; >- 160
  92+ A21B              ;	jr		c,MorePage4
  93+ A21B              ;	and		$7F							; 128 to 159 now 0 to 31
  94+ A21B              ;	asl		2							; Multiply by 2
  95+ A21B              ;	ld		hl, name_digrams2
  96+ A21B              ;	add		hl,a
  97+ A21B              ;	ld		a,(hl)
  98+ A21B              ;	call	ProcessTextToken
  99+ A21B              ;	inc		hl
 100+ A21B              ;	ld		a,(hl)
 101+ A21B              ;	cp		'?'
 102+ A21B              ;	ret		z
 103+ A21B              ;	call	ProcessTextToken
 104+ A21B              ;	ret
 105+ A21B              ;MorePage4:
 106+ A21B              ;	sub		$A0
 107+ A21B              ;ExtraTokenCheck:
 108+ A21B              ;	push	de							; save target address
 109+ A21B              ;	push	bc
 110+ A21B              ;	ld		b,a
 111+ A21B              ;	ld		hl,varV
 112+ A21B              ;	ld		(VarV),0400
 113+ A21B              ;	ld		(varV),a
 114+ A21B              ;	ld
 115+ A21B              ;
 116+ A21B              ;		.TT43	\ Token > 127 page4 token or planet digram.
 117+ A21B              ;C9 A0                   CMP #&A0	      \ >= #160 ?
 118+ A21B              ;B0 14                   BCS TT47	      \ more page4, subtract #160
 119+ A21B              ;29 7F                   AND #&7F	      \ else token 128to159  -> 0 to 31
 120+ A21B              ;0A                      ASL A		      \ *= 2
 121+ A21B              ;A8                      TAY 		      \ digram index = 0to62
 122+ A21B              ;B9 80 08                LDA &0880,Y \ QQ16,Y  \ ALLEXEGEZACEBISOUSESARMAINDIREA?ER  etc.
 123+ A21B              ;20 9A 33                JSR &339A   \ TT27    \ process text token
 124+ A21B              ;B9 81 08                LDA &0881,Y \ QQ16+1,Y \ 2nd character of diagram. Flight copied down from docked code.
 125+ A21B              ;C9 3F                   CMP #&3F	      \ is second letter '?'
 126+ A21B              ;F0 40                   BEQ TT48    	      \ rts, name has odd-number of letters.
 127+ A21B              ;4C 9A 33                JMP &339A   \ TT27    \ process text token
 128+ A21B              ;
 129+ A21B              ;	.TT47	\ more page4, subtract #160
 130+ A21B              ;E9 A0                   SBC #&A0	\ -= 160
 131+ A21B              ;	.ex	\ -> &342D \ extra, token >= 96 or Acc = 128to145 or -=160
 132+ A21B              ;AA                      TAX 		\ copy of word index
 133+ A21B              ;A9 00                   LDA #0		\ page 4 words lo  #QQ18 MOD 256
 134+ A21B              ;85 22                   STA &22		\ V
 135+ A21B              ;A9 04                   LDA #4		\ page 4 words hi  #QQ18 DIV 256
 136+ A21B              ;85 23                   STA &23		\ V+1
 137+ A21B              ;A0 00                   LDY #0
 138+ A21B              ;8A                      TXA 		\ token = word index
 139+ A21B              ;F0 13                   BEQ TT50	\ if X=0 then Y offset to word correct
 140+ A21B              ;	.TT51	\ counters Y letter, X token
 141+ A21B              ;B1 22                   LDA (&22),Y	\ (V),Y
 142+ A21B              ;F0 07                   BEQ TT49	\ exit as word ended
 143+ A21B              ;C8                      INY 		\ letter count
 144+ A21B              ;D0 F9                   BNE TT51	\ loop Y
 145+ A21B              ;E6 23                   INC &23	  \ V+1 \ next page as Y reached 256
 146+ A21B              ;D0 F5                   BNE TT51    	\ guaranteed, loop Y letter
 147+ A21B              ;	.TT49	\ word ended
 148+ A21B              ;C8                      INY
 149+ A21B              ;D0 02                   BNE TT59    	\ next word
 150+ A21B              ;E6 23                   INC &23	  \ V+1	\ next page as Y reached 256
 151+ A21B              ;	.TT59	\ next word
 152+ A21B              ;CA                      DEX 		\ token count
 153+ A21B              ;D0 ED                   BNE TT51	\ loop X token
 154+ A21B              ;	.TT50	\ token X = 0, counter Y offset to word correct
 155+ A21B              ;98                      TYA
 156+ A21B              ;48                      PHA 		\ store Yindex
 157+ A21B              ;A5 23                   LDA &23		\ V+1
 158+ A21B              ;48                      PHA 		\ correct pointer hi
 159+ A21B              ;B1 22                   LDA (&22),Y 	\ (V),Y
 160+ A21B              ;49 23                   EOR #&23	\ decode '#'
 161+ A21B              ;20 9A 33                JSR &339A \ TT27 \ process text token to next depth
 162+ A21B              ;68                      PLA 		\ restore this depth's Vhi
 163+ A21B              ;85 23                   STA &23		\ V+1
 164+ A21B              ;68                      PLA
 165+ A21B              ;A8                      TAY 		\ restore this depth's Yindex
 166+ A21B              ;C8                      INY 		\ next letter
 167+ A21B              ;D0 02                   BNE P%+4	\ not zero so skip next page
 168+ A21B              ;E6 23                   INC &23		\ V+1
 169+ A21B              ;B1 22                   LDA (&22),Y	\ (V),Y
 170+ A21B              ;D0 E6                   BNE TT50    	\ loop Y for next letter of page4 token
 171+ A21B              ;	.TT48 	\ rts
 172+ A21B              ;60                      RTS 		\ end of flight token printing TT27
 173+ A21B              ;
 174+ A21B              ;
 175+ A21B              ;
 176+ A21B              ;
 177+ A21B              ;
 178+ A21B              ;
 179+ A21B              ;		.TT27	\ -> &36E0 \ process flight text Token in Acc
 180+ A21B              ;;AA                      TAX		\ copy token to count down
 181+ A21B              ;;F0 DE                   BEQ csh		\ Acc = 0, up to Cash
 182+ A21B              ;30 74                   BMI TT43	\ if token is >  127 down, page4 token or digram
 183+ A21B              ;CA                      DEX
 184+ A21B              ;F0 BC                   BEQ tal		\ Acc == 1, up, print Galaxy number.
 185+ A21B              ;CA                      DEX
 186+ A21B              ;F0 A3                   BEQ ypl		\ Acc == 2, up, present planet in QQ2.
 187+ A21B              ;CA                      DEX
 188+ A21B              ;D0 03                   BNE P%+5	\ hop over, else X == 0
 189+ A21B              ;4C 0A 33                JMP &330A \ cpl \ Acc = 3 print Planet name for seed QQ15
 190+ A21B              ;CA                      DEX
 191+ A21B              ;F0 8A                   BEQ cmn		\ Acc == 4, up, commander name.
 192+ A21B              ;CA                      DEX
 193+ A21B              ;F0 B5                   BEQ fwl		\ Acc == 5, up, fuel followed by cash.
 194+ A21B              ;CA                      DEX
 195+ A21B              ;D0 05                   BNE  P%+7	\ hop over, else X == 0
 196+ A21B              ;A9 80                   LDA #&80	\ Acc == 6, set bit 7 TT27m
 197+ A21B              ;85 72                   STA &72	 	\ QQ17
 198+ A21B              ;60                      RTS
 199+ A21B              ;CA                      DEX 		\ skip Acc ==7
 200+ A21B              ;CA                      DEX
 201+ A21B              ;D0 03                   BNE P%+5	\ hop over to continue Acc 9to127
 202+ A21B              ;86 72                   STX &72	 \ QQ17	\ else Acc ==8, QQ17 set to X = 0
 203+ A21B              ;60                      RTS
 204+ A21B              ;CA                      DEX 		\ continue 9to127 tokens
 205+ A21B              ;F0 38                   BEQ crlf	\ Acc == 9, down, colon on right.
 206+ A21B              ;C9 60                   CMP #&60	\ discard X, look at Acc = token >= 96
 207+ A21B              ;B0 66                   BCS ex   	\ extra >= #&60, far down
 208+ A21B              ;C9 0E                   CMP #14		\ < 14 ?
 209+ A21B              ;90 04                   BCC P%+6	\ goes to Token < 14 or > 31
 210+ A21B              ;C9 20                   CMP #32		\ < 32 ?
 211+ A21B              ;90 28                   BCC qw   	\ 14 <= token A < 32 becomes 128to145 page4 digram
 212+ A21B              ;		\ Token  < 14 or > 31
 213+ A21B              ;A6 72                   LDX &72	 	\ QQ17
 214+ A21B              ;F0 3D                   BEQ TT74 	\ if QQ17 = 0 Upper case, jmp TT26, print character.
 215+ A21B              ;30 11                   BMI TT41 	\ if bit7 set
 216+ A21B              ;24 72                   BIT &72		\ QQ17 has bit6 set too
 217+ A21B              ;70 30                   BVS TT46 	\ If only bit6 set, clear bit6 and print as Upper
 218+ A21B              ;	.TT42	\ Uppercase to lowercase
 219+ A21B              ;C9 41                   CMP #&41	\ < ascii 'A'
 220+ A21B              ;90 06                   BCC TT44 	\ jmp TT26, print character
 221+ A21B              ;C9 5B                   CMP #&5B	\ >= ascii 'Z'+1
 222+ A21B              ;B0 02                   BCS TT44 	\ jmp TT26, print character
 223+ A21B              ;69 20                   ADC #&20	\ else Upper to lowercase
 224+ A21B              ;	.TT44	\ print character as is with TT26
 225+ A21B              ;4C FC 1E                JMP &1EFC \ TT26 \ print character
 226+ A21B              ;
 227+ A21B              ;	.TT41	\ QQ17 bit7 set
 228+ A21B              ;24 72                   BIT &72		\ QQ17
 229+ A21B              ;70 17                   BVS TT45	\ bit6 set too, Nothing or lower.
 230+ A21B              ;C9 41                   CMP #&41	\ < ascii 'A'
 231+ A21B              ;90 22                   BCC TT74 	\ print as is using TT26
 232+ A21B              ;48                      PHA 		\ else store token Acc
 233+ A21B              ;8A                      TXA 		\ QQ17 copy
 234+ A21B              ;09 40                   ORA #&40	\ set bit6 in QQ17 so subsequent ones lower
 235+ A21B              ;85 72                   STA &72	 	\ QQ17
 236+ A21B              ;68                      PLA 		\ restore token
 237+ A21B              ;D0 EC                   BNE TT44	\ guaranteed up, print as Uppercase with TT26.
 238+ A21B              ;
 239+ A21B              ;	.qw	\ Acc = 14to31 becomes 128to145 page4 digram
 240+ A21B              ;69 72                   ADC #&72	\ A+=114 becomes 128to145 page4 digram
 241+ A21B              ;D0 32                   BNE ex		\ guaranteed down, extra.
 242+ A21B              ;
 243+ A21B              ;	.crlf	\ Acc == 9,  colon on right
 244+ A21B              ;A9 15                   LDA #21		\ on right
 245+ A21B              ;85 2C                   STA &2C		\ XC
 246+ A21B              ;D0 97                   BNE TT73	\ guaranteed up, print colon.
 247+ A21B              ;
 248+ A21B              ;	.TT45	\ QQ17 bits 7,6 set. Nothing or lower.
 249+ A21B              ;E0 FF                   CPX #&FF	\ if QQ17 = #&FF
 250+ A21B              ;F0 63                   BEQ TT48	\ rts
 251+ A21B              ;C9 41                   CMP #&41	\ >= ascii 'A' ?
 252+ A21B              ;B0 D0                   BCS TT42	\ Uppercase to lowercase, up.
 253+ A21B              ;	.TT46	\ clear bit6 QQ17 and print as is using TT26
 254+ A21B              ;48                      PHA 		\ push token
 255+ A21B              ;8A                      TXA 		\ QQ17 copy
 256+ A21B              ;29 BF                   AND #&BF	\ clear bit6
 257+ A21B              ;85 72                   STA &72	 	\ QQ17
 258+ A21B              ;68                      PLA 		\ pull token
 259+ A21B              ;	.TT74	\ TT26, print character.
 260+ A21B              ;4C FC 1E                JMP &1EFC	\ TT26
 261+ A21B              ;
 262+ A21B              ;	.TT43	\ Token > 127 page4 token or planet digram.
 263+ A21B              ;C9 A0                   CMP #&A0	      \ >= #160 ?
 264+ A21B              ;B0 14                   BCS TT47	      \ more page4, subtract #160
 265+ A21B              ;29 7F                   AND #&7F	      \ else token 128to159  -> 0 to 31
 266+ A21B              ;0A                      ASL A		      \ *= 2
 267+ A21B              ;A8                      TAY 		      \ digram index = 0to62
 268+ A21B              ;B9 80 08                LDA &0880,Y \ QQ16,Y  \ ALLEXEGEZACEBISOUSESARMAINDIREA?ER  etc.
 269+ A21B              ;20 9A 33                JSR &339A   \ TT27    \ process text token
 270+ A21B              ;B9 81 08                LDA &0881,Y \ QQ16+1,Y \ 2nd character of diagram. Flight copied down from docked code.
 271+ A21B              ;C9 3F                   CMP #&3F	      \ is second letter '?'
 272+ A21B              ;F0 40                   BEQ TT48    	      \ rts, name has odd-number of letters.
 273+ A21B              ;4C 9A 33                JMP &339A   \ TT27    \ process text token
 274+ A21B              ;
 275+ A21B              ;	.TT47	\ more page4, subtract #160
 276+ A21B              ;E9 A0                   SBC #&A0	\ -= 160
 277+ A21B              ;	.ex	\ -> &342D \ extra, token >= 96 or Acc = 128to145 or -=160
 278+ A21B              ;AA                      TAX 		\ copy of word index
 279+ A21B              ;A9 00                   LDA #0		\ page 4 words lo  #QQ18 MOD 256
 280+ A21B              ;85 22                   STA &22		\ V
 281+ A21B              ;A9 04                   LDA #4		\ page 4 words hi  #QQ18 DIV 256
 282+ A21B              ;85 23                   STA &23		\ V+1
 283+ A21B              ;A0 00                   LDY #0
 284+ A21B              ;8A                      TXA 		\ token = word index
 285+ A21B              ;F0 13                   BEQ TT50	\ if X=0 then Y offset to word correct

 287+ A21B              ;B1 22                   LDA (&22),Y	\ (V),Y
 288+ A21B              ;F0 07                   BEQ TT49	\ exit as word ended

 309+ A21B              ;85 23                   STA &23		\ V+1

   1+ A21B              addhldesigned:
   2+ A21B CB 7C                bit     7,h
   3+ A21D 20 03                jr      nz,.noneghl
   4+ A21F CD 9A A8             call    negate16hl
   5+ A222              .noneghl:
   6+ A222 CB 7A                bit     7,d
   7+ A224 20 03                jr      nz,.nonegde
   8+ A226 CD A1 A8             call    negate16de
   9+ A229              .nonegde:
  10+ A229 19                   add     hl,de                       ; do 2'd c add
  11+ A22A AF                   xor     a                           ; assume positive
  12+ A22B CB 7C                bit     7,h
  13+ A22D C8                   ret     z                           ; if not set then can exit early
  14+ A22E CD 9A A8             call    negate16hl
  15+ A231 3E FF                ld      a,$FF
  16+ A233 C9                   ret

 985  A234                  INCLUDE "./Maths/addhlasigned.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/addhlasigned.asm
   1+ A234              ; HL = HL (signed) + A (unsigned), uses HL, DE, A
   2+ A234 57           AddAusngToHLsng:        ld      d,a
   3+ A235 5C                                   ld      e,h
   4+ A236 7C                                   ld      a,h
   5+ A237 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
   6+ A239 67                                   ld      h,a
   7+ A23A 7A                                   ld      a,d
   8+ A23B ED 31                                add     hl,a
   9+ A23D 7B                                   ld      a,e
  10+ A23E E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  11+ A240 B4                                   or      h
  12+ A241 C9                                   ret
  13+ A242              ; HL = A (unsigned) - HL (signed), uses HL, DE, BC, A
  14+ A242 44           HLEequAusngMinusHLsng:  ld      b,h
  15+ A243 4F                                   ld      c,a
  16+ A244 78                                   ld      a,b
  17+ A245 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  18+ A247 20 08                                jr      nz,.DoAdd
  19+ A249 EB           .DoSubtract:            ex      de,hl               ; move hl into de
  20+ A24A 26 00                                ld      h,0                 ; hl = a
  21+ A24C 69                                   ld      l,c
  22+ A24D                                      ClearCarryFlag
  22+ A24D B7          >                    or a
  23+ A24E ED 52                                sbc     hl,de               ; hl = a - hl
  24+ A250 C9                                   ret
  25+ A251 79           .DoAdd:                 ld      a,c
  26+ A252 ED 31                                add hl,a
  27+ A254 C9                                   ret
  28+ A255
  29+ A255              ; DEL = DEL + BCH signed, uses BC, DE, HL, IY, A
  30+ A255 78           AddBCHtoDELsigned:      ld      a,b                 ; Are the values both the same sign?
  31+ A256 AA                                   xor     d                   ; .
  32+ A257 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit        ; .
  33+ A259 20 19                                jr      nz,.SignDifferent   ; .
  34+ A25B 78           .SignSame:              ld      a,b                 ; if they are then we only need 1 signe
  35+ A25C E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit        ; so store it in iyh
  36+ A25E FD 67                                ld      iyh,a               ;
  37+ A260 78                                   ld      a,b                 ; bch = abs bch
  38+ A261 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
  39+ A263 47                                   ld      b,a                 ; .
  40+ A264 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; del = abs del
  41+ A265 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
  42+ A267 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; .
  43+ A268 7C                                   ld      a,h                 ; l = h + l
  44+ A269 85                                   add     l                   ; .
  45+ A26A 6F                                   ld      l,a                 ; .
  46+ A26B 79                                   ld      a,c                 ; e = e + c + carry
  47+ A26C 8B                                   adc     e                   ; .
  48+ A26D 5F                                   ld      e,a                 ; .
  49+ A26E 78                                   ld      a,b                 ; d = b + d + carry (signed)
  50+ A26F 8A                                   adc     d                   ;
  51+ A270 FD B4                                or      iyh                 ; d = or back in sign bit
  52+ A272 57                                   ld      d,a                 ;
  53+ A273 C9                                   ret                         ; done
  54+ A274 78           .SignDifferent:         ld      a,b                 ; bch = abs bch
  55+ A275 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a               ; iyh = b sign
  56+ A277 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
  57+ A279 47                                   ld      b,a                 ; .
  58+ A27A 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; del = abs del
  59+ A27B FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a               ; iyl = d sign
  60+ A27D E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
  61+ A27F 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; .
  62+ A280 E5                                   push    hl                  ; hl = bc - de
  63+ A281 60 69                                ld      hl,bc               ; if bc < de then there is a carry
  64+ A283 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de               ;
  65+ A285 E1                                   pop     hl                  ;
  66+ A286 38 0E                                jr      c,.BCHltDEL
  67+ A288 20 1C                                jr      nz,.DELltBCH        ; if the result was not zero then DEL > BCH
  68+ A28A 7C           .BCeqDE:                ld      a,h                 ; if the result was zero then check lowest bits
  69+ A28B                                      JumpIfALTNusng l,.BCHltDEL
  69+ A28B BD          >                        cp      l
  69+ A28C DA 96 A2    >                        jp		c, .BCHltDEL
  70+ A28F 20 15                                jr      nz,.DELltBCH
  71+ A291              ; The same so its just zero
  72+ A291 AF           .BCHeqDEL:              xor     a                  ; its just zero
  73+ A292 57                                   ld      d,a                ; .
  74+ A293 5F                                   ld      e,a                ; .
  75+ A294 6F                                   ld      l,a                ; .
  76+ A295 C9                                   ret                        ; .
  77+ A296              ;BCH is less than DEL so its DEL - BCH the sort out sign
  78+ A296 7D           .BCHltDEL:              ld      a,l                ; l = l - h                      ; ex
  79+ A297 94                                   sub     h                  ; .                              ;   01D70F DEL
  80+ A298 6F                                   ld      l,a                ; .                              ;  -000028 BCH
  81+ A299 7B                                   ld      a,e                ; e = e - c - carry              ;1.
  82+ A29A 99                                   sbc     c                  ; .                              ;
  83+ A29B 5F                                   ld      e,a                ; .                              ;
  84+ A29C 7A                                   ld      a,d                ; d = d - b - carry              ;
  85+ A29D 98                                   sbc     b                  ; .                              ;
  86+ A29E 57                                   ld      d,a                ; .                              ;
  87+ A29F FD 7D                                ld      a,iyl              ; as d was larger, take d sign
  88+ A2A1 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit       ;
  89+ A2A3 B2                                   or      d                  ;
  90+ A2A4 57                                   ld      d,a                ;
  91+ A2A5 C9                                   ret
  92+ A2A6 7C           .DELltBCH:              ld      a,h                ; l = h - l
  93+ A2A7 95                                   sub     l                  ;
  94+ A2A8 6F                                   ld      l,a                ;
  95+ A2A9 79                                   ld      a,c                ; e = c - e - carry
  96+ A2AA 9B                                   sbc     e                  ;
  97+ A2AB 5F                                   ld      e,a                ;
  98+ A2AC 78                                   ld      a,b                ; d = b - d - carry
  99+ A2AD 9A                                   sbc     d                  ;
 100+ A2AE 57                                   ld      d,a                ;
 101+ A2AF FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh              ; as b was larger, take b sign into d
 102+ A2B1 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit       ;
 103+ A2B3 B2                                   or      d                  ;
 104+ A2B4 57                                   ld      d,a                ;
 105+ A2B5 C9                                   ret
 106+ A2B6
 107+ A2B6
 108+ A2B6              ;BHL = AHL + DE where AHL = 16 bit + A sign and DE = 15 bit signed
 109+ A2B6 47           AddAHLtoDEsigned:       ld      b,a                     ; B = A , C = D (save sign bytes)
 110+ A2B7 4A                                   ld      c,d                     ; .
 111+ A2B8 A9                                   xor     c                       ; A = A xor C
 112+ A2B9 CB BA                                res     7,d                     ; clear sign bit of D
 113+ A2BB 20 02                                jr nz,  .OppositeSigns          ; if A xor C is opposite signs job to A0A1
 114+ A2BD 19                                   add     hl,de                   ; HL = HL + DE
 115+ A2BE C9                                   ret                             ; return
 116+ A2BF ED 52        .OppositeSigns:         sbc     hl,de                   ; HL = HL -DE
 117+ A2C1 D0                                   ret     nc                      ; if no carry return
 118+ A2C2 19                                   add     hl,de                   ; else HL = HL + DE
 119+ A2C3 EB                                   ex      de,hl                   ;      swap HL and DE
 120+ A2C4 A7                                   and     a                       ;      reset carry
 121+ A2C5 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                   ;      HL = DE - HL (as they were swapped)
 122+ A2C7 41                                   ld      b,c                     ;      B = sign of C
 123+ A2C8 C9                                   ret                             ;      ret
 124+ A2C9
 125+ A2C9
 126+ A2C9
 127+ A2C9              ; a = value to add
 128+ A2C9              ; b = offset (equivalent to regX)
 129+ A2C9              ; returns INWK [x] set to new value
 130+ A2C9              addINWKbasigned:
 131+ A2C9 21 0C C0     		ld 		hl,UBnKxlo                  ; hl = INWK 0
 132+ A2CC 4F           		ld      c,a                         ; preserve a
 133+ A2CD 78           		ld		a,b
 134+ A2CE ED 31        		add		hl,a                        ; hl = INWK[x]
 135+ A2D0 79                   ld      a,c                         ; get back a value
 136+ A2D1 E6 80                and     $80                         ; get sign bit from a
 137+ A2D3 47                   ld      b,a                         ; now b = sign bit of a
 138+ A2D4 79                   ld      a,c                         ; a = original value
 139+ A2D5 E6 7F                and     SignMask8Bit                ; a = unsigned version of original value
 140+ A2D7              ; hl = unsigned version of INWK0[b]
 141+ A2D7              ; a = value to add, also in c which will optimise later code
 142+ A2D7              ; b = sign bit of a ( in old code was varT)
 143+ A2D7              addhlcsigned:
 144+ A2D7 5E                   ld      e,(hl)                      ; de = INKK value
 145+ A2D8 23                   inc     hl
 146+ A2D9 56                   ld      d,(hl)
 147+ A2DA 23                   inc     hl                          ; now pointing a sign
 148+ A2DB 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; a = sign bit
 149+ A2DC EB                   ex      de,hl                       ; hl = value now and de = pointer to sign
 150+ A2DD A8                   xor     b                           ; a = resultant sign
 151+ A2DE CB 7F                bit     7,a                         ; is it negative?
 152+ A2E0 28 28                jr      z,.postivecalc
 153+ A2E2              .negativecalc:
 154+ A2E2 7C                   ld      a,h
 155+ A2E3 E6 7F                and     SignMask8Bit
 156+ A2E5 67                   ld      h,a                         ; strip high bit
 157+ A2E6 DD 68                ld      ixl,b                       ; save sign bit from b into d
 158+ A2E8 06 00                ld      b,0                         ; c = value to subtract so now bc = value to subtract
 159+ A2EA ED 42                sbc     hl,bc
 160+ A2EC DD 45                ld      b,ixl                       ; get sign back
 161+ A2EE EB                   ex      de,hl                       ; de = value hl = pointer to sign
 162+ A2EF 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;
 163+ A2F0 E6 7F                and     SignMask8Bit
 164+ A2F2 DE 00                sbc     a,0                         ; subtract carry which could flip sign bit
 165+ A2F4 F6 80                or      $80                         ; set bit 0
 166+ A2F6 A8                   xor     b                           ; flip bit on sign (var T)
 167+ A2F7 77                   ld      (hl),a
 168+ A2F8 2B                   dec     hl
 169+ A2F9 72                   ld      (hl),d
 170+ A2FA 2B                   dec     hl
 171+ A2FB 73                   ld      (hl),e                      ; write out DE to INKW[x]0,1
 172+ A2FC EB                   ex      de,hl                       ; hl = value de = pointer to start if INKW[x]
 173+ A2FD D8                   ret     c                           ; if carry was set then we can exit now
 174+ A2FE              .nocarry:
 175+ A2FE CD 9A A8             call    negate16hl                  ; get hl back to positive, a is still inkw+2
 176+ A301 B0                   or      b                           ; b is still varT
 177+ A302 EB                   ex      de,hl                       ; de = value hl = pointer to start if INKW[x]
 178+ A303 73                   ld      (hl),e
 179+ A304 23                   inc     hl
 180+ A305 72                   ld      (hl),d
 181+ A306 23                   inc     hl
 182+ A307 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; set sign bit in INKK[x]+2
 183+ A308 EB                   ex      de,hl                       ; hl = value de = pointer to sign
 184+ A309 C9                   ret
 185+ A30A              .postivecalc:
 186+ A30A DD 68                ld      ixl,b
 187+ A30C 06 00                ld      b,0
 188+ A30E 19                   add     hl,de
 189+ A30F EB                   ex      de,hl
 190+ A310 DD B5                or      ixl                         ; we don;t need to recover b here
 191+ A312 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; push sign into INWK[x]
 192+ A313 2B                   dec     hl
 193+ A314 72                   ld      (hl),d
 194+ A315 2B                   dec     hl
 195+ A316 73                   ld      (hl),e
 196+ A317 C9                   ret
 197+ A318
 198+ A318              ;a = a AND 80 (i.e. bit 7) =>carry       so value is -
 199+ A318              ;MVT1
 200+ A318              ;    S = bits 6 to 0 of A
 201+ A318              ;    A = sign bit => T
 202+ A318              ;    xor sign bit with ink[x] Sign
 203+ A318              ;    if negative thn its not an add
 204+ A318              ;
 205+ A318              ;        and h, 7F
 206+ A318              ;        b = 0
 207+ A318              ;        c = varS
 208+ A318              ;        subtract INW[X]hilo, bc
 209+ A318              ;        retain carry
 210+ A318              ;        get INKW[x]Sign
 211+ A318              ;        and 7F
 212+ A318              ;        subtract carry (so will go negtive if negative)
 213+ A318              ;        xor bit 7 of h with T to flip bit
 214+ A318              ;        write to INKW[x]Sign
 215+ A318              ;
 216+ A318              ;    else
 217+ A318              ;MV10.
 218+ A318              ;        add INWK[x]hi,lo, varS
 219+ A318              ;        or      sign bit
 220+ A318
 221+ A318
# file closed: ./Maths/addhlasigned.asm
 986  A318                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/AddDEToCash.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/AddDEToCash.asm
   1+ A318              ; Note its big endian
   2+ A318 2A 11 99     addDEtoCash:            ld      hl,(Cash)
   3+ A31B 19                                   add     hl,de
   4+ A31C 22 11 99                             ld      (Cash),hl
   5+ A31F 11 00 00                             ld      de,0
   6+ A322 2A 13 99                             ld      hl,(Cash+2)
   7+ A325 ED 5A                                adc     hl,de
   8+ A327 22 13 99                             ld      (Cash+2),hl
   9+ A32A C9                                   ret
  10+ A32B
  11+ A32B 2A 11 99     subDEfromCash:          ld      hl,(Cash)
  12+ A32E 7C                                   ld      a,h
  13+ A32F B5                                   or      l
  14+ A330 2A 13 99                             ld      hl,(Cash+2)
  15+ A333 B4                                   or      h
  16+ A334 B5                                   or      l
  17+ A335 C8                                   ret     z               ; No cash return
  18+ A336 B7                                   or      a
  19+ A337 2A 11 99                             ld      hl,(Cash)
  20+ A33A ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
  21+ A33C 22 11 99                             ld      (Cash),hl
  22+ A33F 11 00 00                             ld      de,0
  23+ A342 2A 13 99                             ld      hl,(Cash+2)
  24+ A345 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
  25+ A347 22 13 99                             ld      (Cash+2),hl
  26+ A34A                                      JumpOnBitSet h,7,.ZeroCash
  26+ A34A CB 7C       >                        bit 	7,h
  26+ A34C C2 50 A3    >                        jp      nz,.ZeroCash
  27+ A34F C9                                   ret
  28+ A350 21 00 00     .ZeroCash:              ld      hl,0
  29+ A353 22 11 99                             ld      (Cash),hl
  30+ A356 22 13 99                             ld      (Cash+2),hl
  31+ A359 C9                                   ret
  32+ A35A
