 987  A35A                  INCLUDE "./Maths/DIVD3B2.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/DIVD3B2.asm
   1+ A35A              ;INPUTS: ahl = dividend cde = divisor
   2+ A35A              ;OUTPUTS: cde = quotient ahl = remainder
   3+ A35A 47           Div24by24:              ld b,a
   4+ A35B E5                                   push hl
   5+ A35C DD E1                                pop ix
   6+ A35E 2E 18                                ld l,24
   7+ A360 E5                                   push hl
   8+ A361 AF                                   xor a
   9+ A362 67                                   ld h,a
  10+ A363 6F                                   ld l,a
  11+ A364 DD 29        .Div24by24loop:         add ix,ix
  12+ A366 CB 10                                rl b
  13+ A368 ED 6A                                adc hl,hl
  14+ A36A 17                                   rla
  15+ A36B B9                                   cp c
  16+ A36C 38 0C                                jr c,.Div24by24skip
  17+ A36E 20 05                                jr nz,.Div24by24setbit
  18+ A370 ED 52                                sbc hl,de
  19+ A372 19                                   add hl,de
  20+ A373 38 05                                jr c,.Div24by24skip
  21+ A375 ED 52        .Div24by24setbit:       sbc hl,de
  22+ A377 99                                   sbc a,c
  23+ A378 DD 23                                inc ix
  24+ A37A E3           .Div24by24skip:         ex (sp),hl
  25+ A37B 2D                                   dec l
  26+ A37C E3                                   ex (sp),hl
  27+ A37D 20 E5                                jr nz,.Div24by24loop
  28+ A37F D1                                   pop de
  29+ A380 48                                   ld c,b
  30+ A381 DD E5                                push ix
  31+ A383 D1                                   pop de
  32+ A384 C9                                   ret
  33+ A385
  34+ A385 FD 67        Div24by24ASigned:       ld      iyh,a
  35+ A387 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  36+ A389 CD 5A A3                             call    Div24by24
  37+ A38C F5                                   push    af
  38+ A38D FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh
  39+ A38F E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  40+ A391 B1                                   or      c
  41+ A392 4F                                   ld      c,a
  42+ A393 F1                                   pop     af
  43+ A394 C9                                   ret
  44+ A395
  45+ A395
  46+ A395 FD 67        Div24by24LeadSign:      ld      iyh,a           ; Preserve signed in IYL
  47+ A397 A9                                   xor     c               ; flip sign if negative
  48+ A398 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit    ; .
  49+ A39A FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a           ; .
  50+ A39C 79                                   ld      a,c             ; make both values ABS
  51+ A39D E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; .
  52+ A39F 4F                                   ld      c,a             ; .
  53+ A3A0 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh           ; .
  54+ A3A2 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; .
  55+ A3A4 CD 5A A3                             call    Div24by24       ; do abs divide
  56+ A3A7 FD B5                                or      iyl             ; bring in sign bit
  57+ A3A9 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a           ; save a
  58+ A3AB 79                                   ld      a,c             ; sort sign for c
  59+ A3AC FD B5                                or      iyl             ;
  60+ A3AE 4F                                   ld      c,a             ;
  61+ A3AF FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh           ; sort sign of a
  62+ A3B1 C9                                   ret
  63+ A3B2
  64+ A3B2              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
  65+ A3B2              ;divdide by 16 using undocumented instrunctions
  66+ A3B2              ;Input: BC = Dividend, DE = Divisor, HL = 0
  67+ A3B2              ;Output: BC = Quotient, HL = Remainder
  68+ A3B2 47           PROJ256mulAdivQ:        ld      b,a
  69+ A3B3 0E 00                                ld      c,0
  70+ A3B5 16 00                                ld      d,0
  71+ A3B7 3A D2 94                             ld      a,(varQ)
  72+ A3BA 5F                                   ld      e,a
  73+ A3BB 21 00 00     PROJDIV16UNDOC:         ld      hl,0
  74+ A3BE 78                                   ld      a,b
  75+ A3BF 06 10                                ld      b,16
  76+ A3C1 CB 31        PROJDIV16UNDOCLOOP:     sll     c       ; unroll 16 times
  77+ A3C3 17                                   rla             ; ...
  78+ A3C4 ED 6A                                adc     hl,hl       ; ...
  79+ A3C6 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de       ; ...
  80+ A3C8 30 02                                jr      nc,PROJDIV16UNDOCSKIP       ; ...
  81+ A3CA 19                                   add     hl,de       ; ...
  82+ A3CB 0D                                   dec     c       ; ...
  83+ A3CC 10 F3        PROJDIV16UNDOCSKIP:     djnz    PROJDIV16UNDOCLOOP
  84+ A3CE 79                                   ld      a,c
  85+ A3CF 32 D3 94                             ld      (varR),a
  86+ A3D2 C9                                   ret
  87+ A3D3
  88+ A3D3              ;INPUTS:    bhl = dividend  cde = divisor where b and c are sign bytes
  89+ A3D3              ;OUTPUTS:   cahl = quotient cde = divisor
  90+ A3D3 32 73 94     DVID3B2:                ld      (varPhi2),a                     ;DVID3B2 \ Divide 3 bytes by 2, K = [P(HiLo).A]/[INWK_z HiLo], for planet radius, Xreg protected. ; P+2    \ num sg
  91+ A3D6                                      ldCopy2Byte UBnKzlo, varQ               ; [QR} = Ubnk zlohi  (i.e. Inwk_z HiLo)
  91+ A3D6 2A 12 C0    >               ld       hl,(UBnKzlo)
  91+ A3D9 22 D2 94    >               ld       (varQ),hl
  92+ A3DC 3A 14 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)                    ;
  93+ A3DF 32 D4 94                             ld      (varS),a                        ; S = inkw z sign
  94+ A3E2 ED 5B 71 94  DVID3B:                 ld      de,(varP)                       ; K (3bytes)=P(Lo Hi Hi2)/S.R.Q approx  Acc equiv K(0).; get P and P+1 into de
  95+ A3E6 7B                                   ld      a,e                             ; num lo
  96+ A3E7 F6 01                                or      1                               ; must be at least 1
  97+ A3E9 32 71 94                             ld      (varP),a                        ; store
  98+ A3EC 5F                                   ld      e,a                             ; update DE too
  99+ A3ED 3A 73 94                             ld      a,(varPhi2)                     ; varP Sign     E.D.A = P Lo Hi Hi2
 100+ A3F0 21 D4 94                             ld      hl,varS                         ; hl = address of VarS
 101+ A3F3 AE                                   xor     (hl)                            ; A = PHi2 Xor S Signs
 102+ A3F4 E6 80                                and     $80                             ;
 103+ A3F6 32 F0 94                             ld      (varT),a                        ; T = Sign bit of A
 104+ A3F9 FD 2E 00                             ld      iyl,0                           ; iyl = yReg = counter
 105+ A3FC 3A 73 94                             ld      a,(varPhi2)                     ;
 106+ A3FF E6 7F                                and     $7F                             ; A = Ph2 again but minus sign bit
 107+ A401              DVL9:                   JumpIfAGTENusng $40,DV14                ; counter Y up; if object is over $40 away then scaled and exit Y count
 107+ A401 FE 40       >                        cp     $40
 107+ A403 D2 11 A4    >                        jp		nc,DV14
 108+ A406                                      ShiftDELeft1                            ; de (or P,P1) > 1
 108+ A406 CB 23       >			   sla e
 108+ A408 CB 12       >			   rl  d
 109+ A40A CB 17                                rl      a                               ; and accumulator as 3rd byte
 110+ A40C FD 2C                                inc     iyl
 111+ A40E C2 01 A4                             jp      nz,DVL9                         ; loop again with a max of 256 iterations
 112+ A411 32 73 94     DV14:                   ld      (varPhi2),a                     ; scaled, exited Ycount
 113+ A414 ED 53 71 94                          ld      (varP),de                       ; store off the value so far
 114+ A418 3A D4 94                             ld      a,(varS)                        ; zsign
 115+ A41B E6 7F                                and     $7F                             ; denom sg7
 116+ A41D                                      ; jp mi,DV9                             ; this can never happen as bit 7 is and'ed out
 117+ A41D 2A D2 94                             ld      hl,(varQ)                       ; demon lo
 118+ A420 FD 2D        DVL6:                   dec     iyl                             ; counter Y back down, roll S. ;  scale Y back
 119+ A422                                      ShiftHLLeft1
 119+ A422 CB 25       >			   sla l
 119+ A424 CB 14       >			   rl  h
 120+ A426 CB 17                                rl      a                               ; mulitply QRS by 2
 121+ A428 F2 20 A4                             jp      p,DVL6                          ; loop roll S until Abit7 set.
 122+ A42B 22 D2 94     DV9:                    ld      (varQ),hl                       ; bmi cant enter here from above ; save off so far
 123+ A42E 32 D2 94                             ld      (varQ),a                        ; Q \ mostly empty so now reuse as hi denom
 124+ A431 3E FE                                ld      a,$FE                           ;  Xreg protected so can't LL28+4
 125+ A433 32 D3 94                             ld      (varR),a                        ;  R
 126+ A436 3A 73 94                             ld      a,(varPhi2)                     ; P+2 \ big numerator
 127+ A439 CD B2 A3                             call    PROJ256mulAdivQ                 ; TODO LL31\ R now =A*256/Q
 128+ A43C 3E 00                                ld      a,0
 129+ A43E 32 E8 94                             ld      (varKp1),a
 130+ A441 32 E9 94                             ld      (varKp2),a
 131+ A444 32 EA 94                             ld      (varKp3),a                      ; clear out K+1 to K+3
 132+ A447 FD 7D                                ld      a,iyl                           ; Y counter for scale
 133+ A449                                      JumpOnBitClear a,7,DV12                 ; Ycount +ve
 133+ A449 CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
 133+ A44B CA 76 A4    >                        jp      z,DV12
 134+ A44E 3A D3 94                             ld      a,(varR)                        ; R     \ else Y count is -ve, Acc = remainder.
 135+ A451 ED 5B E7 94                          ld      de,(varK)                       ; d= k1
 136+ A455 2A EB 94                             ld      hl,(varK2)                      ; h = k3, l = k2
 137+ A458 5F                                   ld      e,a                             ; use e to hold K0 pulled from a
 138+ A459 CB 27        DVL8:                   sla     a                               ; boost up a                     ;  counter Y up
 139+ A45B CB 12                                rl      d                               ; k1
 140+ A45D CB 15                                rl      l                               ; k2
 141+ A45F CB 14                                rl      h                               ; k3
 142+ A461 FD 2C                                inc     iyl
 143+ A463 20 F4                                jr      nz,DVL8                         ;
 144+ A465 ED 53 E7 94  DVL8Save:               ld      (varK),de
 145+ A469 22 EB 94                             ld      (varK2),hl                      ; save back K0 to k3
 146+ A46C 3A F0 94                             ld      a,(varT)
 147+ A46F 4F                                   ld      c,a                             ; get varT into c reg
 148+ A470 7C                                   ld      a,h                             ; a= k3 (sign)
 149+ A471 B1                                   or      c                               ; merge in varT (sign)that was saved much earlier up)
 150+ A472 32 FA 94                             ld      (varK3),a                       ; load sign bit back into K3
 151+ A475 C9                                   ret
 152+ A476              DV12:                   IfAIsZeroGoto   DV13                    ; Y Count zerp, go to DV13
 152+ A476 A7          >				and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 152+ A477 CA 8E A4    >				jp	z, DV13
 153+ A47A 3A D3 94                             ld      a,(varR)                        ; Reduce Remainder
 154+ A47D CB 3F        DVL10:                  srl     a                               ; divide by 2                     ; counter Y reduce
 155+ A47F FD 2D                                dec     iyl
 156+ A481 C2 7D A4                             jp      nz,DVL10                        ; loop y reduce until y is zero
 157+ A484 32 E7 94                             ld      (varK),a                        ; k Lo
 158+ A487                                      ldCopyByte  varT,varKp3                 ; Copy sign to K+3
 158+ A487 3A F0 94    >               ld       a,(varT)
 158+ A48A 32 EA 94    >               ld       (varKp3),a
 159+ A48D C9                                   ret
 160+ A48E              DV13:                   ldCopyByte  varR,varK                   ; R \ already correct so copy to K lo;DV13   \ Ycount zero \ K(1to2) already = 0
 160+ A48E 3A D3 94    >               ld       a,(varR)
 160+ A491 32 E7 94    >               ld       (varK),a
 161+ A494                                      ldCopyByte  varT,varKp3                 ; Copy sign to K+3
 161+ A494 3A F0 94    >               ld       a,(varT)
 161+ A497 32 EA 94    >               ld       (varKp3),a
 162+ A49A C9                                   ret

 165+ A49B CD D3 A3     PLS6:                   call    DVID3B2                         ; Returns AHL K ( 2 1 0 )
 166+ A49E 3A EA 94                             ld      a,(varKp3)
 167+ A4A1 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 168+ A4A3 21 E9 94                             ld      hl,varKp2
 169+ A4A6 B6                                   or      (hl)

 172+ A4AD FE 04                                cp      4                               ; if high byte > 4 then total > 1024 so too big
 173+ A4AF 30 0B                                jr      nc,PL44TooBig
 174+ A4B1                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ; we have a good result regardless
 174+ A4B1 B7          >                    or a

 178+ A4BA C8                                   ret     z                               ; no so we can just return
 179+ A4BB C9           PL44:                   ret

 988  A4BE                  INCLUDE "./Maths/multiply.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/multiply.asm
   1+ A4BE              HLequSRmulQdiv256:      ;X.Y=x1lo.S*M/256  	\ where M/256 is gradient
   2+ A4BE 2A D3 94                             ld  hl,(varRS)
   3+ A4C1 3A D2 94                             ld  a,(varQ)
   4+ A4C4 C5 D5        HLeqyHLmulAdiv256:      push    bc,,de
   5+ A4C6 11 00 00                             ld  de,0        ; de = XY
   6+ A4C9 47                                   ld  b,a         ; b = Q
   7+ A4CA                                      ShiftHLRight1
   7+ A4CA CB 3C       >			   srl h
   7+ A4CC CB 1D       >			   rr  l
   8+ A4CE CB 20                                sla b
   9+ A4D0 30 03                                jr  nc,.LL126
  10+ A4D2 EB           .LL125:                 ex de,hl
  11+ A4D3 19                                   add hl,de
  12+ A4D4 EB                                   ex  de,hl       ; de = de + rs
  13+ A4D5              .LL126:                 ShiftHLRight1
  13+ A4D5 CB 3C       >			   srl h
  13+ A4D7 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
  14+ A4D9 CB 20                                sla b
  15+ A4DB 38 F5                                jr      c,.LL125
  16+ A4DD 20 F6                                jr      nz,.LL126
  17+ A4DF EB                                   ex      de,hl   ; hl = result
  18+ A4E0 D1 C1                                pop     bc,,de
  19+ A4E2 C9                                   ret
  20+ A4E3
  21+ A4E3
  22+ A4E3              MacroDEEquQmulASigned:  MACRO
  23+ A4E3 ~                                    ld      d,a                         ; save a into d
  24+ A4E3 ~                                    ld      a,(varQ)
  25+ A4E3 ~                                    ld      e,a
  26+ A4E3 ~                                    xor     d                           ; a = a xor var Q
  27+ A4E3 ~                                    and     SignOnly8Bit
  28+ A4E3 ~                                    ld      b,a                         ; b = sign of a xor q
  29+ A4E3 ~                                    ld      a,d                         ; d = abs d (or a reg)
  30+ A4E3 ~                                    and     SignMask8Bit
  31+ A4E3 ~                                    ld      d,a
  32+ A4E3 ~                                    ld      a,e                         ; e = abs e (or varQ)
  33+ A4E3 ~                                    and     SignMask8Bit
  34+ A4E3 ~                                    ld      e,a
  35+ A4E3 ~                                    mul                                 ; de = a * Q
  36+ A4E3 ~                                    ld      a,d
  37+ A4E3 ~                                    or      b                           ; de = a * Q leading sign bit
  38+ A4E3 ~                                    ld      d,a
  39+ A4E3                                      ENDM
  40+ A4E3
  41+ A4E3
  42+ A4E3
  43+ A4E3                                 ; .MAD	\ -> &22AD  \ Multiply and Add  (DE also) X.A(Lo.Hi) = Q*A + R.S (Lo.Hi)
  44+ A4E3              madXAequQmulAaddRS:     MacroDEEquQmulASigned
  44+ A4E3 57          >                        ld      d,a                         ; save a into d
  44+ A4E4 3A D2 94    >                        ld      a,(varQ)
  44+ A4E7 5F          >                        ld      e,a
  44+ A4E8 AA          >                        xor     d                           ; a = a xor var Q
  44+ A4E9 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
  44+ A4EB 47          >                        ld      b,a                         ; b = sign of a xor q
  44+ A4EC 7A          >                        ld      a,d                         ; d = abs d (or a reg)
  44+ A4ED E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
  44+ A4EF 57          >                        ld      d,a
  44+ A4F0 7B          >                        ld      a,e                         ; e = abs e (or varQ)
  44+ A4F1 E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
  44+ A4F3 5F          >                        ld      e,a
  44+ A4F4 ED 30       >                        mul                                 ; de = a * Q
  44+ A4F6 7A          >                        ld      a,d
  44+ A4F7 B0          >                        or      b                           ; de = a * Q leading sign bit
  44+ A4F8 57          >                        ld      d,a
  45+ A4F9 2A D3 94     madDEaddRS:             ld		hl,(varR)
  46+ A4FC CD 05 A5                             call	madXAAddHLDESigned
  47+ A4FF EB                                   ex      de,hl                       ; de = R.S + DE
  48+ A500                                      ClearCarryFlag
  48+ A500 B7          >                    or a
  49+ A501 DD 6B                                ld      ixl,e
  50+ A503 7A                                   ld      a,d
  51+ A504 C9                                   ret
  52+ A505
  53+ A505
  54+ A505 7C           madXAAddHLDESigned:     ld      a,h
  55+ A506 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  56+ A508 47                                   ld      b,a                         ;save sign bit in b
  57+ A509 AA                                   xor     d                           ;if h sign and d sign were different then bit 7 of a will be 1 which means
  58+ A50A                                      JumpIfNegative .ADDHLDEOppSGN        ;Signs are opposite there fore we can subtract to get difference
  58+ A50A FA 22 A5    >                        jp		m, .ADDHLDEOppSGN
  59+ A50D 78           .ADDHLDESameSigns:       ld      a,b
  60+ A50E B2                                   or      d
  61+ A50F                                      JumpIfNegative .ADDHLDESameNeg       ; optimisation so we can just do simple add if both positive
  61+ A50F FA 14 A5    >                        jp		m, .ADDHLDESameNeg
  62+ A512 19                                   add     hl,de
  63+ A513 C9                                   ret
  64+ A514 7C           .ADDHLDESameNeg:         ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
  65+ A515 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
  66+ A517 67                                   ld      h,a
  67+ A518 7A                                   ld      a,d
  68+ A519 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  69+ A51B 57                                   ld      d,a
  70+ A51C 19                                   add     hl,de
  71+ A51D 3E 80                                ld      a,SignOnly8Bit
  72+ A51F B4                                   or      h                           ; now set bit for negative value, we won't bother with overflow for now TODO
  73+ A520 67                                   ld      h,a
  74+ A521 C9                                   ret
  75+ A522 7C           .ADDHLDEOppSGN:          ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit                     ; here HL and DE are opposite
  76+ A523 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
  77+ A525 67                                   ld      h,a
  78+ A526 7A                                   ld      a,d
  79+ A527 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  80+ A529 57                                   ld      d,a
  81+ A52A B7                                   or      a
  82+ A52B ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
  83+ A52D 38 04                                jr      c,.ADDHLDEOppInvert
  84+ A52F 78           .ADDHLDEOppSGNNoCarry:   ld      a,b                         ; we got here so hl > de therefore we can just take hl's previous sign bit
  85+ A530 B4                                   or      h
  86+ A531 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; set the previou sign value
  87+ A532 C9                                   ret
  88+ A533              .ADDHLDEOppInvert:       NegHL                                                   ; we need to flip the sign and 2'c the Hl result
  88+ A533 AF          >                    xor a
  88+ A534 95          >                    sub l
  88+ A535 6F          >                    ld l,a
  88+ A536 9F          >                    sbc a,a
  88+ A537 94          >                    sub h
  88+ A538 67          >                    ld h,a
  89+ A539 78                                   ld      a,b
  90+ A53A EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign bit
  91+ A53C B4                                   or      h
  92+ A53D 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; recover sign
  93+ A53E C9                                   ret
  94+ A53F
  95+ A53F
  96+ A53F                  ; multiplication of 16-bit number and 8-bit number into a 24-bit product
  97+ A53F                  ;
  98+ A53F                  ; enter : hl = 16-bit multiplier   = x
  99+ A53F                  ;          e =  8-bit multiplicand = y
 100+ A53F                  ;
 101+ A53F                  ; exit  : ahl = 24-bit product
 102+ A53F                  ;         carry reset
 103+ A53F                  ;
 104+ A53F                  ; uses  : af, de, hl
 105+ A53F 54           AHLequHLmulE:           ld d,h                      ; xh
 106+ A540 63                                   ld h,e                      ; yl
 107+ A541 ED 30                                mul de                      ; xh*yl
 108+ A543 EB                                   ex de,hl
 109+ A544 ED 30                                mul de                      ; yl*xl, hl = xh*yl
 110+ A546
 111+ A546 7A                                   ld  a,d                     ; sum products
 112+ A547 85                                   add a,l
 113+ A548 57                                   ld  d,a
 114+ A549 EB                                   ex de,hl
 115+ A54A
 116+ A54A 7A                                   ld  a,d
 117+ A54B CE 00                                adc a,0
 118+ A54D C9                                   ret
 119+ A54E
 120+ A54E
 121+ A54E
 122+ A54E                 ; multiplication of two 16-bit numbers into a 32-bit product
 123+ A54E                 ;
 124+ A54E                 ; enter : de = 16-bit multiplicand = y
 125+ A54E                 ;         hl = 16-bit multiplicand = x
 126+ A54E                 ;
 127+ A54E                 ; exit  : dehl = 32-bit product
 128+ A54E                 ;         carry reset
 129+ A54E                 ;
 130+ A54E                 ; uses  : af, bc, de, hl
 131+ A54E
 132+ A54E
 133+ A54E
 134+ A54E 45           DEHLequDEmulHL:         ld b,l                      ; x0
 135+ A54F 4B                                   ld c,e                      ; y0
 136+ A550 5D                                   ld e,l                      ; x0
 137+ A551 6A                                   ld l,d
 138+ A552 E5                                   push hl                     ; x1 y1
 139+ A553 69                                   ld l,c                      ; y0
 140+ A554              ; bc = x0 y0, de = y1 x0,  hl = x1 y0,  stack = x1 y1
 141+ A554 ED 30                                mul de                      ; y1*x0
 142+ A556 EB                                   ex de,hl
 143+ A557 ED 30                                mul de                      ; x1*y0
 144+ A559
 145+ A559 AF                                   xor a                       ; zero A
 146+ A55A 19                                   add hl,de                   ; sum cross products p2 p1
 147+ A55B 8F                                   adc a,a                     ; capture carry p3
 148+ A55C
 149+ A55C 59                                   ld e,c                      ; x0
 150+ A55D 50                                   ld d,b                      ; y0
 151+ A55E ED 30                                mul de                      ; y0*x0
 152+ A560
 153+ A560 47                                   ld b,a                      ; carry from cross products
 154+ A561 4C                                   ld c,h                      ; LSB of MSW from cross products
 155+ A562
 156+ A562 7A                                   ld a,d
 157+ A563 85                                   add a,l
 158+ A564 67                                   ld h,a
 159+ A565 6B                                   ld l,e                      ; LSW in HL p1 p0
 160+ A566
 161+ A566 D1                                   pop de
 162+ A567 ED 30                                mul de                      ; x1*y1
 163+ A569
 164+ A569 EB                                   ex de,hl
 165+ A56A ED 4A                                adc hl,bc
 166+ A56C EB                                   ex de,hl                    ; de = final MSW
 167+ A56D
 168+ A56D C9                                   ret
 169+ A56E
 170+ A56E              ; multiplication of two 16-bit numbers into a 16-bit product
 171+ A56E              ; enter : de = 16-bit multiplicand
 172+ A56E              ;         hl = 16-bit multiplicand
 173+ A56E              ; exit  : hl = 16-bit product
 174+ A56E              ;         carry reset
 175+ A56E              ; maths is
 176+ A56E              ;        hl = y , de= x
 177+ A56E              ;        hl = xhi,ylo + (yhigh * xlow)
 178+ A56E              ;        hl = yhih & xlo + x
 179+ A56E              ;
 180+ A56E              ;
 181+ A56E              ; uses  : af, bc, de, hl
 182+ A56E C5           mulDEbyHL:              push    bc
 183+ A56F 7A                                   ld a,d                      ; a = xh
 184+ A570 54                                   ld d,h                      ; d = yh
 185+ A571 67                                   ld h,a                      ; h = xh
 186+ A572 4B                                   ld c,e                      ; c = xl
 187+ A573 45                                   ld b,l                      ; b = yl
 188+ A574 ED 30                                mul                         ; yh * yl
 189+ A576 EB                                   ex de,hl
 190+ A577 ED 30                                mul                         ; xh * yl
 191+ A579 19                                   add hl,de                   ; add cross products
 192+ A57A 59                                   ld e,c
 193+ A57B 50                                   ld d,b
 194+ A57C ED 30                                mul                         ; yl * xl
 195+ A57E 7D                                   ld a,l                      ; cross products lsb
 196+ A57F 82                                   add a,d                     ; add to msb final
 197+ A580 67                                   ld h,a
 198+ A581 6B                                   ld l,e                      ; hl = final
 199+ A582                                      ; 83 cycles, 19 bytes
 200+ A582 AF                                   xor a                       ; reset carry
 201+ A583 C1                                   pop     bc
 202+ A584 C9                                   ret
 203+ A585
 204+ A585              ; DELC = HLE * D, uses HL, DE, C , A , IYH
 205+ A585 7A           mulHLEbyDSigned:        ld      a,d
 206+ A586 AC                                   xor     h
 207+ A587 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 208+ A589 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a               ; iyh = copy of sign
 209+ A58B 7C                                   ld      a,h
 210+ A58C E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 211+ A58E 67                                   ld      h,a                 ; hle = abs (hle)
 212+ A58F 7A                                   ld      a,d
 213+ A590 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 214+ A592 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; now also d = abs d
 215+ A593 ED 30        .PerformMultiply:       mul                         ; de = E*A
 216+ A595 4B                                   ld      c,e                 ; c = low E*A
 217+ A596 5D                                   ld      e,l                 ;
 218+ A597 6F                                   ld      l,a                 ; hl = H,A
 219+ A598 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; a = (E*A)/256
 220+ A599 55                                   ld      d,l                 ; de = A,L
 221+ A59A ED 30                                mul                         ; de = E*A (high) + E*A/256(low)
 222+ A59C ED 32                                add     de,a                ; .
 223+ A59E 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; hl = E*A (high) + E*A/256(low)
 224+ A59F EB                                   ex      de,hl               ; A =  E*A, de = HA
 225+ A5A0 ED 30                                mul
 226+ A5A2 ED 32                                add     de,a                ;
 227+ A5A4 7A                                   ld      a,d
 228+ A5A5 FD B4                                or      iyh                 ; recover sign
 229+ A5A7 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; sign back on d
 230+ A5A8 C9                                   ret
 231+ A5A9
 232+ A5A9
 233+ A5A9              ; multiplication of two S156-bit numbers into a 16-bit 2'd compliment product
 234+ A5A9              ; enter : de = 16-bit multiplicand
 235+ A5A9              ;         hl = 16-bit multiplicand
 236+ A5A9              ; exit  : hl = 16-bit product
 237+ A5A9              ;         carry reset
 238+ A5A9              ;
 239+ A5A9              ; uses  : af, bc, de, hl
 240+ A5A9 00           mulDEbyHLSignByte       DB      0
 241+ A5AA AF           mulDEbyHLSgnTo2c:       xor     a
 242+ A5AB 32 A9 A5                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 243+ A5AE 7A           .SignDE:                ld      a,d
 244+ A5AF ED 27 80                             test    $80
 245+ A5B2 28 08                                jr      z,.SignHL
 246+ A5B4 E6 7F        .NegativeDE:            and     $7F
 247+ A5B6 57                                   ld      d,a
 248+ A5B7 3E 80                                ld      a,$80
 249+ A5B9 32 A9 A5                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 250+ A5BC 7C           .SignHL:                ld      a,h
 251+ A5BD ED 27 80                             test    $80
 252+ A5C0 28 0B                                jr      z,.AbsoluteMultiply
 253+ A5C2 E6 7F        .NegativeHL:            and     $7F
 254+ A5C4 67                                   ld      h,a
 255+ A5C5 3A A9 A5                             ld      a,(mulDEbyHLSignByte)
 256+ A5C8 EE 80                                xor     $80
 257+ A5CA 32 A9 A5                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 258+ A5CD CD 6E A5     .AbsoluteMultiply:      call    mulDEbyHL
 259+ A5D0 3A A9 A5     .RecoverSign:           ld      a,(mulDEbyHLSignByte)
 260+ A5D3 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 261+ A5D6 C8                                   ret     z
 262+ A5D7 AF           .Negateghl: 			xor 	a
 263+ A5D8 95                                   sub 	l
 264+ A5D9 6F                                   ld 		l,a
 265+ A5DA 9F                                   sbc 	a,a
 266+ A5DB 94                                   sub 	h
 267+ A5DC 67                                   ld 		h,a
 268+ A5DD C9                                   ret
 269+ A5DE
 270+ A5DE AF           mulDESgnbyHLUnsgnTo2c:  xor     a
 271+ A5DF 32 A9 A5                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 272+ A5E2 7A           .SignDE:                ld      a,d
 273+ A5E3 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 274+ A5E6 28 08                                jr      z,.AbsoluteMultiply
 275+ A5E8 E6 7F        .NegativeDE:            and     $7F
 276+ A5EA 57                                   ld      d,a
 277+ A5EB 3E 80                                ld      a,$80
 278+ A5ED 32 A9 A5                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 279+ A5F0 CD 6E A5     .AbsoluteMultiply:      call    mulDEbyHL
 280+ A5F3 3A A9 A5     .RecoverSign:           ld      a,(mulDEbyHLSignByte)
 281+ A5F6 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 282+ A5F9 C8                                   ret     z
 283+ A5FA AF           .Negateghl:             xor 	a
 284+ A5FB 95                                   sub 	l
 285+ A5FC 6F                                   ld 		l,a
 286+ A5FD 9F                                   sbc 	a,a
 287+ A5FE 94                                   sub 	h
 288+ A5FF 67                                   ld 		h,a
 289+ A600 C9                                   ret
 290+ A601
 291+ A601
# file closed: ./Maths/multiply.asm
 989  A601                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_square.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_square.asm
   1+ A601              ; "ASM_SQUA : TESTGOOD"
   2+ A601              ; "AP = A^2 A = low,P = hi"
   3+ A601
   4+ A601              inline_squde: MACRO
   5+ A601 ~            			ld	e,a
   6+ A601 ~            			ld  d,a
   7+ A601 ~            			mul
   8+ A601              			ENDM
   9+ A601
  10+ A601              inline_squa: MACRO
  11+ A601 ~            			ld	e,a
  12+ A601 ~            			ld  d,a
  13+ A601 ~            			mul
  14+ A601 ~            			ld	a,e
  15+ A601              			ENDM
  16+ A601
  17+ A601
  18+ A601              asm_squa:
  19+ A601 E6 7F        	and SignMask8Bit
  20+ A603              ; "ASM SQUA2 : TESTGOOD"
  21+ A603              ; "AP = A^2 A = low,P = hi singed"
  22+ A603              asm_squa2:
  23+ A603 5F           	ld e, a
  24+ A604 57           	ld d,a
  25+ A605 ED 30        	mul
  26+ A607 ED 53 71 94  	ld (varP),de
  27+ A60B 7B           	ld a,e
  28+ A60C C9           	ret
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_square.asm
 990  A60D                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_sqrt.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_sqrt.asm
   1+ A60D              ; "ASM SQRT : TESTGOOD"
   2+ A60D              ; "16-bit integer square root"
   3+ A60D              ; "call with de = number to square root"
   4+ A60D              ; "returns   hl = square root"
   5+ A60D              ; "corrupts  bc, de"
   6+ A60D              asm_sqrt:
   7+ A60D 01 00 80     	ld bc,$8000
   8+ A610 61           	ld h,c
   9+ A611 69           	ld l,c
  10+ A612              .sqrloop:
  11+ A612 CB 38        	srl b
  12+ A614 CB 19        	rr c
  13+ A616 09           	add hl,bc
  14+ A617 EB           	ex de,hl
  15+ A618 ED 52        	sbc hl,de
  16+ A61A 38 04        	jr c,.sqrbit
  17+ A61C EB           	ex de,hl
  18+ A61D 09           	add hl,bc
  19+ A61E 18 05        	jr .sqrfi
  20+ A620              .sqrbit:
  21+ A620 19           	add hl,de
  22+ A621 EB           	ex de,hl
  23+ A622 B7           	or a
  24+ A623 ED 42        	sbc hl,bc
  25+ A625              .sqrfi:
  26+ A625 CB 3C        	srl h
  27+ A627 CB 1D        	rr l
  28+ A629 CB 38        	srl b
  29+ A62B CB 19        	rr c
  30+ A62D 30 E3        	jr nc,.sqrloop
  31+ A62F C9           	ret
  32+ A630
  33+ A630
  34+ A630              sqrtQR:					; Q = SQR(Qlo.Rhi) Q <~127
  35+ A630 3A D2 94     	ld		a,(varQ)
  36+ A633 5F           	ld		e,a
  37+ A634 3A D3 94     	ld		a,(varR)
  38+ A637 57           	ld		d,a
  39+ A638 CD 0D A6     	call	asm_sqrt
  40+ A63B 7D               ld      a,l
  41+ A63C 32 D2 94     	ld		(varQ),a
  42+ A63F C9           	ret
  43+ A640
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_sqrt.asm
 991  A640                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_divide.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_divide.asm
   1+ A640              ; Divide 8-bit values
   2+ A640              ; In: Divide E by divider C
   3+ A640              ; Out: A = result, B = rest
   4+ A640              ;
   5+ A640              ;;;Div8:
   6+ A640              ;;;    xor a
   7+ A640              ;;;    ld b,8
   8+ A640              ;;;Div8_Loop:
   9+ A640              ;;;    rl e
  10+ A640              ;;;    rla
  11+ A640              ;;;    sub c
  12+ A640              ;;;    jr nc,Div8_NoAdd
  13+ A640              ;;;    add a,c
  14+ A640              ;;;Div8_NoAdd:
  15+ A640              ;;;    djnz Div8_Loop
  16+ A640              ;;;    ld b,a
  17+ A640              ;;;    ld a,e
  18+ A640              ;;;    rla
  19+ A640              ;;;    cpl
  20+ A640              ;;;    ret
  21+ A640
  22+ A640              ;;Inputs: DE is the numerator, BC is the divisor
  23+ A640              ;;Outputs: DE is the result
  24+ A640              ;;         A is a copy of E
  25+ A640              ;;         HL is the remainder
  26+ A640              ;;         BC is not changed
  27+ A640              ;; so DE = DE /BC
  28+ A640              ;140 bytes
  29+ A640              ;145cc
  30+ A640
  31+ A640              MacroDEDivBC:       MACRO
  32+ A640 ~                                rla
  33+ A640 ~                                adc     hl,hl
  34+ A640 ~                                sbc     hl,bc
  35+ A640 ~                                jr      nc,$+3
  36+ A640 ~                                add     hl,bc
  37+ A640                                  ENDM
  38+ A640
  39+ A640              DEequDEDivBC:
  40+ A640 AF               xor a
  41+ A641 ED 62            sbc hl,hl
  42+ A643 7A               ld a,d
  43+ A644                  MacroDEDivBC
  43+ A644 17          >                    rla
  43+ A645 ED 6A       >                    adc     hl,hl
  43+ A647 ED 42       >                    sbc     hl,bc
  43+ A649 30 01       >                    jr      nc,$+3
  43+ A64B 09          >                    add     hl,bc
  44+ A64C                  MacroDEDivBC
  44+ A64C 17          >                    rla
  44+ A64D ED 6A       >                    adc     hl,hl
  44+ A64F ED 42       >                    sbc     hl,bc
  44+ A651 30 01       >                    jr      nc,$+3
  44+ A653 09          >                    add     hl,bc
  45+ A654                  MacroDEDivBC
  45+ A654 17          >                    rla
  45+ A655 ED 6A       >                    adc     hl,hl
  45+ A657 ED 42       >                    sbc     hl,bc
  45+ A659 30 01       >                    jr      nc,$+3
  45+ A65B 09          >                    add     hl,bc
  46+ A65C                  MacroDEDivBC
  46+ A65C 17          >                    rla
  46+ A65D ED 6A       >                    adc     hl,hl
  46+ A65F ED 42       >                    sbc     hl,bc
  46+ A661 30 01       >                    jr      nc,$+3
  46+ A663 09          >                    add     hl,bc
  47+ A664                  MacroDEDivBC
  47+ A664 17          >                    rla
  47+ A665 ED 6A       >                    adc     hl,hl
  47+ A667 ED 42       >                    sbc     hl,bc
  47+ A669 30 01       >                    jr      nc,$+3
  47+ A66B 09          >                    add     hl,bc
  48+ A66C                  MacroDEDivBC
  48+ A66C 17          >                    rla
  48+ A66D ED 6A       >                    adc     hl,hl
  48+ A66F ED 42       >                    sbc     hl,bc
  48+ A671 30 01       >                    jr      nc,$+3
  48+ A673 09          >                    add     hl,bc
  49+ A674                  MacroDEDivBC
  49+ A674 17          >                    rla
  49+ A675 ED 6A       >                    adc     hl,hl
  49+ A677 ED 42       >                    sbc     hl,bc
  49+ A679 30 01       >                    jr      nc,$+3
  49+ A67B 09          >                    add     hl,bc
  50+ A67C                  MacroDEDivBC
  50+ A67C 17          >                    rla
  50+ A67D ED 6A       >                    adc     hl,hl
  50+ A67F ED 42       >                    sbc     hl,bc
  50+ A681 30 01       >                    jr      nc,$+3
  50+ A683 09          >                    add     hl,bc
  51+ A684 17               rla
  52+ A685 2F               cpl
  53+ A686 57               ld d,a
  54+ A687
  55+ A687 7B               ld a,e
  56+ A688                  MacroDEDivBC
  56+ A688 17          >                    rla
  56+ A689 ED 6A       >                    adc     hl,hl
  56+ A68B ED 42       >                    sbc     hl,bc
  56+ A68D 30 01       >                    jr      nc,$+3
  56+ A68F 09          >                    add     hl,bc
  57+ A690                  MacroDEDivBC
  57+ A690 17          >                    rla
  57+ A691 ED 6A       >                    adc     hl,hl
  57+ A693 ED 42       >                    sbc     hl,bc
  57+ A695 30 01       >                    jr      nc,$+3
  57+ A697 09          >                    add     hl,bc
  58+ A698                  MacroDEDivBC
  58+ A698 17          >                    rla
  58+ A699 ED 6A       >                    adc     hl,hl
  58+ A69B ED 42       >                    sbc     hl,bc
  58+ A69D 30 01       >                    jr      nc,$+3
  58+ A69F 09          >                    add     hl,bc
  59+ A6A0                  MacroDEDivBC
  59+ A6A0 17          >                    rla
  59+ A6A1 ED 6A       >                    adc     hl,hl
  59+ A6A3 ED 42       >                    sbc     hl,bc
  59+ A6A5 30 01       >                    jr      nc,$+3
  59+ A6A7 09          >                    add     hl,bc
  60+ A6A8                  MacroDEDivBC
  60+ A6A8 17          >                    rla
  60+ A6A9 ED 6A       >                    adc     hl,hl
  60+ A6AB ED 42       >                    sbc     hl,bc
  60+ A6AD 30 01       >                    jr      nc,$+3
  60+ A6AF 09          >                    add     hl,bc
  61+ A6B0                  MacroDEDivBC
  61+ A6B0 17          >                    rla
  61+ A6B1 ED 6A       >                    adc     hl,hl
  61+ A6B3 ED 42       >                    sbc     hl,bc
  61+ A6B5 30 01       >                    jr      nc,$+3
  61+ A6B7 09          >                    add     hl,bc
  62+ A6B8                  MacroDEDivBC
  62+ A6B8 17          >                    rla
  62+ A6B9 ED 6A       >                    adc     hl,hl
  62+ A6BB ED 42       >                    sbc     hl,bc
  62+ A6BD 30 01       >                    jr      nc,$+3
  62+ A6BF 09          >                    add     hl,bc
  63+ A6C0                  MacroDEDivBC
  63+ A6C0 17          >                    rla
  63+ A6C1 ED 6A       >                    adc     hl,hl
  63+ A6C3 ED 42       >                    sbc     hl,bc
  63+ A6C5 30 01       >                    jr      nc,$+3
  63+ A6C7 09          >                    add     hl,bc
  64+ A6C8 17               rla
  65+ A6C9 2F               cpl
  66+ A6CA 5F               ld e,a
  67+ A6CB C9               ret
  68+ A6CC
  69+ A6CC
  70+ A6CC
  71+ A6CC              ;divdide by 16 using undocumented instrunctions
  72+ A6CC              ;Input: BC = Dividend, DE = Divisor, HL = 0
  73+ A6CC              ;Output: BC = Quotient, HL = Remainder
  74+ A6CC              ; Our use
  75+ A6CC              ; BC = A0
  76+ A6CC              ; DE = 0C
  77+ A6CC              ; so BC = a * 256 / C
  78+ A6CC              DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC:    JumpIfAGTENusng	  c,DEV16ATooLarge                                          ; first off if a > c ten return 255
  78+ A6CC B9          >                        cp     c
  78+ A6CD D2 F8 A6    >                        jp		nc,DEV16ATooLarge
  79+ A6D0 47                                   ld      b,a
  80+ A6D1 59                                   ld      e,c
  81+ A6D2 0E 00                                ld      c,0
  82+ A6D4 16 00                                ld      d,0
  83+ A6D6 C3 E3 A6                             jp      DIV16UNDOC
  84+ A6D9 47           DIV16Amul256dQUNDOC:    ld      b,a
  85+ A6DA 0E 00                                ld      c,0
  86+ A6DC 21 D2 94                             ld      hl,varQ
  87+ A6DF 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
  88+ A6E0 16 00                                ld      d,0
  89+ A6E2 5F                                   ld      e,a
  90+ A6E3              DIV16BCDivDEUNDOC:
  91+ A6E3 21 00 00     DIV16UNDOC:             ld      hl,0
  92+ A6E6 78                                   ld      a,b
  93+ A6E7 06 10                                ld      b,16
  94+ A6E9 CB 31        DIV16UNDOCLOOP:         sll	c		; unroll 16 times
  95+ A6EB 17                                   rla			; ...
  96+ A6EC ED 6A                                adc	hl,hl		; ...
  97+ A6EE ED 52                                sbc	hl,de		; ...
  98+ A6F0 30 02                                jr	nc,DIV16UNDOCSKIP		; ...
  99+ A6F2 19                                   add	hl,de		; ...
 100+ A6F3 0D                                   dec	c		; ...
 101+ A6F4 10 F3        DIV16UNDOCSKIP:         djnz DIV16UNDOCLOOP
 102+ A6F6 47                                   ld   b,a
 103+ A6F7 C9                                   ret
 104+ A6F8 01 FF 00     DEV16ATooLarge:         ld     bc,$00FF
 105+ A6FB C9                                   ret
 106+ A6FC
 107+ A6FC              ; "> asm_div8 C_Div_D - C is the numerator, D is the denominator, A is the remainder, B is 0, C is the result of C/D,D,E,H,L are not changed"
 108+ A6FC 06 08        asm_div8:               ld b,8
 109+ A6FE AF                                   xor a
 110+ A6FF CB 21        div8_loop:	            sla c
 111+ A701 17                                   rla
 112+ A702 BA                                   cp d
 113+ A703 38 02                                jr c,div8_skip
 113+ A705
 114+ A705 0C                                   inc c
 115+ A706 92                                   sub d
 116+ A707 10 F6        div8_skip:	            djnz div8_loop
 117+ A709 C9                                   ret
 118+ A70A              ; ">asm_div16: HL_Div_C: HL is the numerator,  C is the denominator, output A is the remainder, B is 0, C,DE is not changedHL is the quotient"
 119+ A70A 06 10        asm_div16:              ld b,16
 120+ A70C AF                                   xor a
 121+ A70D CB 25        div16_loop:	            sla l
 122+ A70F CB 14                                rl	h
 123+ A711              ;    add hl,hl
 124+ A711 17                                   rla
 125+ A712 B9                                   cp c
 126+ A713 38 02                                jr c,div16_skip
 127+ A715 2C                                   inc l
 128+ A716 91                                   sub c
 129+ A717 10 F4        div16_skip:		        djnz div16_loop
 130+ A719 C9                                   ret
 131+ A71A              ;
 132+ A71A              ; Divide 16-bit values (with 16-bit result)
 133+ A71A              ; In: Divide BC by divider DE
 134+ A71A              ; Out: BC = result, HL = rest
 135+ A71A              ;
 136+ A71A              HLDivC_Iteration: 	MACRO
 137+ A71A ~            					add	hl,hl		; unroll 16 times
 138+ A71A ~            					rla				; ...
 139+ A71A ~            					cp	c			; ...
 140+ A71A ~            					jr	1F
 141+ A71A ~            					sub	c			; ...
 142+ A71A ~            1:
 143+ A71A ~            					inc	l			; ...
 144+ A71A              					ENDM
 145+ A71A
 146+ A71A
 147+ A71A
 148+ A71A              ; ">div1616: BC = BC / DE. HL = remainder"
 149+ A71A 21 00 00     Div1616:            ld hl,0
 150+ A71D 78                               ld a,b
 151+ A71E 06 08                            ld b,8
 152+ A720 17           .Div16_Loop1:       rla
 153+ A721 ED 6A                            adc hl,hl
 154+ A723 ED 52                            sbc hl,de
 155+ A725 30 01                            jr nc,.Div16_NoAdd1
 156+ A727 19                               add hl,de
 157+ A728 10 F6        .Div16_NoAdd1:      djnz .Div16_Loop1
 158+ A72A 17                               rla
 159+ A72B 2F                               cpl
 160+ A72C 47                               ld b,a
 161+ A72D 79                               ld a,c
 162+ A72E 48                               ld c,b
 163+ A72F 06 08                            ld b,8
 164+ A731 17           .Div16_Loop2:       rla
 165+ A732 ED 6A                            adc hl,hl
 166+ A734 ED 52                            sbc hl,de
 167+ A736 30 01                            jr nc,.Div16_NoAdd2
 168+ A738 19                               add hl,de
 169+ A739 10 F6        .Div16_NoAdd2:      djnz .Div16_Loop2
 170+ A73B 17                               rla
 171+ A73C 2F                               cpl
 172+ A73D 41                               ld b,c
 173+ A73E 4F                               ld c,a
 174+ A73F C9                               ret
 175+ A740
 176+ A740
 177+ A740
 178+ A740              BCDIVDE_Iteration: MACRO
 179+ A740 ~            				   rla
 180+ A740 ~            				   adc	hl,hl
 181+ A740 ~            				   add	hl,de
 182+ A740 ~            				   jr	c,1F
 183+ A740 ~            				   sbc	hl,de
 184+ A740 ~            1:
 185+ A740              				   ENDM
 186+ A740
 187+ A740
 188+ A740              ; ">BC_Div_DE: BC = BC / DE. HL = remainder fast divide with unrolled loop"
 189+ A740              ;BC/DE ==> BC, remainder in HL
 190+ A740              ;NOTE: BC/0 returns 0 as the quotient.
 191+ A740              ;min: 738cc
 192+ A740              ;max: 898cc
 193+ A740              ;avg: 818cc
 194+ A740              ;144 bytes
 195+ A740 AF           BC_Div_DE:              xor a
 196+ A741 67                                   ld h,a
 197+ A742 6F                                   ld l,a
 198+ A743 93                                   sub e
 199+ A744 5F                                   ld e,a
 200+ A745 9F                                   sbc a,a
 201+ A746 92                                   sub d
 202+ A747 57                                   ld d,a
 203+ A748 78                                   ld a,b
 204+ A749                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 204+ A749 17          >				   rla
 204+ A74A ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 204+ A74C 19          >				   add	hl,de
 204+ A74D 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 204+ A74F ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 204+ A751             >1:
 205+ A751                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 205+ A751 17          >				   rla
 205+ A752 ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 205+ A754 19          >				   add	hl,de
 205+ A755 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 205+ A757 ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 205+ A759             >1:
 206+ A759                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 206+ A759 17          >				   rla
 206+ A75A ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 206+ A75C 19          >				   add	hl,de
 206+ A75D 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 206+ A75F ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 206+ A761             >1:
 207+ A761                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 207+ A761 17          >				   rla
 207+ A762 ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 207+ A764 19          >				   add	hl,de
 207+ A765 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 207+ A767 ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 207+ A769             >1:
 208+ A769                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 208+ A769 17          >				   rla
 208+ A76A ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 208+ A76C 19          >				   add	hl,de
 208+ A76D 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 208+ A76F ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 208+ A771             >1:
 209+ A771                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 209+ A771 17          >				   rla
 209+ A772 ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 209+ A774 19          >				   add	hl,de
 209+ A775 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 209+ A777 ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 209+ A779             >1:
 210+ A779                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 210+ A779 17          >				   rla
 210+ A77A ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 210+ A77C 19          >				   add	hl,de
 210+ A77D 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 210+ A77F ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 210+ A781             >1:
 211+ A781                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 211+ A781 17          >				   rla
 211+ A782 ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 211+ A784 19          >				   add	hl,de
 211+ A785 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 211+ A787 ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 211+ A789             >1:
 212+ A789 17                                   rla
 213+ A78A 47                                   ld b,a
 214+ A78B
 215+ A78B 79                                   ld a,c
 216+ A78C                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 216+ A78C 17          >				   rla
 216+ A78D ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 216+ A78F 19          >				   add	hl,de
 216+ A790 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 216+ A792 ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 216+ A794             >1:
 217+ A794                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 217+ A794 17          >				   rla
 217+ A795 ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 217+ A797 19          >				   add	hl,de
 217+ A798 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 217+ A79A ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 217+ A79C             >1:
 218+ A79C                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 218+ A79C 17          >				   rla
 218+ A79D ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 218+ A79F 19          >				   add	hl,de
 218+ A7A0 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 218+ A7A2 ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 218+ A7A4             >1:
 219+ A7A4                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 219+ A7A4 17          >				   rla
 219+ A7A5 ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 219+ A7A7 19          >				   add	hl,de
 219+ A7A8 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 219+ A7AA ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 219+ A7AC             >1:
 220+ A7AC                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 220+ A7AC 17          >				   rla
 220+ A7AD ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 220+ A7AF 19          >				   add	hl,de
 220+ A7B0 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 220+ A7B2 ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 220+ A7B4             >1:
 221+ A7B4                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 221+ A7B4 17          >				   rla
 221+ A7B5 ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 221+ A7B7 19          >				   add	hl,de
 221+ A7B8 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 221+ A7BA ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 221+ A7BC             >1:
 222+ A7BC                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 222+ A7BC 17          >				   rla
 222+ A7BD ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 222+ A7BF 19          >				   add	hl,de
 222+ A7C0 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 222+ A7C2 ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 222+ A7C4             >1:
 223+ A7C4                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 223+ A7C4 17          >				   rla
 223+ A7C5 ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 223+ A7C7 19          >				   add	hl,de
 223+ A7C8 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 223+ A7CA ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 223+ A7CC             >1:
 224+ A7CC 17                                   rla
 225+ A7CD 4F                                   ld c,a
 226+ A7CE C9                                   ret
 227+ A7CF
 228+ A7CF              ;Inputs:
 229+ A7CF              ;     DE,BC are 8.8 Fixed Point numbers
 230+ A7CF              ;Outputs:
 231+ A7CF              ;     DE is the 8.8 Fixed Point result (rounded to the least significant bit)
 232+ A7CF              ;if DE is 0 : 122cc or 136cc if BC is negative
 233+ A7CF              ;if |BC|>=128*|DE| : 152cc or 166cc if BC is negative
 234+ A7CF              ;Otherwise:
 235+ A7CF              ;min: 1107cc
 236+ A7CF              ;max: 1319cc
 237+ A7CF              ;avg: 1201cc
 238+ A7CF 78           BC_Div_DE_88:           ld a,b  ; First, find out if the output is positive or negative
 239+ A7D0 AA                                   xor d
 240+ A7D1 F5                                   push af   ;sign bit is the result sign bit
 241+ A7D2              ; Now make sure the inputs are positive
 242+ A7D2 A8                                   xor b     ;A now has the value of B, since I XORed it with D twice (cancelling)
 243+ A7D3 F2 DC A7                             jp p,BC_Div_DE_88_lbl1   ;if Positive, don't negate
 244+ A7D6 AF                                   xor a
 245+ A7D7 91                                   sub c
 246+ A7D8 4F                                   ld c,a
 247+ A7D9 9F                                   sbc a,a
 248+ A7DA 90                                   sub b
 249+ A7DB 47                                   ld b,a
 250+ A7DC 7A           BC_Div_DE_88_lbl1:      ld a,d  ;now make DE negative to optimize the remainder comparison
 251+ A7DD B2                                   or d
 252+ A7DE FA E7 A7                             jp m,BC_Div_DE_88_lbl2
 253+ A7E1 AF                                   xor a
 254+ A7E2 93                                   sub e
 255+ A7E3 5F                                   ld e,a
 256+ A7E4 9F                                   sbc a,a
 257+ A7E5 92                                   sub d
 258+ A7E6 57                                   ld d,a
 259+ A7E7 B3           BC_Div_DE_88_lbl2:      or e      ;if DE is 0, we can call it an overflow ;A is the current value of D
 260+ A7E8 28 1D                                jr z,div_fixed88_overflow
 261+ A7EA 26 00                                ld h,0          ;The accumulator gets set to B if no overflow.;We can use H=0 to save a few cc in the meantime
 262+ A7EC 78                                   ld a,b;if B+DE>=0, then we'll have overflow
 263+ A7ED 83                                   add a,e
 264+ A7EE 7A                                   ld a,d
 265+ A7EF 8C                                   adc a,h
 266+ A7F0 38 15                                jr c,div_fixed88_overflow
 267+ A7F2 68                                   ld l,b  ;Now we can load the accumulator/remainder with B;H is already 0
 268+ A7F3 79                                   ld a,c
 269+ A7F4 CD 0F A8                             call div_fixed88_sub
 270+ A7F7 4F                                   ld c,a
 271+ A7F8 78                                   ld a,b      ;A is now 0
 272+ A7F9 CD 0F A8                             call div_fixed88_sub
 273+ A7FC 51                                   ld d,c
 274+ A7FD 5F                                   ld e,a
 275+ A7FE F1                                   pop af
 276+ A7FF F0                                   ret p
 277+ A800 AF                                   xor a
 278+ A801 93                                   sub e
 279+ A802 5F                                   ld e,a
 280+ A803 9F                                   sbc a,a
 281+ A804 92                                   sub d
 282+ A805 57                                   ld d,a
 283+ A806 C9                                   ret
 284+ A807
 285+ A807 11 FF 7F     div_fixed88_overflow:   ld de,$7FFF
 286+ A80A F1                                   pop af
 287+ A80B F0                                   ret p
 288+ A80C 13                                   inc de
 289+ A80D 1C                                   inc e
 290+ A80E C9                                   ret
 291+ A80F
 292+ A80F              ;min: 456cc
 293+ A80F              ;max: 536cc
 294+ A80F              ;avg: 496cc
 295+ A80F 06 08        div_fixed88_sub:        ld b,8
 296+ A811 17           BC_Div_DE_88_lbl3:      rla
 297+ A812 ED 6A                                adc hl,hl
 298+ A814 19                                   add hl,de
 299+ A815 38 02                                jr c,$+4
 300+ A817 ED 52                                sbc hl,de
 301+ A819 10 F6                                djnz BC_Div_DE_88_lbl3
 302+ A81B 8F                                   adc a,a
 303+ A81C C9                                   ret
 304+ A81D
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_divide.asm
 992  A81D                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_unitvector.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_unitvector.asm
   1+ A81D              asm_tis2:
   2+ A81D              ; ">TIS2 A = (A / Q * 96) so A = -96 ---- 96  range "
   3+ A81D              ; ">DOES NOT DO SIGNED YET"
   4+ A81D F5           	push af
   5+ A81E E6 7F            and SignMask8Bit
   6+ A820 57           	ld d,a				;; d = A
   7+ A821 3A D2 94     	ld a,(varQ)
   8+ A824 5F           	ld e,a
   9+ A825 7A           	ld a,d
  10+ A826 BB           	cp e
  11+ A827 30 11        	jr nc, .tis2_set96	;; jump if a >= Q
  12+ A829 1E 60        	ld e, 96
  13+ A82B ED 30        	mul				; de = d * 96 (also a * 96 )
  14+ A82D EB           	ex de,hl
  15+ A82E 3A D2 94     	ld a,(varQ)
  16+ A831 4F           	ld c,a
  17+ A832 CD 0A A7     	call asm_div16
  18+ A835 F1           	pop af
  19+ A836 E6 80        	and $80
  20+ A838 B5           	or l
  21+ A839 C9           	ret
  22+ A83A              .tis2_set96:
  23+ A83A F1           	pop af
  24+ A83B E6 80        	and $80
  25+ A83D F6 96        	or $96
  26+ A83F C9           	ret
  27+ A840
  28+ A840
  29+ A840              asm_unit_vector:
  30+ A840              squareregfx:
  31+ A840 3A 79 C0     	ld a,(UBnkXScaled)
  32+ A843 57           	ld d,a
  33+ A844 5F           	ld e,a
  34+ A845 ED 30        	mul
  35+ A847 EB           	ex de,hl
  36+ A848              squareregfy:
  37+ A848 3A 7B C0     	ld a, (UBnkYScaled)
  38+ A84B 57           	ld d,a
  39+ A84C 5F           	ld e,a
  40+ A84D ED 30        	mul
  41+ A84F 19           	add hl,de
  42+ A850              squareregfz:
  43+ A850 3A 7D C0     	ld a, (UBnkZScaled)
  44+ A853 57           	ld d,a
  45+ A854 5F           	ld e,a
  46+ A855 ED 30        	mul
  47+ A857 19           	add hl,de
  48+ A858 EB           	ex de,hl			; de de to number to root
  49+ A859              hlequsquareroot:
  50+ A859 CD 0D A6     	call asm_sqrt		; hl = sqrt (fx^2 + fy^2 + fx^2)
  51+ A85C E5           	push hl				; save it for work 3 copies
  52+ A85D E5           	push hl				; save it for work
  53+ A85E E5           	push hl				; save it for work
  54+ A85F              normfx:
  55+ A85F 3A 79 C0     	ld a,(UBnkXScaled)
  56+ A862 E1           	pop hl				; get copy #1
  57+ A863 7D           	ld a,l				; we assume only l had worthwhile data but could spill into h
  58+ A864 4F           	ld c,a
  59+ A865 CD 1D A8     	call asm_tis2
  60+ A868 32 79 C0     	ld (UBnkXScaled),a
  61+ A86B              normfy:
  62+ A86B 3A 7B C0     	ld a,(UBnkYScaled)
  63+ A86E E1           	pop hl				; get copy #2
  64+ A86F 7D           	ld a,l
  65+ A870 4F           	ld c,a
  66+ A871 CD 1D A8     	call asm_tis2
  67+ A874 32 7B C0     	ld (UBnkYScaled),a
  68+ A877              normfz:
  69+ A877 3A 7D C0     	ld a,(UBnkZScaled)
  70+ A87A E1           	pop hl				; get copy #2
  71+ A87B 7D           	ld a,l
  72+ A87C 4F           	ld c,a
  73+ A87D CD 1D A8     	call asm_tis2
  74+ A880 32 7D C0     	ld (UBnkZScaled),a
  75+ A883              asm_unit_vector_end:
  76+ A883 C9           	ret
  77+ A884
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_unitvector.asm
 993  A884                  INCLUDE "./Maths/compare16.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/compare16.asm
   1+ A884              ; Input:
   2+ A884              ;       HL = 1st value
   3+ A884              ;       DE = 2nd value
   4+ A884              ; Output:
   5+ A884              ;       CF, ZF = results of comparison:
   6+ A884              ;
   7+ A884              ;               CF      ZF      Result
   8+ A884              ;               -----------------------------------
   9+ A884              ;               0       0       HL > DE
  10+ A884              ;               0       1       HL == DE
  11+ A884              ;               1       0       HL < DE
  12+ A884              ;               1       1       Impossible
  13+ A884              ;
  14+ A884
  15+ A884 E5           compare16HLDE:      push    hl
  16+ A885 A7                               and     a
  17+ A886 ED 52                            sbc     hl,de
  18+ A888 E1                               pop     hl
  19+ A889 C9                               ret
  20+ A88A
  21+ A88A              ; With compare signed we do ABS comparison
  22+ A88A              ; this is used for view ports as we just want to know if its +/- out side of 90 degrees
  23+ A88A
  24+ A88A E5 D5        compare16HLDEABS:   push    hl,,de
  25+ A88C 7C                               ld      a,h                                     ; Quick pass see of both the same sign
  26+ A88D E6 7F                            and     SignMask8Bit
  27+ A88F 67                               ld      h,a
  28+ A890 7A                               ld      a,d                                     ; Quick pass see of both the same sign
  29+ A891 E6 7F                            and     SignMask8Bit
  30+ A893 57                               ld      d,a
  31+ A894 A7                               and     a
  32+ A895 ED 52                            sbc     hl,de
  33+ A897 D1 E1                            pop     hl,,de
  34+ A899 C9                               ret
  35+ A89A
  36+ A89A
# file closed: ./Maths/compare16.asm
 994  A89A                  INCLUDE "./Maths/negate16.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/negate16.asm
   1+ A89A              ;;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   2+ A89A              ;; 16-bit negate
   3+ A89A              negate16:
   4+ A89A              negate16hl:
   5+ A89A                      ; Input:
   6+ A89A                      ;       HL = value
   7+ A89A                      ; Output:
   8+ A89A                      ;       HL = -value
   9+ A89A                      ; Destroys:
  10+ A89A                      ;       AF
  11+ A89A                      ;
  12+ A89A AF           	xor 	a
  13+ A89B 95           	sub 	l
  14+ A89C 6F           	ld 		l,a
  15+ A89D 9F           	sbc 	a,a
  16+ A89E 94           	sub 	h
  17+ A89F 67           	ld 		h,a
  18+ A8A0 C9           	ret
  19+ A8A1
  20+ A8A1              negate16de:
  21+ A8A1 AF           	xor 	a
  22+ A8A2 93           	sub 	e
  23+ A8A3 5F           	ld 		e,a
  24+ A8A4 9F           	sbc 	a,a
  25+ A8A5 92           	sub 	d
  26+ A8A6 57           	ld 		d,a
  27+ A8A7 C9           	ret
  28+ A8A8
  29+ A8A8              negate16bc:
  30+ A8A8 AF           	xor 	a
  31+ A8A9 91           	sub 	c
  32+ A8AA 4F           	ld 		c,a
  33+ A8AB 9F           	sbc 	a,a
  34+ A8AC 90           	sub 	b
  35+ A8AD 47           	ld 		b,a
  36+ A8AE C9           	ret
  37+ A8AF
  38+ A8AF
  39+ A8AF              macronegate16hl:	MACRO
  40+ A8AF ~            					xor 	a
  41+ A8AF ~            					sub 	l
  42+ A8AF ~            					ld 		l,a
  43+ A8AF ~            					sbc 	a,a
  44+ A8AF ~            					sub 	h
  45+ A8AF ~            					ld 		h,a
  46+ A8AF              					ENDM
  47+ A8AF
  48+ A8AF              macronegate16de:	MACRO
  49+ A8AF ~            					xor 	a
  50+ A8AF ~                                sub 	e
  51+ A8AF ~                                ld 		e,a
  52+ A8AF ~                                sbc 	a,a
  53+ A8AF ~                                sub 	d
  54+ A8AF ~                                ld 		d,a
  55+ A8AF              					ENDM
  56+ A8AF              macronegate16bc:	MACRO
  57+ A8AF ~            					xor 	a
  58+ A8AF ~                                sub 	c
  59+ A8AF ~                                ld 		c,a
  60+ A8AF ~                                sbc 	a,a
  61+ A8AF ~                                sub 	b
  62+ A8AF ~                                ld 		b,a
  63+ A8AF              					ENDM
  64+ A8AF
  65+ A8AF              macronegate16ix:	MACRO
  66+ A8AF ~            					xor 	a
  67+ A8AF ~                                sub 	ixl
  68+ A8AF ~                                ld 		ixl,a
  69+ A8AF ~                                sbc 	a,a
  70+ A8AF ~                                sub 	ixh
  71+ A8AF ~                                ld 		ixh,a
  72+ A8AF              					ENDM
# file closed: ./Maths/negate16.asm
 995  A8AF                  INCLUDE "./Maths/normalise96.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/normalise96.asm
   1+ A8AF DD 68        AequAdivDmul96Unsg:     ld			ixl,b						; Get sign bit passed in as bit 7 in b
   2+ A8B1                                      JumpIfAGTENusng d, TISXAccGTEQ			; if A >= Q then return with a 1 (unity i.e. 96) with the correct sign
   2+ A8B1 BA          >                        cp     d
   2+ A8B2 D2 C7 A8    >                        jp		nc,TISXAccGTEQ
   3+ A8B5 4F                                   ld			c,a
   4+ A8B6 CD FC A6                             call		asm_div8
   5+ A8B9 79                                   ld			a,c							; a = result
   6+ A8BA CB 3F                                srl			a							; result / 4
   7+ A8BC 47                                   ld			b,a							; t = t /4
   8+ A8BD CB 3F                                srl			a							; result / 8
   9+ A8BF 80                                   add			a,b							; result /8 + result /4
  10+ A8C0 47                                   ld			b,a							; b = 3/8*Acc (max = 96)
  11+ A8C1 DD 7D                                ld			a,ixl						; copy of Acc to look at sign bit
  12+ A8C3 E6 80                                and			$80							; recover sign only
  13+ A8C5 B0                                   or			b							; now put b back in so we have a leading sign bit (note not 2's compliment)
  14+ A8C6 C9                                   ret
  15+ A8C7              TISXAccGTEQ:
  16+ A8C7              ;TI4:										;\ clean to +/- unity
  17+ A8C7 DD 7D                                ld			a,ixl     					; get saved sign from b
  18+ A8C9 E6 80                                and			$80							; copy of Acc
  19+ A8CB F6 60                                or			$60							; unity
  20+ A8CD C9                                   ret
  21+ A8CE
  22+ A8CE
  23+ A8CE
  24+ A8CE
  25+ A8CE              normaliseXX1596fast:
  26+ A8CE                  ; .NORM	\ -> &3BD6 \ Normalize 3-vector length of XX15
  27+ A8CE 3A 79 C0     	ld		a,(XX15)		    ; XX15+0
  28+ A8D1 DD 67        	ld		ixh,a               ; ixh = signed x component
  29+ A8D3 E6 7F        	and		SignMask8Bit                 ; a = unsigned version
  30+ A8D5              N96SQX:
  31+ A8D5              	inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2
  31+ A8D5 5F          >			ld	e,a
  31+ A8D6 57          >			ld  d,a
  31+ A8D7 ED 30       >			mul
  32+ A8D9 62           	ld		h,d					; h == varR d = varO e= varA
  33+ A8DA 6B           	ld		l,e					; l == varQ  															:: so HL = XX15[x]^2
  34+ A8DB              N96SQY:
  35+ A8DB 3A 7A C0     	ld		a,(XX15+1)
  36+ A8DE DD 6F        	ld		ixl,a               ; ixl = signed y componet
  37+ A8E0 E6 7F        	and		SignMask8Bit                 ; = abs
  38+ A8E2              	inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2		:: so DE = XX15[y]^2
  38+ A8E2 5F          >			ld	e,a
  38+ A8E3 57          >			ld  d,a
  38+ A8E4 ED 30       >			mul
  39+ A8E6 19           	add		hl,de				; hl = XX15[x]^2 + XX15[y]^2
  40+ A8E7              N96SQZ:
  41+ A8E7 3A 7B C0     	ld		a,(XX15+2)			; Note comments say \ ZZ15+2  should be \ XX15+2 as per code
  42+ A8EA FD 67        	ld		iyh,a               ; iyh = signed
  43+ A8EC E6 7F        	and		SignMask8Bit                 ; unsigned
  44+ A8EE              	inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2		:: so DE = XX15[z]^2
  44+ A8EE 5F          >			ld	e,a
  44+ A8EF 57          >			ld  d,a
  44+ A8F0 ED 30       >			mul
  45+ A8F2              N96SQADD:
  46+ A8F2 19           	add		hl,de				; hl = XX15[x]^2 + XX15[y]^2 + XX15[z]^2
  47+ A8F3 EB           	ex		de,hl				; hl => de ready for square root
  48+ A8F4              N96SQRT:
  49+ A8F4 CD 0D A6     	call	asm_sqrt			; hl = sqrt(XX15[x]^2 + XX15[y]^2 + XX15[z]^2), we just are interested in l which is the new Q
  50+ A8F7              N96NORMX:
  51+ A8F7 3A 79 C0     	ld		a,(XX15+0)
  52+ A8FA E6 7F        	and		SignMask8Bit
  53+ A8FC 4F           	ld		c,a
  54+ A8FD 55           	ld		d,l					; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  55+ A8FE CD 25 AB     	call	AequAdivDmul96	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  56+ A901 47           	ld		b,a				;++SGN
  57+ A902 DD 7C        	ld		a,ixh			;++SGN
  58+ A904 E6 80        	and		$80				;++SGN
  59+ A906 B0           	or		b				;++SGN
  60+ A907 32 79 C0     	ld		(XX15+0),a
  61+ A90A              N96NORMY:
  62+ A90A 3A 7A C0     	ld		a,(XX15+1)
  63+ A90D E6 7F        	and		SignMask8Bit
  64+ A90F 4F           	ld		c,a
  65+ A910 55           	ld		d,l					; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  66+ A911 CD 25 AB     	call	AequAdivDmul96     	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  67+ A914 47           	ld		b,a				;++SGN
  68+ A915 DD 7D        	ld		a,ixl			;++SGN
  69+ A917 E6 80        	and		$80				;++SGN
  70+ A919 B0           	or		b				;++SGN
  71+ A91A 32 7A C0     	ld		(XX15+1),a
  72+ A91D              N96NORMZ:
  73+ A91D 3A 7B C0     	ld		a,(XX15+2)
  74+ A920 E6 7F        	and		SignMask8Bit
  75+ A922 4F           	ld		c,a
  76+ A923 55           	ld		d,l					; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  77+ A924 CD 25 AB     	call	AequAdivDmul96	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  78+ A927 47           	ld		b,a				;++SGN
  79+ A928 FD 7C        	ld		a,iyh			;++SGN
  80+ A92A E6 80        	and		$80				;++SGN
  81+ A92C B0           	or		b				;++SGN
  82+ A92D 32 7B C0     	ld		(XX15+2),a
  83+ A930 C9           	ret
  84+ A931
  85+ A931              ; Normalise vector
  86+ A931              ; scale Q = Sqrt (X^2 + Y^2 + Z^2)
  87+ A931              ; X = X / Q with 96 = 1 , i.e X = X / Q * 3/8
  88+ A931              ; Y = Y / Q with 96 = 1 , i.e Y = Y / Q * 3/8
  89+ A931              ; Z = Z / Q with 96 = 1 , i.e Z = Z / Q * 3/8
  90+ A931              ;
  91+ A931              ;
  92+ A931              ;
  93+ A931
  94+ A931              ; .NORM	\ -> &3BD6 \ Normalize 3-vector length of XX15
  95+ A931 3A 79 C0     normaliseXX1596:        ld		a,(XX15)		    ; XX15+0
  96+ A934                                      inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2
  96+ A934 5F          >			ld	e,a
  96+ A935 57          >			ld  d,a
  96+ A936 ED 30       >			mul
  97+ A938 7A                                   ld		a,d
  98+ A939 32 D3 94                             ld		(varR),a			; R	 \ hi sum later use b
  99+ A93C 7B                                   ld		a,e
 100+ A93D 32 D2 94                             ld		(varQ),a			; Q	 \ lo sum later use c
 101+ A940 32 71 94                             ld		(varP),a			; P	 \ lo sum later just drop
 102+ A943 3A 7A C0                             ld		a,(XX15+1)
 103+ A946                                      inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2
 103+ A946 5F          >			ld	e,a
 103+ A947 57          >			ld  d,a
 103+ A948 ED 30       >			mul
 104+ A94A 7A                                   ld		a,d
 105+ A94B 32 F0 94                             ld		(varT),a			; T	 \ hi sum
 106+ A94E 7B                                   ld		a,e
 107+ A94F 32 71 94                             ld		(varP),a			; P	 \ lo sum
 108+ A952 21 D2 94                             ld		hl,varQ
 109+ A955 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)				; +Q
 110+ A956 32 D2 94                             ld		(varQ),a			; =>Q
 111+ A959 3A F0 94                             ld		a,(varT)			;
 112+ A95C 21 D3 94                             ld		hl,varR
 113+ A95F 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)				;  R
 114+ A960 32 D3 94                             ld		(varR),a			; R
 115+ A963 3A 7B C0                             ld		a,(XX15+2)			; Note comments say \ ZZ15+2  should be \ XX15+2 as per code
 116+ A966                                      inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2
 116+ A966 5F          >			ld	e,a
 116+ A967 57          >			ld  d,a
 116+ A968 ED 30       >			mul
 117+ A96A 7A                                   ld		a,d
 118+ A96B 32 F0 94                             ld		(varT),a			; T	 \ hi sum
 119+ A96E 7B                                   ld		a,e
 120+ A96F 32 71 94                             ld		(varP),a			; P	 \ lo sum
 121+ A972 21 D2 94                             ld		hl,varQ
