 122+ A975 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)				; +Q
 123+ A976 32 D2 94                             ld		(varQ),a			; =>Q  xlo2 + ylo2 + zlo2
 124+ A979 3A F0 94                             ld		a,(varT)			; T temp Hi
 125+ A97C 21 D3 94                             ld		hl,varR
 126+ A97F 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)				; +R
 127+ A980 32 D3 94                             ld		(varR),a			; R
 128+ A983 CD 30 A6                             call	sqrtQR				; Q = SQR(Qlo.Rhi) Q <~127
 129+ A986 3A 79 C0                             ld		a,(XX15+0)
 130+ A989 CD 1F AB                             call	AequAdivQmul96		;  TIS2 \ *96/Q
 131+ A98C 32 79 C0                             ld		(XX15+0),a
 132+ A98F 3A 7A C0                             ld		a,(XX15+1)
 133+ A992 CD 1F AB                             call	AequAdivQmul96		;  TIS2 \ *96/Q
 134+ A995 32 7A C0                             ld		(XX15+1),a
 135+ A998 3A 7A C0                             ld		a,(XX15+1)
 136+ A99B CD 1F AB                             call	AequAdivQmul96		;  TIS2 \ *96/Q
 137+ A99E 32 7A C0                             ld		(XX15+1),a
 138+ A9A1 C9                                   ret
 139+ A9A2
 140+ A9A2
# file closed: ./Maths/normalise96.asm
 996  A9A2                  INCLUDE "./Maths/binary_to_decimal.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/binary_to_decimal.asm
   1+ A9A2              ;Number in hl to decimal ASCII
   2+ A9A2              ;Thanks to z80 Bits
   3+ A9A2              ;inputs:	hl = number to ASCII
   4+ A9A2              ;example: hl=300 outputs '00300'
   5+ A9A2              ;destroys: af, bc, hl, de used
   6+ A9A2              DispHLtoDE:
   7+ A9A2              ; "DispHL, writes HL to DE address"
   8+ A9A2 01 F0 D8     	ld	bc,-10000
   9+ A9A5 CD BB A9     	call	Num1
  10+ A9A8 01 18 FC     	ld	bc,-1000
  11+ A9AB CD BB A9     	call	Num1
  12+ A9AE 01 9C FF     	ld	bc,-100
  13+ A9B1 CD BB A9     	call	Num1
  14+ A9B4 0E F6        	ld	c,-10
  15+ A9B6 CD BB A9     	call	Num1
  16+ A9B9 0E FF        	ld	c,-1
  17+ A9BB              Num1:
  18+ A9BB 3E 2F        	ld	a,'0'-1
  19+ A9BD              .Num2:
  20+ A9BD 3C           	inc	a
  21+ A9BE 09           	add	hl,bc
  22+ A9BF 38 FC        	jr	c,.Num2
  23+ A9C1 ED 42        	sbc	hl,bc
  24+ A9C3 12           	ld	(de),a
  25+ A9C4 13           	inc	de
  26+ A9C5 C9           	ret
  27+ A9C6
  28+ A9C6              DispAtoDE:
  29+ A9C6 26 00        	ld h,0
  30+ A9C8 6F           	ld l,a
  31+ A9C9 C3 A2 A9     	jp DispHLtoDE
  32+ A9CC
  33+ A9CC              DispPriceAtoDE:
  34+ A9CC 26 00        	ld h,0
  35+ A9CE 6F           	ld l,a
  36+ A9CF 01 9C FF     	ld	bc,-100
  37+ A9D2 CD E2 A9     	call	.NumLeadBlank1
  38+ A9D5 0E F6        	ld	c,-10
  39+ A9D7 CD BB A9     	call	Num1
  40+ A9DA 3E 2E        	ld		a,'.'					; we could assume preformat but
  41+ A9DC 12           	ld		(de),a					; we can optimse that later TODO
  42+ A9DD 13           	inc		de						; with just an inc De
  43+ A9DE 0E FF        	ld	c,-1
  44+ A9E0 18 D9        	jr		Num1
  45+ A9E2              .NumLeadBlank1:
  46+ A9E2 3E 2F        	ld	a,'0'-1
  47+ A9E4              .NumLeadBlank2:
  48+ A9E4 3C           	inc	a
  49+ A9E5 09           	add	hl,bc
  50+ A9E6 38 FC        	jr	c,.NumLeadBlank2
  51+ A9E8 FE 30        	cp	'0'
  52+ A9EA 20 02        	jr	nz,.DontBlank
  53+ A9EC              .Blank:
  54+ A9EC 3E 20        	ld	a,' '
  55+ A9EE              .DontBlank:
  56+ A9EE ED 42        	sbc	hl,bc
  57+ A9F0 12           	ld	(de),a
  58+ A9F1 13           	inc	de
  59+ A9F2 C9           	ret
  60+ A9F3
  61+ A9F3              DispQtyAtoDE:
  62+ A9F3 FE 00        	cp	0
  63+ A9F5 28 23        	jr	z,.NoStock
  64+ A9F7 26 00        	ld h,0
  65+ A9F9 6F           	ld l,a
  66+ A9FA 01 9C FF     	ld	bc,-100
  67+ A9FD CD 09 AA     	call	.NumLeadBlank1
  68+ AA00 0E F6        	ld	c,-10
  69+ AA02 CD 09 AA     	call	.NumLeadBlank1
  70+ AA05 0E FF        	ld	c,-1
  71+ AA07 18 B2        	jr		Num1
  72+ AA09              .NumLeadBlank1:
  73+ AA09 3E 2F        	ld	a,'0'-1
  74+ AA0B              .NumLeadBlank2:
  75+ AA0B 3C           	inc	a
  76+ AA0C 09           	add	hl,bc
  77+ AA0D 38 FC        	jr	c,.NumLeadBlank2
  78+ AA0F FE 30        	cp	'0'
  79+ AA11 20 02        	jr	nz,.DontBlank
  80+ AA13              .Blank:
  81+ AA13 3E 20        	ld	a,' '
  82+ AA15              .DontBlank:
  83+ AA15 ED 42        	sbc	hl,bc
  84+ AA17 12           	ld	(de),a
  85+ AA18 13           	inc	de
  86+ AA19 C9           	ret
  87+ AA1A              .NoStock:
  88+ AA1A 3E 20        	ld	a,' '
  89+ AA1C 12           	ld	(de),a
  90+ AA1D 13           	inc	de
  91+ AA1E 12           	ld	(de),a
  92+ AA1F 13           	inc	de
  93+ AA20 3E 2D        	ld	a,'-'
  94+ AA22 12           	ld	(de),a
  95+ AA23 13           	inc de
  96+ AA24 C9           	ret
  97+ AA25
  98+ AA25
  99+ AA25              ;### CLCN32 -> Converts 32Bit-Value in ASCII-String (terminated by 0)
 100+ AA25              ;### Input      DE,IX=32bit value, IY=destination address
 101+ AA25              ;### Output     IY=last char in destination string
 102+ AA25              ;### Destroyed AF,BC,DE,HL,IX
 103+ AA25 01 00 00 00  clcn32t dw 1,0,     10,0,     100,0,     1000,0,       10000,0
 103+ AA29 0A 00 00 00
 103+ AA2D 64 00 00 00
 103+ AA31 E8 03 00 00
 103+ AA35 10 27 00 00
 104+ AA39 A0 86 01 00          dw $86a0,1, $4240,$0f, $9680,$98, $e100,$05f5, $ca00,$3b9a
 104+ AA3D 40 42 0F 00
 104+ AA41 80 96 98 00
 104+ AA45 00 E1 F5 05
 104+ AA49 00 CA 9A 3B
 105+ AA4D 00 00 00 00  clcn32z ds 4
 106+ AA51
 107+ AA51              ; As per display but shifts final digit by 1 and puts in "." for 1 decimal place
 108+ AA51 CD 60 AA     DispDEIXtoIY1DP:        call    DispDEIXtoIY
 109+ AA54 FD 7E 00                             ld      a,(IY+0)
 110+ AA57 FD 77 01                             ld      (IY+1),a
 111+ AA5A 3E 2E                                ld      a,"."
 112+ AA5C FD 77 00                             ld      (IY+0),a
 113+ AA5F C9                                   ret
 114+ AA60
 115+ AA60 DD 22 4D AA  DispDEIXtoIY:           ld (clcn32z),ix
 116+ AA64 ED 53 4F AA                          ld (clcn32z+2),de
 117+ AA68 DD 21 49 AA                          ld ix,clcn32t+36
 118+ AA6C 06 09                                ld b,9
 119+ AA6E 0E 00                                ld c,0
 120+ AA70 3E 30        .clcn321:               ld a,'0'
 121+ AA72 B7                                   or a
 122+ AA73 DD 5E 00     .clcn322:               ld e,(ix+0)
 123+ AA76 DD 56 01                             ld d,(ix+1)
 124+ AA79 2A 4D AA                             ld hl,(clcn32z)
 125+ AA7C ED 52                                sbc hl,de
 126+ AA7E 22 4D AA                             ld (clcn32z),hl
 127+ AA81 DD 5E 02                             ld e,(ix+2)
 128+ AA84 DD 56 03                             ld d,(ix+3)
 129+ AA87 2A 4F AA                             ld hl,(clcn32z+2)
 130+ AA8A ED 52                                sbc hl,de
 131+ AA8C 22 4F AA                             ld (clcn32z+2),hl
 132+ AA8F 38 04                                jr c,.clcn325
 133+ AA91 0C                                   inc c
 134+ AA92 3C                                   inc a
 135+ AA93 18 DE                                jr .clcn322
 136+ AA95 DD 5E 00     .clcn325:               ld e,(ix+0)
 137+ AA98 DD 56 01                             ld d,(ix+1)
 138+ AA9B 2A 4D AA                             ld hl,(clcn32z)
 139+ AA9E 19                                   add hl,de
 140+ AA9F 22 4D AA                             ld (clcn32z),hl
 141+ AAA2 DD 5E 02                             ld e,(ix+2)
 142+ AAA5 DD 56 03                             ld d,(ix+3)
 143+ AAA8 2A 4F AA                             ld hl,(clcn32z+2)
 144+ AAAB ED 5A                                adc hl,de
 145+ AAAD 22 4F AA                             ld (clcn32z+2),hl
 146+ AAB0 11 FC FF                             ld de,-4
 147+ AAB3 DD 19                                add ix,de
 148+ AAB5 0C                                   inc c
 149+ AAB6 0D                                   dec c
 150+ AAB7 28 05                                jr z,.clcn323
 151+ AAB9 FD 77 00                             ld (iy+0),a
 152+ AABC FD 23                                inc iy
 153+ AABE 10 B0        .clcn323:               djnz .clcn321
 154+ AAC0 3A 4D AA                             ld a,(clcn32z)
 155+ AAC3 C6 30                                add A,'0'
 156+ AAC5 FD 77 00                             ld (iy+0),a
 157+ AAC8 FD 36 01 00                          ld (iy+1),0
 158+ AACC C9                                   ret
 159+ AACD
# file closed: ./Maths/binary_to_decimal.asm
 997  AACD                  include "./Maths/ADDHLDESignBC.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/ADDHLDESignBC.asm
   1+ AACD              ;; calcs HLB + DEC where B and C are signs
   2+ AACD              ;; result HL with A as sign
   3+ AACD              ;; special handling if result is zero forcign sign bit to be zero
   4+ AACD 78           ADDHLDESignBC:          ld      a,b
   5+ AACE E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
   6+ AAD0 A9                                   xor     c                           ;if b sign and c sign were different then bit 7 of a will be 1 which means
   7+ AAD1                                      JumpIfNegative ADDHLDEsBCOppSGN     ;Signs are opposite there fore we can subtract to get difference
   7+ AAD1 FA DF AA    >                        jp		m, ADDHLDEsBCOppSGN
   8+ AAD4 78           ADDHLDEsBCSameSigns:    ld      a,b
   9+ AAD5 B1                                   or      c
  10+ AAD6                                      JumpIfNegative ADDHLDEsBCSameNeg        ; optimisation so we can just do simple add if both positive
  10+ AAD6 FA DB AA    >                        jp		m, ADDHLDEsBCSameNeg
  11+ AAD9 19                                   add     hl,de                       ; both positive so a will already be zero
  12+ AADA C9                                   ret
  13+ AADB 19           ADDHLDEsBCSameNeg:      add     hl,de
  14+ AADC 78                                   ld      a,b
  15+ AADD B1                                   or      c                           ; now set bit for negative value, we won't bother with overflow for now TODO
  16+ AADE C9                                   ret
  17+ AADF B7           ADDHLDEsBCOppSGN:       or      a
  18+ AAE0 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
  19+ AAE2 38 02                                jr      c,ADDHLDEsBCOppInvert
  20+ AAE4 78           ADDHLDEsBCOppSGNNoCarry: ld      a,b                                               ; we got here so hl > de therefore we can just take hl's previous sign bit
  21+ AAE5 C9                                   ret
  22+ AAE6              ADDHLDEsBCOppInvert:    NegHL                         ; if result was zero then set sign to zero (which doing h or l will give us for free)
  22+ AAE6 AF          >                    xor a
  22+ AAE7 95          >                    sub l
  22+ AAE8 6F          >                    ld l,a
  22+ AAE9 9F          >                    sbc a,a
  22+ AAEA 94          >                    sub h
  22+ AAEB 67          >                    ld h,a
  23+ AAEC 78                                   ld      a,b
  24+ AAED EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign bit
  25+ AAEF C9                                   ret
  26+ AAF0
# file closed: ./Maths/ADDHLDESignBC.asm
 998  AAF0              ;INCLUDE "badd_ll38.asm"
 999  AAF0              ;;INCLUDE "XX12equXX15byXX16.asm"
1000  AAF0                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/AequAdivQmul96-TIS2.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/AequAdivQmul96-TIS2.asm
   1+ AAF0              AequAdivQmul96ABS:      JumpIfAGTENusng d, .TIS2AccGTEQ			; if A >= Q then return with a 1 (unity i.e. 96) with the correct sign
   1+ AAF0 BA          >                        cp     d
   1+ AAF1 D2 0C AB    >                        jp		nc,.TIS2AccGTEQ
   2+ AAF4 06 FE                                ld			b,$FE						; division roll (replaced varT)
   3+ AAF6 CB 27        .TIS2RollTLoop:			sla			a
   4+ AAF8                                      JumpIfALTNusng d,.TIS2SkipSub           ; a < d so don;t subtract
   4+ AAF8 BA          >                        cp      d
   4+ AAF9 DA 0F AB    >                        jp		c, .TIS2SkipSub
   5+ AAFC 9A                                   sbc			a,d							; do subtraction with carry
   6+ AAFD 37                                   scf
   7+ AAFE CB 10                                rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
   8+ AB00 38 F4                                jr			c,.TIS2RollTLoop				; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
   9+ AB02 78           .TIS2SKIPCont:	        ld			a,b							; T
  10+ AB03 CB 3F                                srl			a							; result / 2
  11+ AB05 CB 3F                                srl			a							; result / 4
  12+ AB07 47                                   ld			b,a							; t = t /4
  13+ AB08 CB 3F                                srl			a							; result / 8
  14+ AB0A 80                                   add			a,b							; result /8 + result /4
  15+ AB0B C9                                   ret
  16+ AB0C 3E 60        .TIS2AccGTEQ:           ld			a,$60							; unity
  17+ AB0E C9                                   ret
  18+ AB0F B7           .TIS2SkipSub:           or			a
  19+ AB10 CB 10                                rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
  20+ AB12 38 E2                                jr			c,.TIS2RollTLoop				; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
  21+ AB14 C3 02 AB                             jp			.TIS2SKIPCont
  22+ AB17
  23+ AB17
  24+ AB17              ; USES 			A DE BC
  25+ AB17              ; DOES NOT USE 	HL
  26+ AB17              TIS2962C:		; two's compliment entry point, exits not 2's compliment
  27+ AB17 CB 7F        	bit			7,a
  28+ AB19 28 04        	jr			z,AequAdivQmul96
  29+ AB1B ED 44        	neg										; revers 2s'c and just set neg bit
  30+ AB1D CB FF        	set			7,a
  31+ AB1F              ; Note negative numbers are bit 7 set not 2's compliment
  32+ AB1F              AequAdivQmul96:								; TIS296:			; .tis2 A = A /Q *96 (or A = A * 3/8 * Q) Reduce Acc in NORM routine i.e. *96/Q clamps at +- 96
  33+ AB1F              TIS2:
  34+ AB1F 4F           	ld			c,a							; copy of Acc
  35+ AB20 3A D2 94     	ld			a,(varQ)
  36+ AB23 57           	ld			d,a							; d = varQ
  37+ AB24 79           	ld			a,c							; recover a
  38+ AB25              AequAdivDmul96:
  39+ AB25 4F           	ld			c,a							; copy of Acc as we need the sign, alternate entry point assuming D preloaded, wastes an "ld c,a" but simplifies code
  40+ AB26 E6 7F        	and			SignMask8Bit				; ignore sign
  41+ AB28              	JumpIfAGTENusng d, .TIS2AccGTEQ			; if A >= Q then return with a 1 (unity i.e. 96) with the correct sign
  41+ AB28 BA          >                        cp     d
  41+ AB29 D2 49 AB    >                        jp		nc,.TIS2AccGTEQ
  42+ AB2C 06 FE        	ld			b,$FE						; division roll (replaced varT)
  43+ AB2E              .TIS2RollTLoop:									; .TIL2	; roll T
  44+ AB2E CB 27        	sla			a
  45+ AB30              	JumpIfALTNusng d,.TIS2SkipSub            ; a < d so don;t subtract
  45+ AB30 BA          >                        cp      d
  45+ AB31 DA 4F AB    >                        jp		c, .TIS2SkipSub
  46+ AB34 9A           	sbc			a,d							; do subtraction with carry
  47+ AB35 37           	scf
  48+ AB36 CB 10        	rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
  49+ AB38 38 F4        	jr			c,.TIS2RollTLoop				; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
  50+ AB3A              .TIS2SKIPCont:
  51+ AB3A 78           	ld			a,b							; T
  52+ AB3B CB 3F        	srl			a							; result / 2
  53+ AB3D CB 3F        	srl			a							; result / 4
  54+ AB3F 47           	ld			b,a							; t = t /4
  55+ AB40 CB 3F        	srl			a							; result / 8
  56+ AB42 80           	add			a,b							; result /8 + result /4
  57+ AB43 47           	ld			b,a							; b = 3/8*Acc (max = 96)
  58+ AB44 79           	ld			a,c							; copy of Acc to look at sign bit
  59+ AB45 E6 80        	and			$80							; recover sign only
  60+ AB47 B0           	or			b							; now put b back in so we have a leading sign bit (note not 2's compliment)
  61+ AB48 C9           	ret
  62+ AB49              .TIS2AccGTEQ:
  63+ AB49              ;TI4:										;\ clean to +/- unity
  64+ AB49 79           	ld			a,c
  65+ AB4A E6 80        	and			$80							; copy of Acc
  66+ AB4C F6 60        	or			$60							; unity
  67+ AB4E C9           	ret
  68+ AB4F              .TIS2SkipSub:
  69+ AB4F B7           	or			a
  70+ AB50 CB 10        	rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
  71+ AB52 38 DA        	jr			c,.TIS2RollTLoop				; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
  72+ AB54 C3 3A AB     	jp			.TIS2SKIPCont
  73+ AB57
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/AequAdivQmul96-TIS2.asm
1001  AB57                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/AequAmulQdiv256-FMLTU.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/AequAmulQdiv256-FMLTU.asm
   1+ AB57              fmltu:
   2+ AB57              AequAmulQdiv256:
   3+ AB57              ; "ASM_FMUTKL .FMLTU	\ -> &2847  \ A=A*Q/256unsg  Fast multiply"
   4+ AB57 57           	ld	d,a
   5+ AB58 3A D2 94     	ld	a,(varQ)
   6+ AB5B 5F           	ld	e,a
   7+ AB5C ED 30        	mul
   8+ AB5E 7A           	ld	a,d				; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
   9+ AB5F C9           	ret
  10+ AB60
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/AequAmulQdiv256-FMLTU.asm
1002  AB60                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/PRequSpeedDivZZdiv8-DV42-DV42IYH.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/PRequSpeedDivZZdiv8-DV42-DV42IYH.asm
   1+ AB60              ; "DV42,DV42IYH DE = P.R, c = R"
   2+ AB60              DV42IYH:									; as per DV42 but using iyl for Y reg
   3+ AB60 21 C2 97     		ld		hl,varDustZ
   4+ AB63 FD 7D        		ld		a,iyl
   5+ AB65 ED 31        		add		hl,a
   6+ AB67 7E           		ld		a,(hl)
   7+ AB68 C3 74 AB     		jp		DV41
   8+ AB6B              DV42:										; travel step of dust particle front/rear
   9+ AB6B 21 C2 97     		ld		hl,varDustZ
  10+ AB6E 3A 5F 94     		ld		a,(regY)
  11+ AB71 ED 31        		add		hl,a
  12+ AB73 7E           		ld		a,(hl)						; a = SZ[y]
  13+ AB74              DV41:										; P.R = speed/ (ZZ/8) dust left/right
  14+ AB74 5F           		ld		e,a							; using E as Q var replacement
  15+ AB75 3A CE 94     		ld		a,(DELTA)					; DELTA \ speed, how far has dust moved based on its z-coord.
  16+ AB78              DVID4:										; P-R=A/Qunsg  \P.R = A/Q unsigned called by Hall
  17+ AB78 06 08        		ld		b,8							; counter
  18+ AB7A CB 27        		sla		a							;
  19+ AB7C 57           		ld		d,a							; use d for - p = delta * 2
  20+ AB7D AF           		xor		a
  21+ AB7E              DVL4:										; counter x loop (b reg)
  22+ AB7E CB 17        		rl		a							; a = a * 2
  23+ AB80 38 03        		jr		c,DV8						; jump on carry
  24+ AB82 BB           		cp		e							; var Q
  25+ AB83 38 02        		jr		c,DV5						; skip subtraction
  26+ AB85              DV8:
  27+ AB85 9B           		sbc		a,e							; a = a - q (with carry)
  28+ AB86 37           		scf									;  carry gets set
  29+ AB87              DV5:										; skipped subtraction
  30+ AB87 CB 12        		rl		d							; d (P hi)
  31+ AB89 10 F3        		djnz	DVL4						; dec b and loop loop X, hi left in P.
  32+ AB8B              .CalcRemainder:								; BFRDIV R=A*256/Q
  33+ AB8B              ; Note we are not going to call LL28+4 but inline code here:
  34+ AB8B 06 FE        		ld		b,$FE						; remainder R for AofQ *256/Q
  35+ AB8D 4F           		ld		c,a							; use c as R var
  36+ AB8E              .RollRemainder:
  37+ AB8E CB 27        		sla		a
  38+ AB90 38 11        		jr		c,.Reduce					; if a >> generates carry reduce
  39+ AB92 B8           		cp		b							; a < q?
  40+ AB93 30 01        		jr		nc,.DontSBC
  41+ AB95              .DoSBC:										; a is < q
  42+ AB95 98           		sbc		a,b							; 	a -= q
  43+ AB96              .DontSBC:
  44+ AB96 CB 11        		rl		c							; r << 1
  45+ AB98 38 F4        		jr		c, .RollRemainder			; if rol generated a carry, continue
  46+ AB9A 79           		ld		a,c
  47+ AB9B 32 D3 94     		ld		(varR),a					; for backwards compat
  48+ AB9E 7A           		ld		a,d
  49+ AB9F 32 71 94     		ld		(varP),a
  50+ ABA2 C9           		ret									; R (c) left with remainder
  51+ ABA3              .Reduce:									; a geneated a carry
  52+ ABA3 98           		sbc		a,b							; a = a - (q +1)
  53+ ABA4 37           		scf									; set carry flag for rl
  54+ ABA5 CB 11        		rl		c							; r << 1 briging in carry
  55+ ABA7 38 E5        		jr		c,	.RollRemainder			; if a carry fell off bit 7 then repeat
  56+ ABA9 79           		ld		a,c
  57+ ABAA 32 D3 94     		ld		(varR),a					; for backwards compat
  58+ ABAD 7A           		ld		a,d
  59+ ABAE 32 71 94     		ld		(varP),a
  60+ ABB1 C9           		ret
  61+ ABB2              .AnswerTooBig:
  62+ ABB2 0E FF        		ld		c,$FF						; arse its too big
  63+ ABB4 79           		ld		a,c
  64+ ABB5 32 D3 94     		ld		(varR),a					; for backwards compat
  65+ ABB8 7A           		ld		a,d
  66+ ABB9 32 71 94     		ld		(varP),a
  67+ ABBC C9           		ret
  68+ ABBD
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/PRequSpeedDivZZdiv8-DV42-DV42IYH.asm
1003  ABBD                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/AequDmulEdiv256usgn-DEFMUTL.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/AequDmulEdiv256usgn-DEFMUTL.asm
   1+ ABBD
   2+ ABBD              asm_defmutl:
   3+ ABBD              AequDmulEdiv256usgn:
   4+ ABBD              ; "ASM_FMUTKL .FMLTU	\ -> &2847  \ A=D*E/256unsg  Fast multiply"
   5+ ABBD ED 30        	mul
   6+ ABBF 7A           	ld	a,d				; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
   7+ ABC0 C9           	ret
   8+ ABC1
   9+ ABC1
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/AequDmulEdiv256usgn-DEFMUTL.asm
1004  ABC1              ;INCLUDE "AP2equAPmulQunsgEorP-MLTU2.asm"
1005  ABC1              ;INCLUDE "APequPmulQUnsg-MULTU.asm"
1006  ABC1              ;INCLUDE "APequPmulX-MU11.asm"
1007  ABC1                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/APequQmulA-MULT1.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/APequQmulA-MULT1.asm
   1+ ABC1              APequQmulA:
   2+ ABC1              asm_mult1:
   3+ ABC1              ; "ASM_MULT1 (DE) A(hi).P(lo) = Q * A first part of MAD, multiply and add. Visited Quite often. A=hi P = lo also returns result in DE"
   4+ ABC1 FE 00        	cp	0
   5+ ABC3 28 1F        	jr	z,.mul0			; quick exit if its Q * 0
   6+ ABC5 5F           	ld	e,a
   7+ ABC6 3A D2 94     	ld	a,(varQ)
   8+ ABC9 57           	ld	d,a
   9+ ABCA FE 00        	cp	0				; compare a
  10+ ABCC 28 16        	jr	z,.mul0			; quick exit if its 0 * a
  11+ ABCE AB           	xor	e				; -- = + +- = - -+ = - ++ = +
  12+ ABCF E6 80        	and $80				; get the resultant sign and save into b
  13+ ABD1 47           	ld	b,a
  14+ ABD2 7A           	ld	a,d
  15+ ABD3 E6 7F        	and	SignMask8Bit	; now strip off sign bits
  16+ ABD5 57           	ld	d,a
  17+ ABD6 7B           	ld	a,e
  18+ ABD7 E6 7F        	and SignMask8Bit
  19+ ABD9 5F           	ld	e,a
  20+ ABDA ED 30        	mul					; zxn de = d * e
  21+ ABDC 7B           	ld	a,e
  22+ ABDD 32 71 94     	ld	(varP),a		; p = lo
  23+ ABE0 7A           	ld	a,d				; a = hi
  24+ ABE1 B0           	or	b				; de goes to a and varP also re-do sign bit
  25+ ABE2 57           	ld	d,a				; we will work with de having result as we may bin vars later
  26+ ABE3 C9           	ret
  27+ ABE4              .mul0:
  28+ ABE4 AF           	xor	a
  29+ ABE5 32 71 94     	ld	(varP),a
  30+ ABE8 57           	ld	d,a
  31+ ABE9 5F           	ld  e,a
  32+ ABEA C9           	ret
  33+ ABEB
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/APequQmulA-MULT1.asm
1008  ABEB                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/badd_ll38.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/badd_ll38.asm
   1+ ABEB              baddll38:				;.LL38	\ -> &4812 \ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA) \ byte add (subtract)   (Sign S)A = R + Q*(Sign from A^S)
   2+ ABEB              SAEquSRPlusAQ:
   3+ ABEB              ; Calculate the following between sign-magnitude numbers:
   4+ ABEB              ;   (S A) = (S R) + (A Q)
   5+ ABEB              ; where the sign bytes only contain the sign bits, not magnitudes.
   6+ ABEB              ; note goes wrong at <-127 >128 so need 16 bit version
   7+ ABEB              ; so need to fix the issue with carry flag not returning a fault correctly
   8+ ABEB              LL38:
   9+ ABEB              ;	ld		d,a
  10+ ABEB              ;	ld		a,(varQ)
  11+ ABEB              ;	ld		e,a
  12+ ABEB              ;	ld		a,(varS)
  13+ ABEB              ;	ld		h,a
  14+ ABEB              ;	ld		a,(varR)
  15+ ABEB              ;	ld		l,a
  16+ ABEB              ;	call	ADDHLDESignedv3
  17+ ABEB              ;	ld		a,h
  18+ ABEB              ;	ld		(varS),a
  19+ ABEB              ;	ld		a,l
  20+ ABEB              ;	ret
  21+ ABEB              ; calculation table
  22+ ABEB              ;   R     Q    Op            Sign calc
  23+ ABEB              ;	10    5    Add           +    sign same add R sign
  24+ ABEB              ;   -10   5    ABS Sub       -    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  25+ ABEB              ;   10   -5    ABS sub       +    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  26+ ABEB              ;	-10  -5    ABS Add       -    sign same add R sign
  27+ ABEB              ;   5    10    Add           +    sign same add R sign
  28+ ABEB              ;   -5   10    Swap ABS SUB  +    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB Q sign
  29+ ABEB              ;   5    -10   swap ABS Sub  -    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB R sign
  30+ ABEB              ;   -5   -10   ABS  add      -    sign same add R sign
  31+ ABEB
  32+ ABEB              ;   -10   5    ABS Sub       -    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  33+ ABEB              ;   10   -5    ABS sub       +    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  34+ ABEB              ;   -5   10    Swap ABS SUB  +    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB Q sign
  35+ ABEB              ;   5    -10   swap ABS Sub  -    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB R sign
  36+ ABEB
  37+ ABEB
  38+ ABEB              ; Calculate sign for Q from A and varS
  39+ ABEB 21 D4 94     	ld		hl,varS							;
  40+ ABEE AE           	xor		(hl)							;  EOR &83		\ S	\ sign of operator is A xor S
  41+ ABEF FA FA AB     	jp		m,.LL39Subtraction  			; if signs are different then we have subtraction
  42+ ABF2 3A D2 94     	ld		a,(varQ)						; Q	\ else addition, S already correct
  43+ ABF5 21 D3 94     	ld		hl,varR
  44+ ABF8 86           	add		a,(hl)							; a = Q + R
  45+ ABF9 C9           	ret										; Done carry set if overflow
  46+ ABFA              .LL39Subtraction:							; 1 byte subtraction (S)A = R-Q
  47+ ABFA 3A D3 94     	ld		a,(varR)						; a = R
  48+ ABFD 21 D2 94     	ld		hl,varQ                         ; Q
  49+ AC00              ;--	JumpIfALTMemHLusng LL39SwapSubtraction	; if a < (hl) then do LL39SwapSubtraction
  50+ AC00              	ClearCarryFlag                          ; we need to not use carry (6502 is different that it uses the compliement)
  50+ AC00 B7          >                    or a
  51+ AC01 9E           	sbc		a,(hl)							; A = R - Q which as R >= Q will always be a positive result
  52+ AC02 38 01            jr      c,.LL39SignCorrection
  53+ AC04              ;--    jr      a,.LL39ResultZero
  54+ AC04              ;--   JumpIfNegative LL39SignCorrection		; if there was underflow we have to correct sign
  55+ AC04              ;--	or		a								; Clear carry flag to say result is correct
  56+ AC04 C9           	ret
  57+ AC05              .LL39SignCorrection:
  58+ AC05 FE 00            cp      0                               ; if its 0 then neg will affect flag so we just zero result to save compute
  59+ AC07 28 0E            jr      z,.LL39ResultZero
  60+ AC09 ED 44            neg                                     ; flip A 2'c value to positive
  61+ AC0B 08           	ex		af,af'							; save A temporarily
  62+ AC0C 3A D4 94     	ld		a,(varS)						; Flip Sign bit in varS
  63+ AC0F EE 80        	xor		$80							    ;
  64+ AC11 32 D4 94     	ld		(varS),a                        ; flip sign bit of a
  65+ AC14 08           	ex		af,af'                          ; get back a which is the result
  66+ AC15                  ClearCarryFlag                          ; clear carry as NEG instrunction sets it for non zero
  66+ AC15 B7          >                    or a
  67+ AC16 C9           	ret
  68+ AC17              .LL39ResultZero:
  69+ AC17 32 D4 94         ld      (varS),a                        ; a is zero at this stage so set sign as well
  70+ AC1A                  ClearCarryFlag                          ; clear carry
  70+ AC1A B7          >                    or a
  71+ AC1B C9               ret
  72+ AC1C              ;--LL39SwapSubtraction:
  73+ AC1C              ;--	push	bc
  74+ AC1C              ;--	ld		b,a
  75+ AC1C              ;--	ld		a,(hl)
  76+ AC1C              ;--	sub		b
  77+ AC1C              ;--	pop		bc
  78+ AC1C              ;--	ex		af,af'							; do we flip here or negate. i think its flip as its overflowed unsigned
  79+ AC1C              ;--	ld		a,(varS)
  80+ AC1C              ;--	xor		$80
  81+ AC1C              ;--	ld		(varS),a
  82+ AC1C              ;--	ex		af,af'
  83+ AC1C              ;--	ret
  84+ AC1C
  85+ AC1C              ;;;;	baddll38:				;.LL38	\ -> &4812 \ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA) \ byte add (subtract)   (Sign S)A = R + Q*(Sign from A^S)
  86+ AC1C              ;;;;; Calculate the following between sign-magnitude numbers:
  87+ AC1C              ;;;;;   (S A) = (S R) + (A Q)
  88+ AC1C              ;;;;; where the sign bytes only contain the sign bits, not magnitudes.
  89+ AC1C              ;;;;; note goes wrong at <-127 >128 so need 16 bit version
  90+ AC1C              ;;;;LL38:
  91+ AC1C              ;;;;; Calculate sign for Q from A and varS
  92+ AC1C              ;;;;	ld		hl,varS							;
  93+ AC1C              ;;;;	xor		(hl)							;  EOR &83		\ S	\ sign of operator is A xor S
  94+ AC1C              ;;;;	jp		m,.LL39Subtraction  			; if signs are different then we have subtraction
  95+ AC1C              ;;;;	ld		a,(varQ)						; Q	\ else addition, S already correct
  96+ AC1C              ;;;;	ld		hl,varR
  97+ AC1C              ;;;;	add		a,(hl)							; a = Q + R
  98+ AC1C              ;;;;	ret										; Done
  99+ AC1C              ;;;;.LL39Subtraction:							; 1 byte subtraction (S)A = R-Q
 100+ AC1C              ;;;;	ld		hl,varQ                         ;
 101+ AC1C              ;;;;	ld		a,(hl)
 102+ AC1C              ;;;;	JumpIfAGTENusng 128,LL39Sub16bit		; does this need to be 16 bit
 103+ AC1C              ;;;;	ld		a,(varR)						;
 104+ AC1C              ;;;;	ClearCarryFlag                          ; we need to not use carry (6502 is different that it uses the compliement)
 105+ AC1C              ;;;;	sbc		a,(hl)							; A = R - Q
 106+ AC1C              ;;;;	jr		c,.SignCorrection				; if there was underflow we have to correct sign
 107+ AC1C              ;;;;	or		a								; Clear carry flag to say result is correct
 108+ AC1C              ;;;;	ret
 109+ AC1C              ;;;;.SignCorrection:
 110+ AC1C              ;;;;    neg                                     ; flip A 2'c value to positive
 111+ AC1C              ;;;;	ex		af,af'							; save A temporarily
 112+ AC1C              ;;;;	ld		a,(varS)						; Flip Sign bit in varS
 113+ AC1C              ;;;;	xor		$80							    ;
 114+ AC1C              ;;;;	ld		(varS),a                        ; flip sign bit of a
 115+ AC1C              ;;;;	ex		af,af'                          ; get back a which is the result
 116+ AC1C              ;;;;	ret
 117+ AC1C              ;;;;LL39Sub16Bit:
 118+ AC1C              ;;;;	ld		e,a
 119+ AC1C              ;;;;	ld		d,0
 120+ AC1C              ;;;;	ld		a,(varR)
 121+ AC1C              ;;;;	ld		l,a
 122+ AC1C              ;;;;	ld		h,0
 123+ AC1C              ;;;;	ClearCarryFlag
 124+ AC1C              ;;;;	sbc		hl,de
 125+ AC1C              ;;;;	jr		c,.SignCorrection16bit
 126+ AC1C              ;;;;	bit		7,h
 127+ AC1C              ;;;;	jr		z,.GoodToReturn
 128+ AC1C              ;;;;.Needtonegate:
 129+ AC1C              ;;;;	macronegate16hl
 130+ AC1C              ;;;;.GoodToReturn
 131+ AC1C              ;;;;	ld		a,l
 132+ AC1C              ;;;;	or		a
 133+ AC1C              ;;;;	ret
 134+ AC1C              ;;;;.SignCorrection16bit:
 135+ AC1C              ;;;;	macronegate16hl
 136+ AC1C              ;;;;	ld		a,(varS)						; Flip Sign bit in varS
 137+ AC1C              ;;;;	xor		$80							    ;
 138+ AC1C              ;;;;	ld		(varS),a                        ; flip sign bit of a
 139+ AC1C              ;;;;	ld		a,l
 140+ AC1C              ;;;;	ret
 141+ AC1C
 142+ AC1C
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/badd_ll38.asm

   1+ AC1C              ; Note comparing hl vs iY, you need at least 3 incs or decs for hl to be slower
   2+ AC1C              ; it may be faster though if we can use hl to avoid memory actions if needed
   3+ AC1C              ; need to optimise mad as push hl pop hl and use de doesn't really improve speed

   8+ AC1F 47           		ld		b,a
   9+ AC20              moveship4breg:
  10+ AC20              		; b = Y index, 9 = nosev, 15 = roofv 21 = sidev
  11+ AC20              MVS4PitchAlphaRollBeta:

  13+ AC20 3A 8E 94     		ld		a,(ALPHA)					;  ALPHA

  50+ AC5F 2B                   dec     hl

1014  ACAC                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/RequAmul256divQ-BFRDIV.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/RequAmul256divQ-BFRDIV.asm
   1+ ACAC              ;;;LL28:
   2+ ACAC              ;;;    ld      c,a                         ;
   3+ ACAC              ;;;    ld      a,(varQ)                    ;
   4+ ACAC              ;;;    ld      b,a                         ;
   5+ ACAC              ;;;    ld      a,c                         ; Get varQ into b and retain c
   6+ ACAC              ;;;RequAmul256divB:                        ;
   7+ ACAC              ;;;LL28Breg:
   8+ ACAC              ;;;; "BFRDIV R = (A * 256 / Q)  byte from remainder of division, not signed a = a, b = q, c = r"
   9+ ACAC              ;;;	cp		b							; Check A >= Q
  10+ ACAC              ;;;	jr		nc, .AnswerTooBig			; A >= Q? yes too big
  11+ ACAC              ;;;.CalcRemainder:
  12+ ACAC              ;;;	ld		c, 	$FE						; set R to $FE
  13+ ACAC              ;;;.RollRemainder:
  14+ ACAC              ;;;	sla		a
  15+ ACAC              ;;;	jr		c,.Reduce					; if a >> generates carry reduce
  16+ ACAC              ;;;	cp		b							; a < q?
  17+ ACAC              ;;;	jr		nc,.DontSBC
  18+ ACAC              ;;;.DoSBC:									; a is < q
  19+ ACAC              ;;;	sbc		a,b							; 	a -= q
  20+ ACAC              ;;;.DontSBC:
  21+ ACAC              ;;;	rl		c							; r << 1
  22+ ACAC              ;;;	jr		c, .RollRemainder			; if rol generated a carry, continue
  23+ ACAC              ;;;    ld      a,c
  24+ ACAC              ;;;    ld      (varR),a
  25+ ACAC              ;;;	ret									; R (c) left with remainder
  26+ ACAC              ;;;.Reduce:								; a geneated a carry
  27+ ACAC              ;;;	sbc		a,b							; a = a - (q +1)
  28+ ACAC              ;;;	scf									; set carry flag for rl
  29+ ACAC              ;;;	rl		c							; r << 1 briging in carry
  30+ ACAC              ;;;	jr		c,	.RollRemainder			; if a carry fell off bit 7 then repeat
  31+ ACAC              ;;;    ld      a,c
  32+ ACAC              ;;;    ld      (varR),a
  33+ ACAC              ;;;	ret
  34+ ACAC              ;;;.AnswerTooBig:
  35+ ACAC              ;;;	ld	    c,$FF							; arse its too big
  36+ ACAC              ;;;    ld      a,c
  37+ ACAC              ;;;    ld      (varR),a
  38+ ACAC              ;;;	ret
  39+ ACAC
  40+ ACAC              BCequAmul256DivC:
  41+ ACAC 59             ld    e,c
  42+ ACAD 67             ld    h,a
  43+ ACAE 2E 00          ld    l,0
  44+ ACB0              AdivEDivide:                             ; this routine performs the operation BC=HL/E
  45+ ACB0 7B             ld a,e                                 ; checking the divisor; returning if it is zero
  46+ ACB1 B7             or a                                   ; from this time on the carry is cleared
  47+ ACB2 C8             ret z
  48+ ACB3 01 FF FF       ld bc,-1                               ; BC is used to accumulate the result
  49+ ACB6 16 00          ld d,0                                 ; clearing D, so DE holds the divisor
  50+ ACB8              AdivEDivLoop:                            ; subtracting DE from HL until the first overflow
  51+ ACB8 ED 52          sbc hl,de                              ; since the carry is zero, SBC works as if it was a SUB
  52+ ACBA 03             inc bc                                 ;  note that this instruction does not alter the flags
  53+ ACBB 30 FB          jr nc,AdivEDivLoop                     ; no carry means that there was no overflow
  54+ ACBD C9             ret
  55+ ACBE
  56+ ACBE              HL_Div_C:
  57+ ACBE              ; Integer divides HL by C
  58+ ACBE              ; Result in HL, remainder in A
  59+ ACBE              ; Clobbers F, B
  60+ ACBE 06 10                ld b,16
  61+ ACC0 AF                   xor a
  62+ ACC1              HL_Div_C_Loop:
  63+ ACC1 29                   add hl,hl
  64+ ACC2 17                   rla
  65+ ACC3 B9                   cp c
  66+ ACC4 38 02                jr c,HL_DivC_Skip
  67+ ACC6 91                   sub c
  68+ ACC7 2C                   inc l
  69+ ACC8              HL_DivC_Skip:
  70+ ACC8 10 F7                djnz HL_Div_C_Loop
  71+ ACCA 7D                   ld   a,l
  72+ ACCB 32 D3 94             ld  (varR),a
  73+ ACCE C9                   ret
  74+ ACCF
  75+ ACCF
  76+ ACCF
  77+ ACCF              ; Entry point if varQ is populated with demoninator
  78+ ACCF              RequAmul256divQ:
  79+ ACCF              BFRDIV:
  80+ ACCF F5           		push	af
  81+ ACD0 3A D2 94     		ld		a,(varQ)
  82+ ACD3 4F           		ld		c,a
  83+ ACD4 F1           		pop		af
  84+ ACD5 FE 00        		cp		0
  85+ ACD7 CA EE AC     		jp		z, HLDIVC_0_BY	; fast exit if numerator is 0
  86+ ACDA              RequAmul256divC:
  87+ ACDA 2E 00        		ld		l,0
  88+ ACDC 67           		ld		h,a
  89+ ACDD              HL_Div_Cold:						; fast entry point if C and HL are already set
  90+ ACDD 06 10        		ld b,16
  91+ ACDF AF           		xor a
  92+ ACE0              LOOPPOINT:
  93+ ACE0 29           		add hl,hl
  94+ ACE1 17           		rla
  95+ ACE2 B9           		cp c
  96+ ACE3 38 02        		jr c,SKIPINCSUB
  97+ ACE5 2C           		inc l
  98+ ACE6 91           		sub c
  99+ ACE7              SKIPINCSUB:
 100+ ACE7 10 F7        		djnz LOOPPOINT
 101+ ACE9 7D           		ld		a,l
 102+ ACEA 32 D3 94     		ld 		(varR),a
 103+ ACED C9           		ret
 104+ ACEE              HLDIVC_0_BY:
 105+ ACEE 32 D3 94     		ld		(varR),a
 106+ ACF1 C9           		ret
 107+ ACF2              ;	push	af
 108+ ACF2              ;	ld		a,b
 109+ ACF2              ;	ld		(varQ),a
 110+ ACF2              ;	pop		af
 111+ ACF2              ;RequAmul256divQ:
 112+ ACF2              ;BFRDIV:									;BFRDIV R=A*256/Q   byte from remainder of division
 113+ ACF2              ;	ld		hl,varQ
 114+ ACF2              ;	JumpIfAGTENusng	(hl),LL2			;  is A >=  Q ?, if yes, answer too big for 1 byte, R=#&FF
 115+ ACF2              ;	ld		b,$FE						; b = X
 116+ ACF2              ;	ld		c,a							; c = R	div roll counter
 117+ ACF2              ;LL31:									; roll R
 118+ ACF2              ;	sla		a
 119+ ACF2              ;	jr		c,LL29						; hop to Reduce
 120+ ACF2              ;	JumpIfALTNusng (hl)					; Q skip sbc if a < Q
 121+ ACF2              ;	sbc		a,(hl)						; a = a - Q
 122+ ACF2              ;	rl		c							; rotate R left
 123+ ACF2              ;	jr		c,LL31						; loop if R poped out a carry bit
 124+ ACF2              ;	jr		LL2Good
 125+ ACF2              ;LL29:									; Reduce
 126+ ACF2              ;	sbc		a,(hl)
 127+ ACF2              ;	scf
 128+ ACF2              ;	rl		c							; roll a carry flag into R
 129+ ACF2              ;	jr		c,LL31						;  loop R
 130+ ACF2              ;	jr		LL2Good
 131+ ACF2              ;LL2:
 132+ ACF2              ;	ld		c,$FF
 133+ ACF2              ;LL2Good:
 134+ ACF2              ;	ld		a,c
 135+ ACF2              ;	ld		(varR),a
 136+ ACF2              ;	ret
 137+ ACF2

1015  ACF2                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/RequAdivQ-LL61.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/RequAdivQ-LL61.asm
   1+ ACF2              RequAdivQ:
   2+ ACF2              	; R = A/Q, U = remainder, code looked a little odd as if R is reminader and U = result
   3+ ACF2              LL61:										; Handling division R=A/Q for case further down
   4+ ACF2 4F           	ld		c,a								; c = A
   5+ ACF3 3A D2 94     	ld		a,(varQ)						; test for divide by 0
   6+ ACF6 FE 00        	cp		0
   7+ ACF8 28 16        	jr		z,LL84							; divide by zero error
   8+ ACFA 57           	ld		d,a								; now we can do C/D
   9+ ACFB 06 08            ld b,8
  10+ ACFD AF               xor a
  11+ ACFE              LL63:										; roll divide loop
  12+ ACFE CB 21            sla c
  13+ AD00 17               rla
  14+ AD01 BA               cp d
  15+ AD02 38 02            jr c,LL64
  16+ AD04 0C               inc c
  17+ AD05 92               sub d
  18+ AD06              LL64:
  19+ AD06 10 F6            djnz LL63
  20+ AD08 32 D1 94     	ld	(varU),a							; store remainder in U
  21+ AD0B 79           	ld	a,c
  22+ AD0C 32 D3 94     	ld	(varR),a							; store remainder in R
  23+ AD0F C9               ret
  24+ AD10              LL84:										; div error  R=U=#5
  25+ AD10 3E 32        	ld		a,50
  26+ AD12 32 D3 94     	ld		(varR),a
  27+ AD15 32 D1 94     	ld		(varU),a
  28+ AD18 C9           	ret
  29+ AD19
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/RequAdivQ-LL61.asm

   1+ AD19              asm_mult12:
   2+ AD19              RSequQmulA:
   3+ AD19              ; "asm_ult12  R.S = Q * A \ visited quite often S = hi, R = lo, odd that its opposite to mult1"
   4+ AD19 CD C1 AB     	call APequQmulA
   5+ AD1C 08           	ex 	af,af'
   6+ AD1D 7A           	ld	a,d
   7+ AD1E 32 D4 94     	ld	(varS),a
   8+ AD21 7B           	ld	a,e
   9+ AD22 32 D3 94     	ld	(varR),a
  10+ AD25 08           	ex 	af,af'
  11+ AD26 C9           	ret

   1++AD27              CopyRotMatNoseVtoXX15:
   2++AD27                      ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatNosevX+1 ,XX15VecX
   2++AD27 3A 22 C0    >               ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
   2++AD2A 32 79 C0    >               ld       (XX15VecX),a
   3++AD2D                      ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatNosevY+1, XX15VecY
   3++AD2D 3A 24 C0    >               ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
   3++AD30 32 7A C0    >               ld       (XX15VecY),a
   4++AD33                      ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1 ,XX15VecZ
   4++AD33 3A 26 C0    >               ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
   4++AD36 32 7B C0    >               ld       (XX15VecZ),a
   5++AD39 C9                   ret
   6++AD3A
   7++AD3A              CopyRotMatRoofVtoXX15:
   8++AD3A                      ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1 ,XX15VecX
   8++AD3A 3A 1C C0    >               ld       a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)
   8++AD3D 32 79 C0    >               ld       (XX15VecX),a
   9++AD40                      ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1, XX15VecY
   9++AD40 3A 1E C0    >               ld       a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
   9++AD43 32 7A C0    >               ld       (XX15VecY),a
  10++AD46                      ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1 ,XX15VecZ
  10++AD46 3A 20 C0    >               ld       a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)
  10++AD49 32 7B C0    >               ld       (XX15VecZ),a
  11++AD4C C9                   ret
  12++AD4D
  13++AD4D              CopyRotMatSideVtoXX15:
  14++AD4D                      ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatSidevX+1 ,XX15VecX
  14++AD4D 3A 16 C0    >               ld       a,(UBnkrotmatSidevX+1)
  14++AD50 32 79 C0    >               ld       (XX15VecX),a

  31+ AD60                  include "./Variables/CopyXX15toRotMat.asm"

   1++AD60              CopyXX15toRotMatNoseV:
   2++AD60                      ldCopyByte  XX15VecX, UBnkrotmatNosevX+1
   2++AD60 3A 79 C0    >               ld       a,(XX15VecX)
   2++AD63 32 22 C0    >               ld       (UBnkrotmatNosevX+1),a
   3++AD66                      ldCopyByte  XX15VecY, UBnkrotmatNosevY+1
   3++AD66 3A 7A C0    >               ld       a,(XX15VecY)
   3++AD69 32 24 C0    >               ld       (UBnkrotmatNosevY+1),a

   4++AD6C 3A 7B C0    >               ld       a,(XX15VecZ)

   5++AD72 C9                   ret
   6++AD73
   7++AD73              CopyXX15toRotMatRoofV:
   8++AD73                      ldCopyByte  XX15VecX, UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1
   8++AD73 3A 79 C0    >               ld       a,(XX15VecX)
   8++AD76 32 1C C0    >               ld       (UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1),a
   9++AD79                      ldCopyByte  XX15VecY, UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1

   9++AD7C 32 1E C0    >               ld       (UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1),a

  15++AD8C 3A 7A C0    >               ld       a,(XX15VecY)

  32+ AD99
  33+ AD99              TidySub1:									;.TIS1	\ -> &293B  \ Tidy subroutine 1  X.A =  (-X*A  + (R.S))/96
  34+ AD99              		; b = regX on entry
  35+ AD99              TIS1Prep:									;.TIS1	\ -> &293B  \ Tidy subroutine 1 using B register = X
  36+ AD99 08           		ex		af,af'
  37+ AD9A 78           		ld		a,b
  38+ AD9B 32 D2 94     		ld		(varQ),a
  39+ AD9E 08           		ex		af,af'
  40+ AD9F EE 80        		xor		$80							;	 flip sign of Acc
  41+ ADA1 CD E3 A4     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS			; \ MAD \ multiply and add (X,A) =  -X*A  + (R,S)
  42+ ADA4              ; USES 				A BC E
  43+ ADA4              ; DOES NOT USE		D HL
  44+ ADA4              Tis1Div96:							   		; .DVID96	\ Their comment A=A/96: answer is A*255/96
  45+ ADA4 4F           		ld		c,a							; Store sign bit in  ct (we use e reg for that)
  46+ ADA5 E6 80        		and		SignOnly8Bit						; ..
  47+ ADA7 5F           		ld		e,a							; ..
  48+ ADA8 79           		ld		a,c							; a = high byte again with sign bit cleared
  49+ ADA9 E6 7F        		and		SignMask8Bit							; ..
  50+ ADAB 06 FE        		ld		b,$FE						; slide counter T1
  51+ ADAD              TIS1RollTLoop								; roll T1  clamp Acc to #96 for rotation matrix unity
  52+ ADAD CB 27        		sla		a
  53+ ADAF              		JumpIfALTNusng $60, TIS1SkipSub
  53+ ADAF FE 60       >                        cp      $60
  53+ ADB1 DA BE AD    >                        jp		c, TIS1SkipSub
  54+ ADB4 DE 60        		sbc		a,$60							; subtract 96
  55+ ADB6 37           		scf
  56+ ADB7 CB 10        		rl		b							;  T1
  57+ ADB9 38 F2        		jr		c,TIS1RollTLoop
  58+ ADBB              TIS1KIPCont:
  59+ ADBB 78           		ld		a,b							;   T1
  60+ ADBC B3           		or		e							;   restore T sign
  61+ ADBD C9           		ret
  62+ ADBE              TIS1SkipSub:
  63+ ADBE B7           	or			a
  64+ ADBF CB 10        	rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
  65+ ADC1 38 EA        	jr			c,TIS1RollTLoop				; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
  66+ ADC3 C3 BB AD     	jp			TIS1KIPCont
  67+ ADC6
  68+ ADC6              ;.TIDY	\ -> &4679 \ Orthogonalize rotation matrix that uses 0x60 as unity returns INWK(16,18,20) = INWK(12*18+14*20, 10*16+14*20, 10*16+12*18) / INWK(10,12,14)
  69+ ADC6              ; Ux,Uy,Uz = -(FyUy+FzUz, FxUx+FzUz, FxUx+FyUy)/ Fx,Fy,Fz
  70+ ADC6
  71+ ADC6
  72+ ADC6
  73+ ADC6
  74+ ADC6              TidyRotYSmall:
  75+ ADC6 CD F1 AE     		call	CalcRoofvZ
  76+ ADC9 32 20 C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1),a			; set roofvy hi?? Says roofz TODO
  77+ ADCC C3 02 AE     		jp		NormaliseRoofV
  78+ ADCF
  79+ ADCF              TidyRotXSmall:
  80+ ADCF AF           		xor		a
  81+ ADD0 47           		ld		b,a
  82+ ADD1 3A 24 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)			; nosev_y
  83+ ADD4 E6 60        		and		%01100000
  84+ ADD6 CA C6 AD     		jp		z,TidyRotYSmall
  85+ ADD9 3A 26 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)			; nosev z
  86+ ADDC 47           		ld		b,a							; b = regX for now
  87+ ADDD 3A 1E C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)			; roofv y
  88+ ADE0 CD B7 AE     		call	CalcRoofvY					; Set (roofvy= (nosev_x * roofv_x + nosev_z * roofv_z) / nosev_y, Q -= nosev_z
  89+ ADE3 32 1E C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1),a			; set roofvy hi
  90+ ADE6 C3 02 AE     		jp		NormaliseRoofV
  91+ ADE9              ; TIDY is broken
  92+ ADE9              TIDY:
  93+ ADE9 DD 01                break
  94+ ADEB              ORTHOGALISE:
  95+ ADEB              ;-- NormaliseNosev
  96+ ADEB CD 27 AD     		call	CopyRotMatNoseVtoXX15
  97+ ADEE CD CE A8     		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise z hi, its really TIS3
  98+ ADF1 CD 60 AD     		call	CopyXX15toRotMatNoseV
  99+ ADF4              .CheckNXSmall:
 100+ ADF4 3A 22 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 101+ ADF7 E6 60        		and		%01100000					; check top two magnitude bits
 102+ ADF9 CA CF AD     		jp		z,TidyRotXSmall
 103+ ADFC              .RotXIsBig:
 104+ ADFC CD 7D AE             call	CalcRoofvX
 105+ ADFF 32 1C C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1),a    	; set roofvx hi
 106+ AE02              NormaliseRoofV:
 107+ AE02 CD 3A AD     		call	CopyRotMatRoofVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 108+ AE05 CD CE A8     		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise roof
 109+ AE08              ;calc sidev x
 110+ AE08 CD 73 AD     		call	CopyXX15toRotMatRoofV		; get back normalised version
 111+ AE0B 3A 22 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 112+ AE0E 32 D2 94     		ld		(varQ),a					; q = nosev_y
 113+ AE11 3A 20 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)	     ;roov z
 114+ AE14 CD 19 AD     		call	RSequQmulA
 115+ AE17 3A 26 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)		; nosev z
 116+ AE1A 47           		ld		b,a							; b = regX for now
 117+ AE1B 3A 1E C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)	    ; roofv y
 118+ AE1E CD 99 AD     		call	TidySub1					; Set (A ?)= (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, Q -= nosev_z
 119+ AE21                      IfAIsZeroGoto NormSideXNoNeg
 119+ AE21 A7          >				and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 119+ AE22 CA 27 AE    >				jp	z, NormSideXNoNeg
 120+ AE25 EE 80        		xor		$80							; flip a to get -sidev_x
 121+ AE27              NormSideXNoNeg:
 122+ AE27 32 16 C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevX+1),a
 123+ AE2A              ;calc sidev y
 124+ AE2A 3A 26 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)			; nosev z
 125+ AE2D 32 D2 94     		ld		(varQ),a
 126+ AE30 3A 1C C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)			; roofv x
 127+ AE33 CD 19 AD     		call	RSequQmulA
 128+ AE36 3A 22 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)			        ; nosev x
 129+ AE39 47           		ld		b,a							; b = regX for now
 130+ AE3A 3A 20 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)			; roofv z
 131+ AE3D CD 99 AD     		call	TidySub1					; Set (A ?)= (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, Q -= nosev_z
 132+ AE40                      IfAIsZeroGoto NormSideYNoNeg
 132+ AE40 A7          >				and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 132+ AE41 CA 46 AE    >				jp	z, NormSideYNoNeg
 133+ AE44 EE 80        		xor		$80							; flip a to get -sidev_y
 134+ AE46              NormSideYNoNeg:
 135+ AE46 32 24 C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1),a
 136+ AE49              ;calc sidev z
 137+ AE49 3A 22 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)			; nosev x
 138+ AE4C 32 D2 94     		ld		(varQ),a
 139+ AE4F 3A 1E C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)			; roofv y
 140+ AE52 CD 19 AD     		call	RSequQmulA
 141+ AE55 3A 24 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)			; nosev y
 142+ AE58 47           		ld		b,a							; b = regX for now
 143+ AE59 3A 1C C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)			; roofv x
 144+ AE5C CD 99 AD     		call	TidySub1					; Set (A ?)= (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, Q -= nosev_z
 145+ AE5F                      IfAIsZeroGoto NormSideZNoNeg
 145+ AE5F A7          >				and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 145+ AE60 CA 65 AE    >				jp	z, NormSideZNoNeg
 146+ AE63 EE 80        		xor		$80							; flip a to get -sidev_y
 147+ AE65              NormSideZNoNeg:
 148+ AE65 32 18 C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevY+1),a ;TODO SHoudl this be Y??
 149+ AE68              .ClearLoBytes:
 150+ AE68 21 21 C0     		ld		hl,UBnkrotmatNosevX
 151+ AE6B 06 09        		ld		b,9
 152+ AE6D AF                   xor     a
 153+ AE6E              .ClearLoLoop:
 154+ AE6E 77           		ld		(hl),a						; zero out lo bytes
 155+ AE6F 23           		inc		hl
 156+ AE70 23           		inc		hl
 157+ AE71 10 FB        		djnz	.ClearLoLoop
 158+ AE73 CD 4D AD     		call	CopyRotMatSideVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 159+ AE76 CD CE A8     		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise roof
 160+ AE79              ;calc sidev x
 161+ AE79 CD 86 AD     		call	CopyXX15toRotMatSideV		; get back normalised version
 162+ AE7C
 163+ AE7C C9           		ret
 164+ AE7D
 165+ AE7D
 166+ AE7D
 167+ AE7D              ;;;;;;;;.CheckNYSmall:
 168+ AE7D              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(XX15+2)					; first check z zero, if so we have to do Y
 169+ AE7D              ;;;;;;;;		and		$7F
 170+ AE7D              ;;;;;;;;		cp		0
 171+ AE7D              ;;;;;;;;		jp		z,Tidy1RZ
 172+ AE7D              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(XX15+1)					; now we can do a realistic check of RY
 173+ AE7D              ;;;;;;;;		cp 		0							; we can't end up with divide by 0 for RY
 174+ AE7D              ;;;;;;;;		jp		z,Tidy1RZ					; We can't have all values of vector 0 so we must do RZ
 175+ AE7D              ;;;;;;;;		and		%01100000					; check top two magnitude bits
 176+ AE7D              ;;;;;;;;		jp		z,Tidy1RY					; and tidy based on roofy
 177+ AE7D              ;;;;;;;;.DoNZ:
 178+ AE7D              ;;;;;;;;		jp		Tidy1RZ						; else we tidy based on roofz
 179+ AE7D              ;;;;;;;;;---RE ENTRY POINT -------------------------------------
 180+ AE7D              ;;;;;;;;NormaliseRoofv:
 181+ AE7D              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyRotMatRoofVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 182+ AE7D              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 183+ AE7D              ;;;;;;;;		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise
 184+ AE7D              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 185+ AE7D              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyXX15toRotMatRoofV		; get back normalised version
 186+ AE7D              ;;;;;;;;ProcessSidev:
 187+ AE7D              ;;;;;;;;; -- SIDEV X
 188+ AE7D              ;;;;;;;;		ldCopyByte	nosev_z+1, varQ         ; use ixh as Q later
 189+ AE7D              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)				; a = roofv_hi
 190+ AE7D              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 191+ AE7D              ;;;;;;;;		call	RSequQmulA					; RS = Q * A MULT12
 192+ AE7D              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 193+ AE7D              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 194+ AE7D              ;;;;;;;;		ld		b,a							; set x (b) to value of nosev_z
 195+ AE7D              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)				; a = roofv_y hi
 196+ AE7D              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 197+ AE7D              ;;;;;;;;		call	TidySub1					; set A (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, This also sets Q = nosev_z TIS1
 198+ AE7D              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 199+ AE7D              ;;;;;;;;		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevX+1),a				; sidev_x = = (nosev_z * roofv_y - nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96
 200+ AE7D              ;;;;;;;;; -- SIDEV Y
 201+ AE7D              ;;;;;;;;		ldCopyByte	UBnkrotmatNosevX+1, varQ         ; use ixh as Q later
 202+ AE7D              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)				;
 203+ AE7D              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 204+ AE7D              ;;;;;;;;		call	RSequQmulA					; RS = Q * A MULT12 MULT12
 205+ AE7D              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 206+ AE7D              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 207+ AE7D              ;;;;;;;;		ld		b,a
 208+ AE7D              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)
 209+ AE7D              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 210+ AE7D              ;;;;;;;;		call	TidySub1						; set A (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, This also sets Q = nosev_z
 211+ AE7D              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 212+ AE7D              ;;;;;;;;		ld		(sidev_y+1),a				; sidev_y  = (nosev_x * roofv_z - nosev_z * roofv_x) / 96
 213+ AE7D              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 214+ AE7D              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 215+ AE7D              ;;;;;;;;; -- SIDEV Z
 216+ AE7D              ;;;;;;;;		ldCopyByte	UBnkrotmatNosevY+1, varQ         ; use ixh as Q later
 217+ AE7D              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)				;
 218+ AE7D              ;;;;;;;;		call	RSequQmulA					; RS = Q * A MULT12
 219+ AE7D              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 220+ AE7D              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 221+ AE7D              ;;;;;;;;		ld		b,a
 222+ AE7D              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 223+ AE7D              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 224+ AE7D              ;;;;;;;;		call	TidySub1						; set A (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, This also sets Q = nosev_z
 225+ AE7D              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 226+ AE7D              ;;;;;;;;		ld		(sidev_z+1),a
 227+ AE7D              ;;;;;;;;		xor		a							; set a = 0 so we can clear orientation low bytes
 228+ AE7D              ;;;;;;;;		ld		hl,sidev_z
 229+ AE7D              ;;;;;;;;		ld		b,9							; only on 6 cells (3 x row 0 and row 1)
 230+ AE7D              ;;;;;;;;		ld		hl,UBnkrotmatNosevX
 231+ AE7D              ;;;;;;;;NormaliseSideV:
 232+ AE7D              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyRotMatSideVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 233+ AE7D              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 234+ AE7D              ;;;;;;;;		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise
 235+ AE7D              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 236+ AE7D              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyXX15toRotMatSideV		; get back normalised version
 237+ AE7D              ;;;;;;;;
 238+ AE7D
 239+ AE7D
 240+ AE7D              CalcRoofvX:
 241+ AE7D              Tidy1RX:										; roofv_x´ = -(nosev_y´ * roofv_y + nosev_z´ * roofv_z) / nosev_x´
 242+ AE7D              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1,varQ
 242+ AE7D 3A 26 C0    >               ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 242+ AE80 32 D2 94    >               ld       (varQ),a
 243+ AE83 3A 20 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)
 244+ AE86 CD 19 AD     		call	RSequQmulA						; rs = nosez hi * roofz hi
 245+ AE89              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevY+1,varQ
 245+ AE89 3A 24 C0    >               ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 245+ AE8C 32 D2 94    >               ld       (varQ),a
 246+ AE8F 3A 1E C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 247+ AE92 CD E3 A4     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS				; DE = nosey hi * roofy hi + rs
 248+ AE95 7A           		ld		a,d
 249+ AE96 E6 80        		and 	$80
 250+ AE98 FD 67        		ld		iyh,a
 251+ AE9A              ;DEBUG		ld		c,a
 252+ AE9A 3A 22 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)					; get nosev x sign
 253+ AE9D 4F           		ld		c,a								; temp save
 254+ AE9E E6 80        		and		$80
 255+ AEA0 FD AC        		xor		iyh								; flip from saved multiply sign result
 256+ AEA2 FD 67        		ld		iyh,a							; save nosesev sign to iyh
 257+ AEA4 79           		ld		a,c								; recover a
 258+ AEA5 E6 7F        		and		$7F								; a is unsigned nosev x
 259+ AEA7 42           		ld		b,d
 260+ AEA8 4B           		ld		c,e								; bc = nosev_y´ * roofv_y + nosev_z´ * roofv_z
 261+ AEA9 57           		ld		d,a								; de = nosev x hi
 262+ AEAA 1E 00        		ld		e,0
 263+ AEAC CD 40 A7     		call	BC_Div_DE
 264+ AEAF FD 7C        		ld		a,iyh							; get back sign from nosevx
 265+ AEB1 EE 80        		xor		$80								; flip sign
 266+ AEB3 E6 80        		and		$80								; keep sign bit only
 267+ AEB5 B0           		or		b
 268+ AEB6 C9           		ret
 269+ AEB7
 270+ AEB7
 271+ AEB7              CalcRoofvY:
 272+ AEB7              Tidy1RY:										; roofv_y´ = -(nosev_x´ * roofv_x + nosev_z´ * roofv_z) / nosev_y´
 273+ AEB7              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1,varQ				;                  A        Q              RS
 273+ AEB7 3A 26 C0    >               ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 273+ AEBA 32 D2 94    >               ld       (varQ),a
 274+ AEBD 3A 20 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)
 275+ AEC0 CD 19 AD     		call	RSequQmulA
 276+ AEC3              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevX+1,varQ
 276+ AEC3 3A 22 C0    >               ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 276+ AEC6 32 D2 94    >               ld       (varQ),a
 277+ AEC9 3A 1C C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)
 278+ AECC CD E3 A4     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS
 279+ AECF 7A           		ld		a,d
 280+ AED0 E6 80        		and 	$80
 281+ AED2 FD 67        		ld		iyh,a
 282+ AED4 3A 24 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)					; get nosev x sign
 283+ AED7 4F           		ld		c,a								; temp save
 284+ AED8 E6 80        		and		$80
 285+ AEDA FD AC        		xor		iyh								; flip from saved multiply sign result
 286+ AEDC FD 67        		ld		iyh,a							; save nosesev sign to iyh
 287+ AEDE 79           		ld		a,c								; recover a
 288+ AEDF E6 7F        		and		$7F								; a is unsigned nosev x
 289+ AEE1 42           		ld		b,d
 290+ AEE2 4B           		ld		c,e								; bc = nosev_y´ * roofv_y + nosev_z´ * roofv_z
 291+ AEE3 57           		ld		d,a								; de = nosev x hi
 292+ AEE4 1E 00        		ld		e,0
 293+ AEE6 CD 40 A7     		call	BC_Div_DE
 294+ AEE9 FD 7C        		ld		a,iyh
 295+ AEEB EE 80        		xor		$80
 296+ AEED E6 80        		and		$80
 297+ AEEF B0           		or		b
 298+ AEF0 C9           		ret
 299+ AEF1
 300+ AEF1              CalcRoofvZ:
 301+ AEF1              Tidy1RZ:										; roofv_z´ = -(nosev_x´ * roofv_x + nosev_y´ * roofv_y) / nosev_z´
 302+ AEF1              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevY+1,varQ
 302+ AEF1 3A 24 C0    >               ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 302+ AEF4 32 D2 94    >               ld       (varQ),a
 303+ AEF7 3A 1E C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 304+ AEFA CD 19 AD     		call	RSequQmulA						; rs = NOSEy * ROOFy
 305+ AEFD              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevX+1,varQ
 305+ AEFD 3A 22 C0    >               ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 305+ AF00 32 D2 94    >               ld       (varQ),a
 306+ AF03 3A 1C C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)
 307+ AF06 CD E3 A4     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS				; de (A,ixl) = NOSEx * ROOFx + RS
 308+ AF09 7A           		ld		a,d
 309+ AF0A E6 80        		and 	$80
 310+ AF0C FD 67        		ld		iyh,a
 311+ AF0E 3A 26 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)					; get nosev x sign
 312+ AF11 4F           		ld		c,a								; temp save
 313+ AF12 E6 80        		and		$80
 314+ AF14 FD AC        		xor		iyh								; flip from saved multiply sign result
 315+ AF16 FD 67        		ld		iyh,a							; save nosesev sign to iyh
 316+ AF18 79           		ld		a,c								; recover a
 317+ AF19 E6 7F        		and		$7F								; a is unsigned nosev x
 318+ AF1B 42           		ld		b,d
 319+ AF1C 4B           		ld		c,e								; bc = nosev_y´ * roofv_y + nosev_z´ * roofv_z
 320+ AF1D 57           		ld		d,a								; de = nosev x hi
 321+ AF1E 1E 00        		ld		e,0
 322+ AF20 CD 40 A7     		call	BC_Div_DE
 323+ AF23 FD 7C        		ld		a,iyh
 324+ AF25 EE 80        		xor		$80
 325+ AF27 E6 80        		and		$80
 326+ AF29 B0           		or		b
 327+ AF2A C9           		ret
 328+ AF2B
 329+ AF2B
 330+ AF2B
 331+ AF2B              ;;ProcessSidev:
 332+ AF2B              ;;		ldCopyByte	UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1, varQ         ; use ixh as Q later
 333+ AF2B              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)				; a = roofv_hi
 334+ AF2B              ;;		push	bc
 335+ AF2B              ;;		call	RSequQmulA					; RS = Q * A MULT12
 336+ AF2B              ;;		pop		bc
 337+ AF2B              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 338+ AF2B              ;;		ld		b,a							; set x (b) to value of nosev_z
 339+ AF2B              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)				; a = roofv_y hi
 340+ AF2B              ;;		push	bc
 341+ AF2B              ;;		call	TidySub1					; set A (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, This also sets Q = nosev_z TIS1
 342+ AF2B              ;;		pop		bc
 343+ AF2B              ;;		xor		$80							; sidev_x = -a by flipping sign bit
 344+ AF2B              ;;		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevX+1),a				; sidev_x = = (nosev_z * roofv_y - nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96
 345+ AF2B              ;;		ldCopyByte	UBnkrotmatNosevX+1, varQ         ; use ixh as Q later
 346+ AF2B              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)				;
 347+ AF2B              ;;		push	bc
 348+ AF2B              ;;		call	RSequQmulA					; RS = Q * A MULT12 MULT12
 349+ AF2B              ;;		pop		bc
 350+ AF2B              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 351+ AF2B              ;;		ld		b,a
 352+ AF2B              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 353+ AF2B              ;;		push	bc
 354+ AF2B              ;;		call	TidySub1						; set A (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, This also sets Q = nosev_z
 355+ AF2B              ;;		pop		bc
 356+ AF2B              ;;		xor		$80							; a *= -1
 357+ AF2B              ;;		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevY+1),a				; sidev_y  = (nosev_x * roofv_z - nosev_z * roofv_x) / 96
 358+ AF2B              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 359+ AF2B              ;;		push	bc
 360+ AF2B              ;;		ldCopyByte	UBnkrotmatNosevY+1, varQ         ; use ixh as Q later
 361+ AF2B              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)				;
 362+ AF2B              ;;		call	RSequQmulA					; RS = Q * A MULT12
 363+ AF2B              ;;		pop		bc
 364+ AF2B              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 365+ AF2B              ;;		ld		b,a
 366+ AF2B              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 367+ AF2B              ;;		push	bc
 368+ AF2B              ;;		call	TidySub1						; set A (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, This also sets Q = nosev_z
 369+ AF2B              ;;		pop		bc
 370+ AF2B              ;;		xor		$80
 371+ AF2B              ;;		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevZ+1),a
 372+ AF2B              ;;		xor		a							; set a = 0 so we can clear orientation low bytes
 373+ AF2B              ;;		ld		hl,UBnkrotmatSidevZ
 374+ AF2B              ;;		ld		b,9							; only on 6 cells (3 x row 0 and row 1)
 375+ AF2B              ;;		ld		hl,UBnkrotmatNosevX
 376+ AF2B
 377+ AF2B
 378+ AF2B
 379+ AF2B
 380+ AF2B
 381+ AF2B
 382+ AF2B              ;;;;;;;;;-- Check to see if the top two magnitude bits are clear in nosev_x, if so jump to TI1
 383+ AF2B              ;;;;;;;;.ProcessRoofv:
 384+ AF2B              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyRotMatRoofVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 385+ AF2B              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 386+ AF2B              ;;;;;;;;		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise roof
 387+ AF2B              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 388+ AF2B              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyXX15toRotMatRoofV		; get back normalised version
 389+ AF2B              ;;;;;;;;.ProcessSidev:
 390+ AF2B              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyRotMatSideVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 391+ AF2B              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 392+ AF2B              ;;;;;;;;		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise roof
 393+ AF2B              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 394+ AF2B              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyXX15toRotMatSideV		; get back normalised version
 395+ AF2B
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/tidy.asm
1020  AF2B                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/LL28AequAmul256DivD.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/LL28AequAmul256DivD.asm
   1+ AF2B
   2+ AF2B              LL28Amul256DivD:        JumpIfAGTENusng  d, .Ll28Exit255
   2+ AF2B BA          >                        cp     d
   2+ AF2C D2 4A AF    >                        jp		nc,.Ll28Exit255
   3+ AF2F 1E FE                                ld      e,%11111110                 ; Set R to have bits 1-7 set, so we can rotate through 7
   4+ AF31 CB 27        .LL31:                  sla     a
   5+ AF33 38 0D                                jr      c,.LL29
   6+ AF35                                      JumpIfALTNusng  d, .SkipSub         ; will jump if carry set, so we need to reset on the rol
   6+ AF35 BA          >                        cp      d
   6+ AF36 DA 3B AF    >                        jp		c, .SkipSub
   7+ AF39 92                                   sub     d
   8+ AF3A                                      ClearCarryFlag                      ; reset clarry as it will be complimented for rotate as 6502 does carry flags inverted
   8+ AF3A B7          >                    or a
   9+ AF3B 3F           .SkipSub:               ccf                                 ; if we did the subtract the carry will be clear so we need to invert to roll in.
  10+ AF3C CB 13                                rl      e
  11+ AF3E 38 F1                                jr      c,.LL31
  12+ AF40 7B                                   ld      a,e
  13+ AF41 C9                                   ret
  14+ AF42 92           .LL29:                  sub     d                           ; A >= Q, so set A = A - Q
  15+ AF43 37                                   scf                                 ; Set the C flag to rotate into the result in R
  16+ AF44 CB 13                                rl      e                           ; rotate counter e left
  17+ AF46 38 E9                                jr      c,.LL31                     ; if a bit was spat off teh end then loop
  18+ AF48 7B                                   ld      a,e                         ; stick result in a
  19+ AF49 C9                                   ret
  20+ AF4A 3E FF        .Ll28Exit255:           ld  a,255                           ; Fail with FF as result
  21+ AF4C C9                                   ret
  22+ AF4D
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/LL28AequAmul256DivD.asm
1021  AF4D                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/XAequMinusXAPplusRSdiv96-TIS1.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/XAequMinusXAPplusRSdiv96-TIS1.asm
   1+ AF4D              XAequMinusXAplusRSdiv96:					;.TIS1	\ -> &293B  \ Tidy subroutine 1  X.A =  (-X*A  + (R.S))/96
   2+ AF4D              TIS1:
   3+ AF4D 08           		ex		af,af'
   4+ AF4E 3A 5E 94     		ld		a,(regX)
   5+ AF51 47           		ld		b,a
   6+ AF52 08           		ex		af,af'
   7+ AF53              BAequMinusBAplusRSdiv96:					;.TIS1	\ -> &293B  \ Tidy subroutine 1 using B register = X
   8+ AF53 08           		ex		af,af'
   9+ AF54 78           		ld		a,b
  10+ AF55 32 D2 94     		ld		(varQ),a
  11+ AF58 08           		ex		af,af'
  12+ AF59 EE 80        		xor		$80							;	 flip sign of Acc
  13+ AF5B CD E3 A4     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS			; \ MAD \ multiply and add (X,A) =  -X*A  + (R,S)
  14+ AF5E              ; USES 				A BC E
  15+ AF5E              ; DOES NOT USE		D HL
  16+ AF5E              Div96:										; .DVID96	\ Their comment A=A/96: answer is A*255/96
  17+ AF5E 47           		ld		b,a
  18+ AF5F E6 80        		and		$80							;	hi sign
  19+ AF61 5F           		ld		e,a							;   e = varT
  20+ AF62 78           		ld		a,b
  21+ AF63 E6 7F        		and		$7F							;	hi A7
  22+ AF65 06 FE        		ld		b,$FE						;   slide counter
  23+ AF67 48           		ld		c,b							;   c == T1 ::  T1
  24+ AF68              .DVL3:										;   roll T1  clamp Acc to #96 for rotation matrix unity
  25+ AF68 CB 27        		sla		a
  26+ AF6A FE 60        		cp		$60							; max 96
  27+ AF6C 30 02        		jr		nc,.DV4
  28+ AF6E DE 60        		sbc		a,$60							;  SBC #&60
  29+ AF70              .DV4:										; skip subtraction
  30+ AF70 CB 11        		rl		c							;  T1
  31+ AF72 38 F4        		jr		c,.DVL3
  32+ AF74 79           		ld		a,c							;   T1
  33+ AF75 B3           		or		e							;   restore T sign
  34+ AF76 C9           		ret
  35+ AF77
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/XAequMinusXAPplusRSdiv96-TIS1.asm
